title: Sideline - Get a Second Number for a Business Line
description:
SECOND PHONE NUMBERSideline gives you a 2nd phone number on your smartphone to let you divide your communications easily and without confusion.

Sideline is more than a second line for you and your business. It‚Äôs the flexible, personal communication app that gives your customers a work number they can use - not your private one. Already tens of thousands of professionals are using Sideline to help them transform how they keep in touch with their customers with a dedicated second phone number that gives out your professional caller ID - and keeps your professional second line separate from your private one.

By creating a custom business number, Sideline gives professionals like you the chance to connect with customers, build your small business, and manage all your contacts and communications quickly and easily. Basically, you get your own dedicated, personal work number without the hassle of buying a second phone.

Sideline is your second line designed for professionals - and gives you amazing features like:

AUTO-REPLYIf you miss a call on your work line, Sideline responds automatically with a custom private message.

A TEAM WORK NUMBERSplit one business number with multiple devices, so your team or department can be more responsive in answering your work line.

CUSTOM NUMBERBuild your identity with a personalized second number, such as ‚Äú(555) PET-SHOP‚Äù or ‚Äú(555) FLOWERS.‚Äù So you can pick a more durable work line and professional identity, and not just a burner phone number.

LOCAL AREA CODESearch area codes to find a local second phone number for your company or small business.

BUSINESS TEXTINGText-enable your business to easily connect with customers using your 2nd or work line.

ENTERPRISE DASHBOARDManage work numbers on employee devices. (Enterprise account required. See Sideline.com for details)

Because Sideline is so helpful and efficient at helping small business and professionals, we‚Äôve got people porting their Google second number over to Sideline.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES FOR YOUR SECOND PHONE LINE

CARRIER RELIABILITYAll calls are cellular (not VoIP) to make your 2nd phone number as reliable as your 1st.

UNLIMITED CALLING ON YOUR SECOND LINECalls use your existing carrier plan, so no extra calling credits needed for your second number.

MESSAGINGTexting includes SMS and picture messaging, group messaging, and more. So you keep all the functionalities you need.

CUSTOM CALLER ID ON YOUR 2ND PHONEIt‚Äôs clear which phone number is ringing, so you can prioritize accordingly.

SEPARATE VOICEMAILRecord a professional greeting or set up multiple greetings for every situation.

VOICEMAIL TO TEXTSave time and conveniently read voicemail transcriptions as a text.

DO NOT DISTURBSend Sideline calls directly to voicemail on nights, weekends, or holidays.

NUMBER PORTINGTransfer an existing number to Sideline from another device or landline.

WEB MESSAGINGAccess your Sideline business number online and text from the desktop.

Sideline is a business number, not a burner phone! It‚Äôs a second number for professionals that brings connections, inspiration and innovation to small business owners. Keep your private and your work number separate and manage your business more effectively.

Download Sideline and create your 2nd line today!

Privacy policy & terms of use

recentChanges:
Better. Faster. More Reliable. That's our motto for every update. And in this release, performance updates make Sideline all of those things.

If you're enjoying the app, please leave us a rating or review. Need help? Email us at: AndroidHelp@sideline.com
comments: The app is great! Call quality and features are reliable and high quality. I love the customization options. The only thing I wish they could add for the android version of the app is the feature to change the main and message wallpaper. This feature is available on the iphone version of the app.

I'm a subscriber for ~2 years. My experience was positive to start and has continued to get worse. Unfortunately, I don't recommend. Phone calls have delayed audio despite strong connection. I've communicated issues and they've persisted. Will update if that changes with this review.

Good App..yet frustrating..helps out alot...but wheres the feature to delete more than 1 message...it either deletes 1 text message or them all...and also the quality of sending and receiving video and photo content are horrible...also why is there a whole other number showing up on my phone when someone calls me...i never know who is calling me
Frustrating. Everything was great until today. I keep getting messages that say to keep your device mobile private open sideline app and call again. IM IN SIDELINE APP. I've reinstalled 3 times now

I Have had Sideline for almost a year with no issues. I use this number for business, so it is critical. Because of a technical problem, my calls were suddenly going directly to my other numbers voicemail without ringing. I then had need to call customer service to get help. Let me tell you, it was an extraordinary experience. I was very impressed. Such real, personable, professional service ! In the end, Dominic had the whole thing corrected in less than an hour. Stellar performance !

title: QuickBooks Online Accounting, Invoicing & Expenses
description:
Track miles, manage invoices, maintain your financial reports and cash flow, and see your profit and loss. Run your small business on the go with the QuickBooks Online Accounting app, trusted by over 4.3 million small businesses worldwide. 

You don‚Äôt need to be a tax accountant to keep your small business bookkeeping organized. Create, send, and track invoices from viewed to paid. Access accounting solutions to know where your money is going. Plus, see where your business stands with financial reports. Small business accounting is easy with QuickBooks cloud accounting software. Our bookkeeping services make it effortless to stay on top of your business on the go. The Quickbooks Accounting app is here to make the life of every small business owner easier.

Tracking mileage automatically

Automatically track your business mileage using your phone‚Äôs GPS, without draining your phone‚Äôs battery.

Swipe to mark trips as business or personal to maximize your mileage tax deductions.

Dashboard business insights

Check your profit and loss to know what you‚Äôre making and spending, plus view your account balances.

Easily track your expenses by category so you know exactly where your money goes.

See your open and overdue invoices at a glance for easy cash flow analysis.

Create invoices and get paid faster

The invoice generator lets you send and manage invoices in multiple currencies so you always know who owes you and who paid you.

Get paid faster by credit card or bank transfer (requires a QuickBooks Payments account).

Manage payments, track sales and customers on the go

Get maximum tax savings by scanning receipts and attaching them to your expenses.  

Stay up to date on your profit and loss by connecting your bank accounts. Track finances and manage payments quickly and with ease.

Review your bank transactions and add them to your accounting records with a tap.
Easily add your customers so you can keep in touch with them on the go.

Do even more with online accounting

Customize your invoices and sales receipts with your logo, colors, and custom fields in minutes. 

Be prepared for tax time and get all the tax deductions you deserve by giving your tax accountant access to your QuickBooks data.

Add more tools with over 80 partner apps, including inventory management and advanced CRM, by going to apps.intuit.com

It‚Äôs easy to get started

Already using QuickBooks Online? Download the world‚Äôs #1 accounting app, sign in with your QuickBooks user ID and password, and enjoy the QuickBooks Accounting app for free!

New to QuickBooks Online? Download the app, create an account, and try QuickBooks free for 30 days! There‚Äôs no credit card required and no obligation to purchase.

Your free trial includes unlimited access to QuickBooks on the web and all your mobile devices. 

Not compatible with QuickBooks Desktop for Windows or Mac.

#1 Accounting Software for Small to Midsize Businesses
*Based on PCMag, as of November 2019

From INTUIT

Makers of QuickBooks Online, GoPayment, QuickBooks Payroll, TurboTax, and Mint.com

Visit:
https://security.intuit.com/privacy to learn how Intuit protects your privacy.
https://qbo.intuit.com/c1/Terms_Of_Service.html to read the Intuit terms of service.

Download today and start managing your small business easily on the go.

recentChanges: Thanks for using QuickBooks. We update our app regularly to improve performance, fix bugs and add new features so that you'll always know where your business stands.
comments: Whatever you do do NOT sign up or create a subscription through the app or the Google Play Store - you have no ability to manage your subscription or upgrade your account through the app and quickbooks customer support is unable to help or change settings as well. I am very competent with navigating apps and I can say with 100% confidence this is on the app developers at this point - extremely frustrated and unhappy with the app

It's amazing how far behind the times this company is. The only way my bank will allow me to link to Quick Books is by using my routing and account number, but QB doesn't know how to do it that way. This is crazy! So I need to switch banks just so I can link my expenses with QB. What a pain in the ass.

6.10.19 - i hate it. you can't do "billable" expenses from the app. you cant edit invoices that have been sent. terrible. i hate it. 8.12.19 - still hate it. noone has "investigated"my situation. üëéüëé 12.5.19. yup.. still hate it. I use it but cringe every single time I open it. POS app. 1.3.20 still hate it no "billable button". Zero stars 3.5.20. still hate it. Zero stars

Tried to open an account, somehow ended up opening 2 separate ones. Cancelled my subscription but has still charged for the 2 accounts for over 2 months. Absolute shambles. I tried to use the one account that I actually wanted but had absolutely terrible service off the helpline, nobody knew what to do. Shocking.
paying $20 a month for an app that keeps crashing that rely on for our business is nerve wrecking. please fix asap. Have tried app from two different computers to make sure it wasn't from my end.

title: Scanner App To PDF - TapScanner
description:
Tap Scanner app is a simple Camera document scanner app with high quality PDF output.

1. Scan documents, receipts, QR and business cards
Use Tap Scanner app to scan any type of document and save the scan to PDF!

2. Document Scanner app - Automatically detects borders
Tap Scanner automatically detects document borders when you scan a document!

3. Fine tune the image with many filters to reach perfection
TapScanner has many filters to help you get the best image quality when you scan a document!

4. Easily manage your documents
Tap Scanner lets you easily manage your scanned documents.

5. With a high quality PDF Scanner and PNG output.
Tap Scanner lets you export your document scan to PDF or PNG formats!

6. OCR - Convert image to text - supporting +110 Languages - enables output of live text from scanner.
Tap Scanner app has built in OCR with over 110 languages!

7. Sign & Send documents to others for signing with an electronic signature.
Scanner PDF lets you sign your scanned documents before sending them!

8. Cloud integration - backup and sync content to the cloud.
Tap Scanner lets you upload your scanned documents to your favourite cloud service supporting backup to: Google Drive, Dropbox and more.

9. Simplify document scanning & signing by adding custom fields to documents.
Tap Scanner even lets you add custom fields to your scanned document!

10. QR Scanner app - scan QR codes, and convert them to email, text and links seamlessly.
Tap Scanner can scan QR codes as well!

Try this Pdf Scanner app - it's free - try it now!

comments: Love this app! Been using it to send my 9y.o. son's work to his teacher via email during COVID-19 lockdown. Works perfectly. If it doesn't capture the entire image, it allows you to adjust. You can batch or single scan. Has ads, but easily closed out after a second.

As mentioned, this app truly feels like it's trying to scam me out of $50. Less than 72 hours after the start of the 3 day trial, I was charged. No warning. No email. Nothing. Absolutely not okay. 3 day trial? Ordered on the 16th, charged on the 19th. Less than 72 hours, THAT'S NOT 3 FREE DAYS. I've used the free version and watched ads for a while, but I'll definitely be uninstalling this app now. Disingenuous and exploitative.

People who want to cancel the subscription -- you cancel it in the playstore, not in the app itself! Click on the app and it should say under Uninstall and Open buttons "Manage subscription." You can follow the instructions/prompts to cancel from there

Easy to be honest! In managing or removing your subscription, press "manage subscription" then unsubsribe here within the playstore at the open option above. Tho, needs improvement in some already understandable letters, it sometimes converts numbers to letters. Yet, overall satisfied!

Good app with a scam to get you on yearly subscription for a high price. Just wanted to check it and found myself now struggling to get a refund from the developer. Feels like being cheated. Will not give a good review for such a behaviour.

title: Invoice Maker: Estimate & Invoice App
description:
Invoice Simple is a fast and easy invoice app for sending invoices and estimates to your customers.

Invoice Simple is the perfect invoice maker for small business owners, contractors and freelancers needing a simple and professional mobile invoice app. Create, send and track invoices and estimates easily on your phone. Manage all of your billing while on the go so you can get paid faster. Send the estimate or invoice before you even leave the customer!

The free version of Invoice Simple can be used to create a limited number of invoices. You can upgrade in-app to create an unlimited number of invoices and estimates. With Invoice Simple, you'll be invoicing your customers in no time and sending professional PDF invoices with ease. Send your first free invoice today with the #1 invoice app.

-----

Invoice Maker Features
‚Ä¢ Estimate, invoice and bill for any product or service
‚Ä¢ Send estimates to your customers, then convert them to invoices later
‚Ä¢ Customize your invoice template as much or as little as you want
‚Ä¢ Customize invoice fields: quantity, rate, shipping, and item number
‚Ä¢ Include invoice payment terms: 30 days, 14 days, etc
‚Ä¢ Generate receipts with a pre-built receipt template
‚Ä¢ Discount on item or total
‚Ä¢ Tax on item or total, inclusive or exclusive
‚Ä¢ Customize your company logo on your invoice templates
‚Ä¢ Create a PDF invoice or estimate with a built-in PDF invoice maker 
‚Ä¢ Email, use messaging apps (e.g: WhatsApp) or text your estimate, invoice or receipt 
‚Ä¢ Sign your invoice or estimate
‚Ä¢ Attach images to your invoices and estimates
‚Ä¢ Accept debit and credit cards, checks and cash
‚Ä¢ Get notified when your estimate or invoice has been read
‚Ä¢ Track your income with built-in billing reporting
‚Ä¢ Quickly set up clients from your phone contact list

Estimates & Quotes
‚Ä¢ Invoice Simple is an easily customized estimate app 
‚Ä¢ Be the first to send estimates and quotes to your customers and win more jobs
‚Ä¢ Automatically generate invoices from estimates with one tap

-----

6 Reasons to Love Invoice Simple
1. Make your invoices look as professional as your business. Modern, clean and customizable.
2. Get invoicing right away. Hands-down the easiest invoice app available.
3. Reduce time and stress. Make billing your customers the simplest thing you do all day.
4. Make invoices and estimates from anywhere. Email, text or print your PDF invoice as soon as you finish a job.
5. Make it easy to get paid. Accept debit or credit cards as well as checks and cash.
6. Invoice with confidence. Invoice Simple is used by hundreds of thousands of small business owners like you and is consistently rated the top invoice app.

-----
Invoice Simple the ultimate invoice maker: Send simple invoices using professional templates, invoice generator, PDF invoices and quotes, online payments business reporting ‚Äî all rolled up into one easy-to-use app. Whether you need to create a construction invoice or quote, business receipt for your side gig or small business.

--

P.S. If you like the app, we‚Äôd love it if you could give us a good rating. It really does help on our mission to make small business invoicing as fast and hassle-free as possible. Thank you for choosing Invoice Simple!

For support, find us at http://help.invoicesimple.com/ or email support@invoicesimple.com.

comments: I love using this app, the invoices are simple yet perfect for the customer, everything in detail, however the payment process is a mess, we should not be charged to receive payments if the payment takes 2-3 days to enter your account, it should be a free option because of the length it takes, it should have an instant option, like venmo, zelle, cashapp and what not, this needs to be fixed asap!!! Definitely needs to be looked into!

Pros: *Extremely simple to use and customizable. *PDF invoices look professional af. *Can send invoices from within the app. *Easily handles multiple clients. *You can save line items for re-use. *Use quantity as a multiplier and have it do the math (ex. Hourly rates * number of hours). *cloud backups. I've moved devices multiple times and never lost an invoice. *Premium features are only $2.99/month, that's next to nothing for a small business. Cons: If I find any I'll update this review.

Update: March 10, 2020 - after 2 weeks of reporting the problem with rounding numbers, the developer sis not take any real actions to solve the problem, rather they asked me to solve the problem manually by manipulating invoice data and the taxes so the totals mach after rounding, which I did since I did not have another alternative. After almost a year, I find myself forced to find another system that much more mature with a team behind it for testing and QA before it gets release to end users. Update - March 01, 2020 - after 2 consecutive releases with bugs and not being responsive to resolve, I found myself forced to take one star off. I hope I will come back to update my review, hoping for the best. --------------- Simple, intuitive, accurate, bug free (so far), allows you to ask for enhancements, tried but it is too early to judge, awaiting response. Good job guys, many thanks.

Terrible! I paid for the whole year and then found out from their support people that I paid for a mobile version and would have to purchase another subscription to be able to use my computer to take advantage of the customizing a template for what I wanted. I can't find anything about having to pay additional fees. Also support is terrible
Awesome app... I will subscribe, only wish that there was a trial period instead of making a few invoices then you have to subscribe to do much more. But other than that it is great.

title: LandGlide
description:
LandGlide is the most comprehensive parcel data mobile app. Using GPS technology to pinpoint your exact location, you can explore maps and access 150 million parcel records in over 3,000 counties - covering more than 95% of the U.S. population.

Simple to use on your smartphone or tablet, just hover over a property and LandGlide displays the property‚Äôs owner, address, boundaries, parcel ID, sale price, school district and more.¬†Within the intuitive interface, there is the ability to drop a pin to save the property, add notes by property, and export your saved properties - even when not connected to a network using offline mode.

With continual updates to the data and GPS location-based technology, LandGlide has become an important tool for the real estate, utility, energy, outdoor recreation, insurance, forestry, delivery and emergency industries.

Try LandGlide free for seven days! At the end of your free trial, you can choose to subscribe monthly for $9.99 or yearly for $99.99. Subscriptions will automatically renew until cancelled by the user. Manage your subscription settings on your device's Account Settings.
descriptionHTML:
LandGlide is the most comprehensive parcel data mobile app. Using GPS technology to pinpoint your exact location, you can explore maps and access 150 million parcel records in over 3,000 counties - covering more than 95% of the U.S. population.

Simple to use on your smartphone or tablet, just hover over a property and LandGlide displays the property‚Äôs owner, address, boundaries, parcel ID, sale price, school district and more.¬†Within the intuitive interface, there is the ability to drop a pin to save the property, add notes by property, and export your saved properties - even when not connected to a network using offline mode.

With continual updates to the data and GPS location-based technology, LandGlide has become an important tool for the real estate, utility, energy, outdoor recreation, insurance, forestry, delivery and emergency industries.

Try LandGlide free for seven days! At the end of your free trial, you can choose to subscribe monthly for $9.99 or yearly for $99.99. Subscriptions will automatically renew until cancelled by the user. Manage your subscription settings on your device's Account Settings.
summary: Parcel property boundary lines
developerAddress:
Real Estate Portal USA, LLC
4603 Brookpark Rd
Suite 100
Cleveland, OH 44134
recentChanges: Minor bugfixes. Updated billing library.
comments: Purchased on 2/14/20. I got the monthly subscription. App won't go past the the monthly and yearly subscription page. I have uninstalled the app several times and rebooted my phone several of times still not able to access the app. I have used this app before and have not experienced what's happening now. I only put 3 stars to post my comment. In no way this is how I feel about the app. (Error message: Your order is processing, your order will be available in a few minutes). Still saying this.

Rated before my phone update. Won't let me log in now that my phone (sprint, note 10+) updated. Uninstalled and re-installed and didnt help. Have a paid subscription to use it but it hangs up on the monthly/annual subscription screen with no option to log in. Prior to this though, I enjoyed using it daily. Not sure what y'all did, but its working again. Good job !!!

I have to give it 2 stars for a lack of communication for the app. At no time did I see this was a subscription service. I installed and loved the app. Works amazing. And then one time I open it and it's locked out until I pay $100. Not cool.

They wanna charge a 100 bucks a year for something you may use a few times. Just delete and find the next free app that lets you do the same thing. 100s of em out there. Was good for a few minutes and then it becomes useless.

this app is amazingly accurate, and a must-have for any agent selling raw land. Even for a potential buyer of property it's extremely helpful to locate property boundaries and corner pins that may be missing or obscured by vegetation.

title: SmartLine Second Phone Number
description:
Get a second phone number just for your business calls & texts.

When someone calls your second phone number it rings your phone and shows you it‚Äôs a business call so you know how to answer. When you call or text through SmartLine, your customers see it as coming from your new business phone number so your personal number stays private.

Try SmartLine free for 7 days with no long-term contract or extra equipment needed.  After your free trial, you‚Äôll pay $9.99/mo for a local number or $19.99/mo for a toll-free number.

Get set up with your business phone number in under 5 minutes.

Get set up in under 5 minutes and try SmartLine free for 7 days!

More Features

Professional Quality.  Calls use your cellular connection ‚Äì NOT VOIP ‚Äì to give you the call clarity and reliability you need to sound professional.

Spam Call Filtering.  Answer calls with confidence because suspected spam calls are sent straight to voicemail.

Custom Voicemail.  Record a custom voicemail greeting to prompt callers to leave a message.

Voicemail to Text.  Get your business voicemail automatically transcribed to text to save you time.

Set Business Hours.  Choose when you‚Äôre available for business calls and send callers to voicemail after hours.

Stay Organized.  See your conversation history of calls, texts, pictures, and voicemail, organized by contact.

Stay Notified.  Be notified and follow up quickly whenever you have missed calls, voicemail messages, or texts.

Number Porting.  Transfer an existing 2nd phone number to use with SmartLine.

Terms

Currently available in the US only. Requires a SmartLine subscription. Install the app to choose your second phone number and claim your 7 day free trial (limit one per subscriber). After your free trial, SmartLine will automatically renew via Google Play, unless you cancel 24 hours before the free trial ends or before the end of the current billing period. Easily manage and cancel your SmartLine 2nd phone number at any time through your Google Play subscription settings. If you didn't purchase SmartLine through Google Play, you can manage your subscription through the GoDaddy website.

recentChanges:
- Some under-the-hood improvement to keep the app running smoothly.

Our team is brewing up code all day, everyday, to bring you frequent updates and improvements. Wanna send us some love? Rate us! Got a question or need help? Send us an email at SmartLineAndroid@godaddy.com :)
comments: This app has been great!!! It has become exactly what I needed, (2 phone#'s-1device) and it works better than par. It has only stopped once. However, I wrongly presumed, that I would be creating a new contacts list within the app for my business customer's and contacts. Instead, my personal contact list was imported to the app. This was a major drawback, and a disappointment. .....I'm sure I'll find the right app for the job tho.

Works Fine. I needed a second line for work but didn't want to bother with two phones. Google Fi and Google Voice don't play nice together on Google Pixel, so I went with this. It's a little more than is want to pay for how often I use it. Plus the interface is VERY basic. But, it does the job I want and I don't want to bother with switching right now.

Horrible app, stay far away. Phone accidentally deleted the app, and guess what, all my business calls and text messages got deleted too! Had many important business deals in there. Tech support (which takes forever to get ahold of) said I cannot retrieve the texts or old number, once app is deleted. Ontop of that, it never sends text messages reliably.Always appears to send, then says 15 mins later not sent.Very unprofessional and bad for business.Constant headaches and problems with this app.

Works pretty well most of the time. Sometimes it completely logs me out. Often, a text message will show up on my list of text messages (previews), but when I click on that preview to read it, it's not in the conversation. Eventually it shows up, but usually it's way too late.

This is the worst app ever I would never get it messages fail to send company tells you to on install and re install the app I've done it 17 times it signs itself out it says session has ended and you have to sign back in with all your information. Today was my last time I am uninstalling. No joy wt GoDaddy App very disappointed that I paid for it I would not recommend it or use it ever again.They responded, said I had a bad wifi/cell signal after the above.Sent pics i had 5 bars = great signal

title: Contractor Estimate & Invoice
description:
Create quick, professional estimates and invoices, accept payments, and manage projects from anywhere! 

Joist is a FREE tool for contractors that helps you SAVE TIME, WIN MORE JOBS, and STAY ORGANIZED.

---------------------------------
‚ñ∫ CONTRACTORS LOVE JOIST BECAUSE:

‚Ä¢ WIN MORE JOBS - Send your client an estimate before you leave. Be the first to get an estimate in their hands, and give them the opportunity to say YES on the spot.
‚Ä¢ REMOVE THE BOTTLENECK OF ESTIMATING & INVOICING - Build estimates and invoices quicker by creating and selecting from your list of commonly used materials and labor rates.
‚Ä¢ ACCEPT PAYMENTS FROM CLIENTS - accept Credit Card and E-Check payments from your clients directly through Joist, so you can stop wasting hours driving around to pick up checks and deposit them at the bank.
‚Ä¢ EASILY MANAGE CLIENTS - Create, organize, and store valuable client info, so you can access their info anytime, on the go.
‚Ä¢ SAVES TIME - Complete work at the jobsite or in the truck, rather than spending your evenings and weekends catching up on paperwork after a long day
‚Ä¢ LOOK PROFESSIONAL - Show your clients that you‚Äôre the contractor they should trust for the job; with customized, professional looking estimates and invoices.

---------------------------------
‚ñ∫ FEATURES:

- Easily calculate material & labor costs when estimating & invoicing
- Build a list of commonly used items 
- Customize your estimates & invoices with your company info, logo, etc.
- Attach a client contract and collect a signature directly on the spot
- Accept Credit Card and E-Check Payments directly through the app
- Attach photos to your estimates and invoices
- Preview estimates & invoices before you send
- Print or email estimates & invoices on the spot
- Create a personal message for your clients
- Convert estimates into invoices
- Keep track of customer payments and how much you're owed
- Manage and save your clients information
- Set your tax rates
- Export everything into your accounting program (reduce bookkeeping costs)

*Access all your info from any device and the web - Joist is a cloud application

---------------------------------
‚ñ∫ WHO USES JOIST:

All types of general and specialty trade contractors, estimators, and service companies use the app, such as: general contractors, handymen, electricians, plumbers, builders, landscapers, roofers, painters, carpenters, heating and air conditioning, flooring, siding, tile, concrete, paving, bathroom and kitchen remodeling, renovators, deck builders, drywallers, pest control, and more!

---------------------------------
‚ñ∫ IN-APP PURCHASES

You can subscribe to Quickbooks Sync Monthly for $9.99 (US) or Quickbooks Sync Annual for $90.99 (US), JoistPro Monthly for $11.99 (US) or JoistPro Annual for $119.99 (US). Monthly and annual subscriptions will automatically renew after 30 and 365 days, respectively. Payment for these subscriptions will be charged to your Play Store account at the confirmation of purchase. The subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period. You can manage your subscription in your Play Store subscriptions page any time after subscribing. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

---------------------------------

Joist is FREE to Download and FREE to use - available on Android, iPhone, iPad, & desktop computer.

Get support FAST! Our support staff are based in North America. They are responsive (answer the phone / emails immediately), and care about helping you run the best business possible:

support@joist.com
www.joist.com
In-app live chat

Customer Support is available 8AM-10PM EST M-F

comments: The app is pretty good considering price point for pro version. The big issue is you can only contact via email or online chat thru app when available, which is hardly ever. This is a huge problem when you're having technical issues such as emails not being sent to clients. It's a bigger problem when you're waiting for credit card funds collected by Joist but haven't been deposited into your bank account. I've had these issues for a while and no help from Joist. Going with another company.

BEST app I have found to help build my business, I feel like it looks the most professional and makes my company look the same!! Love the different options to send a quote to my clients via email or text, and get a notification when they open the quote!! The options it gives them to pay an invoice with a credit card! AND also the options for the client to finance a project I'm going to do for them !!! Over all if you run your own business Contractor, handyman etc. this app will definitely help!

The app has helped me quite a bit in my business, the only thing I am not too thrilled about is that they are adding more features based off what they find a contractor needs and should have access to as a basic forms, like a change order for example. I asked about that a long time ago so they knew they needed one. I hope they don't keep increasing the price and becoming too expensive.

I'd like to have the licences number displayed, but to bunch it in with other useless features disappointing. Don't care about social media links. Insurance papers can be presented to customers as requested. If I'm at the point to send an Estimate, they usually know we are insured. I was with you guys from the beginning, but I'm going to have to cancel and try a new app. Don't like the direction you are going. Sorry

I've been using this app for years now and it's been great. They have now taken away from it so much. Now I have non stop problems with this app. If you need myjoist help cause you can use this app good luck on having anyone to return your email. I have sent 4 emails asking for help to resolution on the problems I'm having. It's now been 5 days with no reply and they dont have a number to call for help at all. I'm not looking for a new app. I used to tell everyone about how great this app was.

title: OfficeSuite - Free Office, PDF, Word,Sheets,Slides
description:
OfficeSuite lets you easily view, edit, and create Word, Excel, and PowerPoint documents, and perform advanced PDF operations. Our integrated file manager, Chat client with document exchanging capabilities and a multitude of other handy tools, make this the most feature-rich mobile office solution available on Android.

‚Ä¢The most downloaded office app on Google Play
‚Ä¢Delivers the most exclusive features over any other office app
‚Ä¢Installed on 200 million devices in 195 countries and counting

KEY FEATURES:
‚Ä¢View, create and edit complex office documents using a familiar desktop-style interface
‚Ä¢Full compatibility with Microsoft formats including DOC, DOCX, DOCM, XLS, XLSX, XLSM, PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX, PPTM, PPSM
‚Ä¢Support for PDF files including PDF camera scanning, Export to PDF and Fillable forms
‚Ä¢Additional support for common formats like RTF, TXT, LOG, CSV, EML, ZIP; (Open Office - ODT, ODS and ODP - support available as in-app purchase)
‚Ä¢Integrated with File Commander for advanced synchronization and quick and easy access to both local and remote files
‚Ä¢NEW! MobiSystems Drive - you can now store up to 5.0 GB of documents in the cloud and share links to stored files
‚Ä¢NEW! OfficeSuite Chats ‚Äì Chat and exchange documents with your friends and colleagues
‚Ä¢Integrated spell checker -  Available in more than 40 languages the spell checker guarantees that your work in Documents, Slides and Sheets is impeccably written 
‚Ä¢Sharing via cloud services like MobiSystems Drive, Box, DropBox, Google Drive, OneDrive, as well as over email and Bluetooth
‚Ä¢PDF security and editing features including digital signatures support, permissions management, text to PDF, and annotations
‚Ä¢Text-to-Speech support for documents and PDFs
‚Ä¢View documents the way they're meant to be seen with the Extended, Japanese and Extended & Japanese Font Packs (available as in-app purchases)
‚Ä¢Create a profile and sync your settings across all your Android, iOS and Windows Desktop (OfficeSuite Personal license) devices
‚Ä¢Available in 68 languages

THE LATEST OFFICESUITE IS SPECIALLY DESIGNED AROUND ANDROID Q AND ALSO INCLUDES:
‚Ä¢NEW! With OfficeSuite Chats you can easily send documents, collaborate with colleagues or simply chat with your friends on the go
‚Ä¢NEW! OfficeSuite now supports a beautiful Dark Theme (Android 7 and up)
‚Ä¢Convert and open files created with Apple Pages, Numbers, or Keynote apps
‚Ä¢Open multiple documents and work on two documents simultaneously using split-screen mode with drag-and-drop support (Android 7 and up)
‚Ä¢Open documents or create new ones faster than ever with the new Quick access notification drawer
‚Ä¢With the enhanced mouse support for Chromebooks users can now work faster and easier than ever
‚Ä¢Choose between beautiful new themes to create great presentations
‚Ä¢Protect individual sheets and cells in Spreadsheets for extra security
‚Ä¢Present or display on Chromecast enabled devices (if supported)
‚Ä¢Use Quick Sign to easily sign a PDF using your digital signature

ALSO AVAILABLE AS PART OF OFFICESUITE PREMIUM:
‚Ä¢Security features - work with password protected files
‚Ä¢50GB of storage on MobiSystems Drive
‚Ä¢Export PDFs to Word, Excel, or ePub and convert any file to PDF
‚Ä¢Track changes with multiple authors support
‚Ä¢Cross-platform license for Windows, iOS and Android (OfficeSuite Personal license)

OfficeSuite granted permissions- http://www.mobisystems.com/android_office/full-features.html#permissions

comments: I see that they don't really come on here and check or troubleshoot, so I'll keep it brief. I got this application, and paid for the subscription, because I do a lot of documentation on my tablet for work and grad school. I cannot count the amount of documents that have been corrupted and deleted in the middle of editing w/ NO recovery. When opening the documents in Microsoft word, they're often not formatted properly and have to be redone. Very frustrated and will not renew my subscription.

It says * OfficeSuite - Free, Office, PDF, Word, Sheets, Slides & etc *. It's not free at all, You must pay extra to open it. Now i using other applications; Google LLC & Microsoft Corporation way better than this app. And most it doesn't have any Pop-up Ads. i recommend using this app Google LLC & Microsoft Corporation.

Unfortunately another dishonest application described as FREE, but that's a misnomer. Let's be clear, I have no problem with paying for a functioning application, but to date all this one has allowed is the installation of an advertising model. It has not been possible to create even one document for testing. A waste of time.

I could not be happierüòÅ! Microsoft Office is not compatible with my Samsung Notepad. I purchased a MS Office license without being advised it did not work on a Android platform. MS documents work seamlessly. This application is comparable to Office in all ways. I have not found any discernable differences between MS Office and OfficeSuite. I was a Beta user for MS Office back in the Dark ages when I was using a 3-button mouse.

Description says that the free version will be able to open "apple.pages" on android.. NOT THE CASE! It requests that you pay for the pro version. I only need to read a document! You have cost a charity a lot of time and effort with this blunder. At least change your description. Falsely advertised.

comments: It was simple. I took a picture of what needed to be faxed and they give you one free credit. I dont fax ever, but I had to today and it was so fast easy and convenient I didnt have to leave my house. It showed it was faxed complete. I will keep this app downloaded and purchase credits if I have to fax something again. Its amazing we can fax from our phones now. Love this app

I bought $20 worth of credits with my google account. I had to reset my phone and download all my apps again. All my subscriptions, purchases and credits were still available on my other apps except for this one. I only used my credits twice, I've contacted CS and haven't heard back at all. This is ridiculous.

Frustrating & Expensive!!! Continuously timed out after slowly loading each individual page/photo (10 total). No option to pay per page, cheapest package option $9.00. After trying twice and finding out how pricy to hey are I went with SnapFax, it only cost $4.00! Don't waist your time or money with this app!

I took a picture of what needed to be faxed and they give you one free credit. I dont fax ever, but I had to today and it was so fast easy and convenient I didnt have to leave my house. It showed it was faxed complete. I will keep this app downloaded and purchase credits if I have to fax something again. Its amazing we can fax from our phones now. Love this app!!! Thank's

Wow, soooo easy to use! Downloaded app, set up account, scanned item, entered phone # and pressed "go" and off it went. Msg popped up: connected to server, then msg: sending fax / wheel going round & round. Then msg: Succesful, with info. Took 5 minutes from download to end. I am REALLY impressed! Thank you Top Fax

title: Invoice 2go - Professional Business Invoice Maker
description:
Invoice 2go makes it easy for small business owners to create professional invoices & estimates on the go while getting paid faster.

Make invoices and estimates on the go to get paid faster using one simple app. Send bills and accept your clients favorite online payments on all invoices sent. Small business owners and freelancers can capture expenses and send receipts to make sure every invoice gets paid.

Get estimates for your project and share them with clients. Billing is simple with the bill organizer, tracker and reminder. Track expenses and turn your estimates into an invoice when the job is done.

Invoice 2go is the on-the-go invoice and estimate solution for all types of small businesses: from contractors to dog walkers, web designers to musicians. Invoices, contractor estimates, clients and all your information is automatically synced and available on your Android phone, tablet and computer so you can send invoices and estimates with peace of mind.

Invoice 2go has been the #1 invoice & estimate app for 10+ years and counting.
Small business accounting, contractors and businesses of all sizes choose Invoice 2go ‚Äì here‚Äôs why:

Professional Invoice Maker
* Easy invoice making - choose from multiple professional invoice & estimate templates.
* Small business branding - upload your logo or create one using our custom logo designer.
* Invoices that showcase your awards and honors - include additional images on your invoice or estimate to elevate your look and win more business.

Invoice With Ease
* Invoice or estimate can be created and sent in 1 minute or less.
* Invoice without any technical training - if you can send an email, you can use Invoice 2go and send invoices & estimates intuitively.
* Edit invoices and review before you send.
* Set up weekly, bi-weekly or monthly invoices for repeat business and we‚Äôll remind you when they are ready.

Estimate Maker
* Create estimates and track expenses.
* Review estimates and send them quickly.
* Convert an estimate into an invoice in one click.

Get paid faster
* Send invoices or estimates on the spot. Improve your turnaround time and save yourself the paperwork.
* Send bills and clients can pay your invoices using American Express, Visa, Mastercard, Discover, and PayPal.
* Invoice tracker - keep an eye on overdue invoices and send automatic payment reminders.

Business Expense Tracker
* Track business expenses - simply snap a photo of your receipt to safely store and claim business expenses.
* Save invoices for the next time - add expenses directly to your invoice and save recurring expenses for future use.
* Organize expenses and print expense reports with one tap.

Bill Organizer
* Bill tracker - see when customers have viewed your invoices and who still needs to make a payment.
* Bill organizer - schedule appointments and organize your day.
* Time tracking.
* Reports on estimates, invoices, expenses and more.
* Clients information all in one statement - just select a client and we‚Äôll take care of the rest.


Download our free invoice and estimate app today. You can try the Invoice 2go Pro Plan for 14 days free before choosing the plan that best suits your business.
-----

READ_CONTACTS: To import client information from user's phone contact list to populate client data.

WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: These permissions are needed to create a backup of data and app data is restored from backup.

GET_ACCOUNTS: Our app allows users to switch between companies associated with different emails. We fetch list of company accounts from account list.

SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW: Customer Support through live chat SDK requires this permission to display user alerts.

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. Invoice 2go doesn't run GPS in the background unless you give us permission.

comments: Edit- I have contacted you, many times, spent hours on live chat. Haven't had a reply since January when you said you the developers were trying to resolve the issues Yes I do have them turned off, another feature of your app that I pay for that doesn't work and I have to do manually. Cannot send invoices via sms at all now either.
I down graded my subscription but I already have to many clients saved so won't even let me do one invoice. Money for nothing can't even use. This app is now useless. I want my money back.

This is one of the shittiest invoice apps I have ever used. Two and a half years ago, it was great. Since these bozos updated it, it runs slow, and I mean real slow, and you have to hit about 40 buttons to do what used to take one or two actions. Now that the app has recently updated, it has got even worse. It really does suck more and more with every single update. Even with a Wi-Fi connection, as you begin to search for the client's name and the program is thinking, it starts erasing letters.

It works but , I paid for a basic service as don't need more but to many push msg to buy full version Can't clear history so when I inputting same expense ,have to change manually every time cos price has changed If I make mistake at first line, I can't change it once it's been saved, so have to delete everything and write again ? You should do better

Cannot log in at all, can't contact support directly. I need to get into the app to check an invoice and send a new one. One device I have been logged out of and password won't work. The other device it just "thinks" and looks like it is logging in, but left for a while will not log in. Both apps are up to date. No way to contact support directly, I just get sent to a "FQA" type page, and that suggested problem solves (check password/ make sure app is up date) are not helpful.

title: Fax App: Send fax from phone, receive fax document
description:
‚òÖ HIPAA-compliance ensures the security of your data.
‚òÖ Sign documents, fill forms, scan & fax documents from your phone. You will never have to look for a fax machine again with our fax app!
‚òÖ Cloud storage platforms supported! Google Drive, Dropbox, Box are fully integrated.
‚òÖ Free unlimited outgoing fax! 
‚òÖ Free incoming fax number! Get your own local or toll-free inbound fax number in the US, Canada, UK & many other countries with a FREE 7 day trial. Trial is valid for US numbers only.
‚òÖ No account, personal or business details required to send fax & receive fax.

Fax is a go-to solution for effortless, lightning-fast online fax app that‚Äôs reliable, secure & at an incredibly low cost. You can scan and fax as easily you would send an email. No signup is necessary. With enterprise grade fax technology & a rich suite of online features like document scanner, you don‚Äôt need to find an office fax machine to send or receive efax. Simply download Fax, scan and fax simply.

As one of the best efax apps, Fax provides a great mobile faxing experience for businesses & individuals alike.

BENEFITS
‚òÖ Pay-per-fax or buy credits or get a monthly subscription plan for extra discounts on outgoing fax
‚òÖ Refer friends & send free fax app
‚òÖ Select a free fax number for 7 days (available in US only)

GENERAL FEATURES
‚óè Document scanner & Photo Integration - You can fax images, fax photos, fax document & fax files easily with Fax app. Use inbuilt tools to brighten backgrounds & darken text/foregrounds. Email, documents, PDF & other file formats are supported in the app.

‚óè Inbound Faxing App - Get your own fax number to receive fax in the United States (Local or Toll-Free), Canada, UK (Local or Toll-Free), Australia, Germany, Italy, Spain, Israel & Turkey. Download Fax app & document scanner.

‚óè Send & Receive Faxes - Easy faxing procedure with Fax app. Upload files easily from your phone, email or cloud storage to fax images, fax photo, fax documents & you can fax internationally at ease. Get a fax number to receive fax through this genius fax app.

‚óè Cross Platform usage: Fax not only supports android devices but you can also receive & send fax free from iPhone. Just log into your iPhone, mac or windows device with same account. Enjoy the best document scanner & send faxing experience.

‚óè Cloud Integration - Google Drive, Dropbox & Box are fully integrated. 

‚óè Notifications & Fax confirmations - Real-time fax plus notifications & status updates so you can keep track of your faxes on iPhone & android.

‚óè Professional, customizable cover page template In App - Customizable templates to send fax. Add your company logo on the cover page, scan & fax on the go!

‚óè HIPAA Compliant - All the guidelines from HIPAA are duly complied with.

FAX COSTS
Cost of outgoing fax is determined by the no. of outbound pages (in 5page increments) & destination. Nevertheless, the charges of sending fax through Fax app is much cheaper when compared to fax machines. You can purchase fax credits or subscribe to outbound subscription plan to send outbound fax at heavily discounted prices. Pay with Google Wallet or Paypal.

For more details on costs & credits on outbound fax, please see the Price section inside the app.

Fax is an easy-to-use free scan & fax app that be can be used from the convenience of your phone. Once you go digital with Fax app, you can fax image, fax doc, fax PDF files easily. Get rid of the bulky office fax machine & send fax easily from iPhone & android now!.

Get Fax app now & start faxing today.

comments: I too felt like writing something like the other day I realized the importance of this fax app. I was traveling and had to fax something or else could have lost business. Someone introduced me to the app. I downloaded and used it. I am grateful to this app as I bagged the contract.

You dont wanna use a fax machine when you start using this app as it can scan, sign documents, supports other file formats, has customizable templates and real-time fax plus a notification facility to keep track of your important faxes through I phone or android device.
Earlier I had to plan and go out as often the fax machine at the PCO booth would be busy due to the bulk work they do. Now, I can do my work sitting in my home. Really amazing app.

This app is a scam. I want to send one document on the free trial, but they're trying to make me activate the subscription twice, which will incur an automatic $170 subscription charge. I read the review another user left about his issue with the app, and I'm entirely sure that this is intentional to make people think they're getting a free trial while instead racking up hundreds of dollars in fees for a service people otherwise wouldn't use often.

You dont wanna use a fax machine when you start using this app as it can scan, sign documents, supports other file formats, has customizable templates and real-time fax plus a notification facility to keep track of your important faxes through I phone or android device.

title: PDF Extra - Scan, Edit, View, Fill, Sign, Convert
description:
Get all the PDF features you need in a single app! The professional PDF editor allows you to edit, view, annotate and print PDF files on the go.

Start working right away with these PDF Extra features:

View and Comment
Make comments on PDFs using sticky notes and drawing tools. Highlight and markup text with the annotation tools.

Scan to PDFs
Scan and digitize your paper documents into editable files with ease. Create one-page PDFs or scan a dozen in a single file using the auto batch option.

Fill and Sign
Fill out and sign PDF forms on the go, directly from your mobile device. Advanced support for fillable PDF forms allows you make all the changes you need and to sign documents with your saved digital signature or by simply drawing the signature on the document.

Read a nice eBook
Cozy up and read a nice eBook by using the Dark mode or even have it read out to you like a bedtime story via the Text to Speech feature.

Export to JPEG
A picture tells a thousand words. Use the free JPEG converter to quickly turn a PDF into an image file.

Print PDFs
Printing documents is easy and intuitive. Entire documents or just specific pages, the choice is yours.

Turn images to PDF
Select an image from your Gallery or use the ‚ÄúShare to PDF Extra‚Äù feature to turn images from other apps to PDF files.

Protect PDFs
Protect your sensitive documents with passwords to lock, encrypt and restrict the access to them. Work with advanced PDF certificates to validate their authenticity.

Integrated File Manager
Manage your local and remote documents with ease. Quickly locate your PDFs in the device`s ‚ÄúMy Documents‚Äù folder, browse your local storage, or access and sync your documents on the cloud.

The following features are unlocked via In-App Purchase. Get them to make the most of your time with PDF Extra. 

‚ôïEdit PDF files
Edit PDFs with the most advanced mobile editor available. Feel free to change any document aspect you want - text, pictures, signatures, certificates and more.
‚ôïConvert PDFs
Convert PDFs to Word, Excel or ePub while keeping the original layout and formatting. Save Word, Excel and ePub files as PDFs and share them with ease.
‚ôïOrganize pages in PDFs
View and organize pages in PDFs ‚Äì Enjoy full control of your PDF‚Äôs structure. Rotate, delete and rearrange pages to create a perfectly organized PDF file.


Going somewhere? Log into your account and receive:
5GB of free cloud storage on MobiSystems Drive just by signing in. Not enough? Get 50GB by upgrading to PDF Extra Premium.

Hi Team, I am writing this with a very big heart. One of my friend installed this app in my phone and entered credit card details without my approval. This is totally FRAUD. Kindly return back my money am requesting you.

App makes it seem as though you can edit your PDF files for "free", but you cannot. You have to buy the premium version. I will uninstall immediately, as this should have been made clear from the beginning.

Works okay but Dont bother installing if you are only wanting to test it out because it didnt have the option to cancel subscription. Emailed several times and lodged enquiry online - no reply to date. I wouldnt recommend at all.

title: Vault - Hide Pics & Videos, App Lock, Free Backup
description:
Vault is a mobile app designed to hide private photos, videos on your phone. Currently there are more than 100 million users worldwide using Vault to protect their mobile privacy while enjoying App Lock, Private Bookmark, Incognito Browser, Cloud Backup and many other helpful features for completely free! Join them now!

Top Features

‚òÜ Hide and Protect Photos & videos:  Photos and videos imported into phone can only be viewed or played after the correct password is entered. These photos and videos can also be backed up to Cloud Space for better protection.

‚òÜCall Reminder: Whenever there is an incoming call, you can search for the phone number through the inquiry box.

‚òÜ App Lock (Privacy Protection): Use App Lock to protect your social, photo, call logs and telephone apps to prevent privacy leak.

‚òÜ Private Browser: With Private browser, your internet surf will leave no traces behind. There is also Private Bookmark feature.

‚òÜ Cloud Backup: Back up your photos and videos to Cloud so they never get lost.

‚òÜ Data Transfer:With Cloud Backup feature, you could easily transfer your data to a new phone by cross-device synchronization.

‚òÜ Password recovery:  Worried about forgetting your password? Set a security email in Vault so you can retrieve it.

Advanced Features

‚ñ∫ Multiple Vault & Fake Vault
Create multiple vaults with different passwords for storing photos, videos respectively. And one of them can be a fake vault.

‚ñ∫ Stealth Mode
Make Vault icon disappear from your home screen and it can only be found again with the correct password, so no one knows it exists.

‚ñ∫ Break-in Alerts
Secretly snaps a picture of any one who attempts to access with a wrong password. Vault captures a photo, the time stamp and PIN code entered by all intruders.

Support:

‚ñ∫ Q&A: 

1. What if I forgot my password? 

If you have a security Email set up before, you should be able to see a "Forgot Password" en-trance once you input the wrong password. Tap on the entrance and follow the instructions to reset your password. 

If you do not have a security Email but you had backed up your data to cloud space, then the data can be recovered from the cloud by reinstalling Vault app.


2. How do I enter vault in stealth modeÔºü


1. Put Vault back to the phone‚Äôs home screen by adding Vault widget, once it appears on home screen, tap on it, and then input your password to enter, or, 

2. Download "NQ calculator" in Google Play, open it, and input correct password then tap "=". 


3. Why are my photos/videos lost? 

Some cleaning or free storage apps may automatically delete Vault‚Äôs data folder used to store pictures and videos. So, as a best practice, please do not choose to delete Vault‚Äôs data folder and subfolders (mnt/sdcard/SystemAndroid) when you use such apps. 

You can also backup your pictures and videos to cloud by using "Cloud Backup" feature in the premium page of Vault.


‚ñ∫ Facebook Page & Messager: 
Vault ‚Äì hide pics&videos, sms, lock app @nqvaultapp

This app uses the Device Administrator permission.

3. Why are my photos/videos lost?

Some cleaning or free storage apps may automatically delete Vault‚Äôs data folder used to store pictures and videos. So, as a best practice, please do not choose to delete Vault‚Äôs data folder and subfolders (mnt/sdcard/SystemAndroid) when you use such apps.

You can also backup your pictures and videos to cloud by using "Cloud Backup" feature in the premium page of Vault.


‚ñ∫ Facebook Page & Messager:
Vault ‚Äì hide pics&videos, sms, lock app @nqvaultapp

This app uses the Device Administrator permission.

title: Scanner App for Me: Scan Documents to PDF
description:
Overwhelmed with papers? Make your life easier - go paperless at home or at the office with this lightweight scanner app for your Android!  Scanner for Me is a handy all-in-one app that turns your device into a multifunctional office tool. Scan, edit, organize, print and share your docs in a tap! 

Using only your Android device you can instantly scan to PDF and print any written, printed or graphic material, including: 
- Contracts for your partners or clients;
- Business cards;
- Receipts to track your expenses;
- Paper notes and mindmaps to save the best ideas for future reference;
- Book pages and articles for further reading and analysis;
- Texts that don't offer a digital copy;
Or play with the multiple editing options and filters to use the app as a full-fledged photo scanner.

This smart PDF-scanner helps you manage your documents easily:

SCAN any written, printed or graphic material with camera or add snaps from camera roll. You can even merge multi-page agreements and books into one file.The scanner app detects page edges automatically and makes perfect scans in seconds.
EDIT perspective and borders, adjust scanner brightness, rotate pages, apply filters or correct capture area borders if needed. 
PRINT scanned papers, as well as the text from Clipboard, attached to emails files and webpages.
STORE all files directly in the scanner app, sort them by folders and find in seconds when needed. Or, easily upload to your cloud storage (Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, etc.)
SHARE each file separately or send a number of files in one document via Mail and any other 3rd party applications. Or simply export them to Photos.


‚ôï Scan like a PRO using the PREMIUM app features ‚ôï
CONVERT your scans into editable and searchable text that can be extracted and copy-pasted. Optical Character Recognition (OCR) makes it possible.
SIGN documents easily on the screen of your device. With this PDF-scanner you can create and save an electronic signature to promptly add it to your scans.
HIGHLIGHT the key points of your scans to glean the main idea at a glance. 
PRINT & SHARE without limits and ads!

Scanning papers and pictures to pdf has never been easier. Take full advantage of this mobile scanner app to simplify the mess of papers!

title: SignEasy | Sign and Fill PDF and other Documents
description:
SignEasy is the simplest and fastest way to sign documents or getting documents signed from your Android phone and tablet. Trusted and loved by over 6 million users.

‚Ä¢ Featured among the Best of 2016 apps on Google Play.
‚Ä¢ Among the top 3 eSignature solutions for SMBs, Mid-Market & Enterprise companies on G2 Crowd

Get started for FREE with your first 3 documents and

‚Ä¢ Sign, fill and send any document format - PDF, Word, Excel, Text, Pages, JPG, PNG etc.
‚Ä¢ Send documents to others for signing
‚Ä¢ Simplify document signing for your customers by adding fields to the document.
‚Ä¢ Seamlessly sign documents from Email, Dropbox, Box, OneDrive, Evernote and Google Drive
‚Ä¢ Sign documents right within 100+ other apps
‚Ä¢ Access all documents in one place by using your SignEasy account from your Android phone, tablet or Web


SignEasy is perfect to sign and fill documents such as NDAs, Tax forms, Real estate contracts, Lease agreements, Invoices, Purchase orders, Financial agreements, Job offers, Permission slips and Work orders.


KEY FEATURES (including both free and paid features)

‚Ä¢ Self-signing, In-person signing and Remote signing
‚Ä¢ Sign documents yourself, with finger or stylus
‚Ä¢ Collect signatures in person from customers
‚Ä¢ Send documents for signature to colleagues, customers, partners
‚Ä¢ Simplify document signing for your customers by adding fields to the document such as signature, initials, text, date, checkbox.
‚Ä¢ Track document status, receive signature notifications and send reminders.
‚Ä¢ Add a cc recipient as a part of the workflow ‚Äì enabling them to receive a copy of the final signed document.
‚Ä¢ Enable signers to sign documents one by one in a specified order (Sequential Workflow) or all at once (Parallel Workflow).
‚Ä¢ Use Freestyle feature to allow unlimited signers on a document
‚Ä¢ Offline Signing: Fill paperwork even when you are disconnected from the internet
‚Ä¢ Add date, text, checkboxes, logos, images and more
‚Ä¢ Save signature and initials for reuse
‚Ä¢ Save in-progress documents as drafts
‚Ä¢ Set frequently used information as Custom Fields

Works with email and your favourite apps
‚Ä¢ Connect with popular cloud services like Google Drive, Dropbox, Box, Evernote to easily import and save files
‚Ä¢ Import files from other apps using ‚ÄúOpen In‚Äù functionality

LEGALLY BINDING AND SECURE
‚Ä¢ Full audit-trail for legal evidence, including signer email ID, device IP, signature timestamp and more
‚Ä¢ Compliant with the ESIGN Act and eIDAS and recognized globally
‚Ä¢ Documents sent and stored using SSL encryption
‚Ä¢ Extra protection with passcode and fingerprint to prevent unauthorized access

FREE AND PAID PLANS

Sign up and sign the first 3 documents for free. Refer to sign more documents.

‚Ä¢ The SignEasy subscriptions start at $9.99/month, with annual and monthly billing options, and let you sign unlimited documents, send documents for signature, add document fields, collect signatures in-person among other benefits.

‚Ä¢ In select countries, you can also purchase the Pay As You Go plan for 10 document credits for $4.99 - use the document credits whenever you want.


Subscriptions are charged to Google Play at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24h before the end of the current period. The account will be charged for renewal within 24h prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's account settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription during the active period.

Access to external storage is used to save and edit documents to sign. Use of your account list is needed to simplify the signup process by pre-filling your email ID. Access to your contacts is requested when sending documents to remote parties for signature.

For questions, feedback, bugs: support@signeasy.com

Learn more: https://signeasy.com/

title: Tiny Scanner Pro: PDF Doc Scan
description:
Tiny Scanner Pro - The little app that scans everything

* Scan documents, photos, receipts, or just about anything
* Lightning fast and gorgeously designed for both phone and tablet

IS THAT A SCANNER IN YOUR POCKET?

Tiny Scanner turns your device into a pdf portable scanner. Scans are saved to your phone as images or PDFs. Name and organize your scans into folders, or share them by:

- Email
- Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, OneDrive, or Box
- Wifi directly to your computer

Tiny Scanner has all the BIG features you need: 

* Scan in color, grayscale, or black & white
* Page edges are detected automagically
* 5 levels of contrast for crisp monochrome texts
* Set page sizes for PDF (Letter, Legal, A4, and more)
* Thumbnail or list view, sort scans by date or title
* Quick search by document title
* Protect your documents with a passcode
* Universal ‚Äì a single app that works on phone and tablet too!

GOT QUESTIONS? CAN'T FIGURE OUT HOW TO DO SOMETHING?
Please email us at tinyscan.a@appxy.com, and we‚Äôll help you figure it out.

Permissions Overview:
1. Storage: Tiny Scanner needs this permission to read photos from Gallery and store docs in your phone.
2. Camera: Tiny Scanner needs this permission to use camera to scan docs.

Follow us on Twitter: @Appxy_official
Like us on Facebook: Appxy
Follow us on Google+: Appxy

comments: It's a nice app that's worth the purchase of the pro version. I haven't even got to use all the full functions yet because it covers all of my basic needs. I've needed an scanning app to store important documents that I shred, and now I'm also starting to use it for storing receipts as well. It's a versatile way of keeping your documents organized with good export features.

Free version is more then enough to use this app to scan in homework assignments documents etc. Simply take a photo and then adjust the image to pull only the portions of the image to create a PDF. From there adjust brightness to final PDF. Choose method of transfer ie email. Pro version allows multiple projects and additional method of transfer I choose to support the app not for the features but because the quality is worth supporting.

Useful tool, I've been using this app for a while and it was super handy to generate pdf files (mainly made out of marked up pictures) on the go to be emailed to relevant people which saved me a lot of time and I was able to attach much more pictures than doing it other way by attaching it individually to the email and being only half way in seeing a message that it's already over 25mb limit... Anyway - this was a brief description for one of many good uses for this app. Thumbs up Dev team!

Does exactly what I need! Many college classes want me to send in a photo of hardcopy my work as a pdf. This app takes the picture of your paper and perfectly converts it into an easy to read pdf that your professors will be grateful for! The free version did everything I needed but I decided to buy the pro as it could directly upload to Google Drive among others. A great app I highly recommend!

This app is great except for a critical flaw: it can't do landscape docs. I scanned 19 pages, flipping each one, just to find they all got cropped and centered in larger portrait pages. What's so hard about scanning a landscape document? Those are not a rare thing.

title: Wellsite Navigator
description:
Wellsite Navigator is the most trusted oilfield navigation app with over 63,000 users across 22 states. Enabling oilfield professionals to easily search, map and navigate to well sites in the United States since 2012. 

Covered states include Texas, New Mexico, North Dakota, Alabama, Arkansas, Kentucky, California, Colorado, Illinois, Kansas, Louisiana, Mississippi, Montana, Nebraska, Nevada, Oklahoma, Pennsylvania, South Dakota, Utah, Wyoming, West Virginia and Ohio.

Wellsite Navigator now includes an Oil & Gas well layer, an SWD layer and a Rig layer.

comments: I used this app the Last couple of years and this update messed everything up. Before I didn't have to use my data to find a location and now with this update I have to use my data. It is frustrating that it keeps freezing up on me. It is disappointing that the developer didn't tested out before launching it and fixing the bugs and having us use our data to find a location.

The new app rollout was confusing. They should have automatically merged existing accounts and not having to create new logins or at least walked us through the process. Also the way it was presented it seemed like even as a previous paid user I would have to start a subscription to use the app. (which I found isn't required) Anyway after the dust has settled and the kinks are being worked out and I'm getting used to it, I actually think it's great! Thank you!

Paid for the ultimate app and update subscription that I wasn't credited back to me and they said they discontinued it. This app needs internet to use now, if the well name is too long it won't let you see the full name when on the map, there's a bug when downloading the swd layers, the map doesn't save your wells unless you favorite them. I emailed them and they gave me a code which worked but didn't give me the discount price which I now have to pay monthly.

I was extremely upset that the new app wanted me to subscribe when I had already paid for the earlier version. I sent a pretty heated email to the development team who responded right away and kindly explained to me that as a legacy user I could access all the data I previously had and how to do so. I figure the least I could do was delete my bad review and replace it with this one. Thanks guys! Your app makes life so much easier out here!

Terrible. The app worked great before this update. I bought the app three years ago and was very satisfied with it. I subscribed again to this new updated version and after multiple attempts, I finally got the maps to download. However, there are no wells appearing on my map. Maybe it's the always hidden version.

title: Tiny Scanner - PDF Scanner App
description:
Tiny Scanner is a little scanner app that turns android device into a portable document scanner and scan everything as images or PDFs.

With this pdf document scanner app you can scan documents, photos, receipts, reports, or just about anything. This pdf document scanner app is lightning fast and gorgeously designed for both phone and tablet.

IS THAT A SCANNER IN YOUR POCKET?

Tiny Scanner is a pdf document scanner app that turns your mobile into a portable scanner. Scans are saved to your device as images or PDFs. Name and organize your scans into folders, or share them by:

- Email
- Wifi directly to your computer
- Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, OneDrive or Box(Available in pro version)

This document scanner app has all the BIG features you need:

* Scan in color, grayscale, or black & white
* Can be used in office, school, home and anywhere else you want
* Page edges are detected automatically
* 5 levels of contrast for crisp monochrome texts
* Set page sizes for PDF (Letter, Legal, A4, and more)
* Thumbnail or list view, sort scans by date or title
* Tiny Scanner is optimized to run very fast.
* Quick search by document title
* Protect your documents with a passcode
* Universal ‚Äì a single app that works on phone and tablet too!

The free version is an ad-supported version and has some function restrictions, we also offer an ad-free version which is available as in-app purchase or the individual pro version.

comments: I scanned a few documents to try it out. Then it gives you the option to send them through email but when you click send it goes to the motions that the email was sent. It's like they want you to pay the $5 or it takes your documents hostage and won't let you do anything with them. Screw this app, just a waste of time. Why would you pay for an app that you don't know the quality of the scanned documents or if it works at all.

I just have a try and now I've fallen love with it. It is absolutely EXCELLENT! There's a great feature that you can easily modify the gray scale just after taking the photo. I haven't seen other apps can do this such easily. Also, you can use all the core features without purchasing a pro, ads-free! Although you can't save the results to some three-party apps with a free version, but you can simply save it to your phone! Great app! But I will still buy the pro, just wanna support it.

There are lots of options, so there's bound to be one that fits what you need. The UI is simple and ready-to-use, with a very low learning curve. It is a little frustrating to see a few options blocked behind a paywall, but they're really just quality of life functions, and the developers have to earn money somehow. It's just a really good application.

What a huge joke this app, I mean AD is! I downloaded it today, tried it out on a couple papers I need. That was only a few hours ago. I just tried to use it but all I get is a box asking if I want to buy it from within the app, Or if I want to download the pro version. This explains the complaints of paying and then told they don't have pro version. Just a money scam don't pay for pro!

Pro app doesn''t work as advertised. In order to do multiple pages, I had to upgrade to the pro version. When I did, however, both the quality of the scan with the multi-page selection was lower in the ability to actually add a second page didn't seem to be available in the app. So far, I have heard nothing from technical support, so 1 star. I'd rate it more lowly, given that they have essentially taken my money for no good reason, but that's not an option.

title: Tiny Fax - Send Fax from Phone
description:
Tiny Fax turns your phone into a fax machine for documents, photos, receipts and other texts. With Tiny Fax, you can fax them anywhere.

Tiny Fax is extremely easy to use. The interface is simple and very convenient to manage your faxes.

Features:
- Fax documents from mail and other apps.
- Fax documents from Dropbox, Google Drive, Box and One Driver.
- Fax images from Gallery or using camera.
- Provide international fax numbers and list of countries.
- Archive documents by status, easy to manage.

Cost:
Each fax page costs between $0.25 and $0.85 depending on how many credits you buy at once.
Faxes to the USA and Canada are 10 credits per page. The others are 15 credits per page.

Download and start to use Tiny Fax to make your life easier. Please write to us before leaving negative reviews, as we can often help with your problem or help you better use the app.

Permissions Used in Tiny Fax
1. Storage: Tiny Fax needs this permission to store files in your phone.
2. Camera: Tiny Fax needs this permission to use camera to scan docs.
3. Contacts: Tiny Fax needs this permission to read contacts when you choose to send someone a fax. And to bind your credits with your Google account Tiny Fax needs this permission to read your Google account.

If you have any problem or suggestions please send a mail to tinyfax.a@appxy.com, and you will get the response and solution in a short time.
