recentChanges:
Thanks for using Tiny Fax. With this update we've fixed the issue that failed to send faxes due to api credentials.

If you have any problems or suggestions please feel free to contact us at tinyfax.a@appxy.com.
comments: I have been stressing sending a fax for something important that I needed done asap. I went to Staples to send an 11 page doc. Because I was sending it to another state, they considered it long distance and wanted to charge me $2.50 a PAGE. A friend told me about this app, I downloaded it, and sent it for $5. Super happy! So glad this technology exists!

I'm happy! It went through the first time. No problems. I do wish though when apps claim that they are "free", that they don't mean the app itself? But that actually using it is free also. I really don't like opening a free app and finding out it costs 10¬¢ a page -which isn't much) but there is a minimum fee off $5 or $10. In the brick and mortar world this is called 'bait and switch" and it is a fraudulent business practice. When will the internet catch up?

Nice app, let me do everything I needed step by step, and I've never sent a fax before. I missed the part where you need to buy credits to send faxes, but I have a bunch of Google Play credits saved up from the Google Opinions Rewards app (seriously, if you're not using that app, you're missing out) and what the hell, I'll pay for convenience here.
Great for faxing, it does what it says. Price isn't too bad. Overall really good app.

It is unfortunate that I have something to comment on. I installed tiny scanner and use it all the time so I figured tiny fax would be just as great. Nope. I paid for credits, tried to fax my docs several times and they never went through. I emailed the company to see what was going on. They did respond and said they'd fix it ASAP and then asked me if I have android 10. I do and emailed back with that information and never from them again. Now they have my money and I have no service.

title: File Commander - File Manager & Free Cloud
description:
ÔªøFile Commander is a powerful file manager that allows you to handle any file on your Android device, cloud storage or network location via a clean and intuitive interface. Fully optimized for Android P, File Commander is loaded with features - Vault security, Recycle Bin, Storage Analyzer, File Converter & also receive 5GB Free storage on MobiSystems Drive.

ACCESS & MANAGE FILES 
‚Ä¢	Find files easily from the fully-customizable Home screen with quick access tiles
‚Ä¢	Categories for your Music, Picture, and Video files, along with sections for Archives, Documents, and more
‚Ä¢	Integrated Audio & Video players
‚Ä¢	Support for the most popular cloud services: Google Drive, DropBox, Box & Microsoft OneDrive
‚Ä¢	Recycle Bin* allows you to restore & manage deleted files
‚Ä¢	Easily manage external storage such as microSD cards and USB OTG drives (if supported)
‚Ä¢	Access to hidden files and folders* ‚Äì see system protected data
‚Ä¢	Quickly pick up where you left off using the Recent files feature
‚Ä¢	PC File Transfer ‚Äì manage & transfer your files and folders directly from your PC
‚Ä¢	Add files to archives to save space and data
‚Ä¢	Bookmark* favorite files & folders for faster access
‚Ä¢	Link up with nearby devices via Bluetooth
‚Ä¢	Login profile can save your app settings and personalizations across devices 
‚Ä¢	Access Windows/SMB based local network locations, FTP/FTPS servers & Remote shares (for Sony Xperia devices)

MOBISYSTEMS DRIVE
‚Ä¢	Get 5GB of FREE storage (or up to 50GB for Premium) to safely store your files
‚Ä¢	Share any files & folders without limitations
‚Ä¢	Available Offline ‚Äì Convenient access to selected MobiSystems Drive files even without an internet or data connection

STORAGE ANALYZER
‚Ä¢	The Storage Analyzer* shows detailed information on what takes up space 
‚Ä¢	Provides suggestions on what can be deleted or moved to free up storage
‚Ä¢	Analyzes internal and external storage locations

 VAULT
‚Ä¢	File Commander‚Äôs Vault allows you to protect your sensitive data
‚Ä¢	Select desired files & folders and secure them from prying eyes
‚Ä¢	Strong password encryption ensures no one can access your files but you

CONVERT FILES 
‚Ä¢	File Commander incorporates a file conversion** service which allows you to convert from more than 1200 different file formats
‚Ä¢	Work with virtually all available file formats such as: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, EPUB, MOBI, HTML, TXT, GIF, JPG, FLAC, MP3, MP4, M4A CSV, BMP, PPTX, TIFF, and many more




* This feature is available as part of File Commander Premium.
** Unlimited conversions available to File Commander Premium users.

comments: This is an excellent app, particularly if you use it with Mobisystem apps. I would give it 5 stars except for a consistent stability glltch - the app consistently vanishes (closes) unexpectedly while I am working with it. I notified the Mobisystems Support on several occasions, but after a generic "we'll-look-into-it" reply, hear nothing further. I can temporarily resolve the issue by uninstalling-reinstalling, but soon the problem resurfaces. I may need to find another alternative.

Every time I start up file commander, it has this odd sound being played in my speaker. It sounds as if someone lit a bomb and threw it down a pipe, and then recorded it into an mp3 file for File Commander's backround music. It takes a minute to start playing the sound, but its way faster when playing a music file. The sound doesn't stop until File Commander is closed completely. I would much appreciate it being fixed as it worrys me that my speaker is busted every time I open the app.üëå

Update 2020. File Commander is a great failsafe app. Have used mobiles for a decade and it has NEVER failed to keep what I add safe and working through differing versions on Samsung Smart mobiles, up to latest Android 10. (Needs internet). Sends notifications when new updates available. I only rate 5 if apps work so well you can sort out issues easily or I have never had to sort out anything with support. I have never needed support with this app. That says a lot about its performance.

I like the app, but I am very confused as to what I paid for. The app offers a premium version, but no listed price!! I also don't think trying it for a week would make me want to pay for it as a subscription. (I am assuming it's a subscription) AND NO PRICE GIVEN WITH THE RESPONSE. If support does not know, maybe you should find out before responding. I bought the app in good faith. This is bait and switch.

Very bad experience i installed and purchased to recover some photos but it didn't work. So i delete the subscription in the same day but i have been charged and the money is gone, it says that the subcription will end after a year. This is not fair and a way making bussines. So people dont buy this app.

title: Genius Scan - PDF Scanner
description:
Quickly scan your paper documents on the go and export them as multi-page PDF files.

*** 20+ million users *** 1000s of small businesses ***

Place any document in front of your device‚Äôs camera: our scanner app automatically recognizes the paper against the background, crops it, and cleans up the result. You obtain a crisp, legible scan. Batch scanning lets you scan dozens of pages in a matter of seconds. Powerful tools help you organize, share, or archive your documents.

== KEY FEATURES == 

Smart Scanning:

- Document detection & background removal
- Distortion correction
- Shadow removal and defect cleanup
- Filters (black & white, whiteboard, photo)
- Batch scanning

PDF Creation & Editing:

- Document merging & splitting
- Multiple page PDF creation
- Photos and PDF import

Security & Privacy:

- On-device document processing
+ Fingerprint locking
+ PDF password encryption

Document Organization:

- Document tagging
- Metadata and content search
+ Custom naming schemes (Smart Document Names)
+ Backup and multi-device sync with Genius Cloud (separate subscription)

Export:

- Email
+ Box, Dropbox, Evernote, Expensify, Google Drive, OneDrive, FTP, WebDAV.
+ Any WebDAV compatible service such as Citrix ShareFile, NextCloud, ownCloud, Synology, Yandex. 
+ Automatic background auto-export

OCR (Text Recognition):

+ Text extraction
+ Searchable PDF creation
+ Business card scanning & contact creation

The features denoted with [+] are available as part of Genius Scan+ (a one-time purchase).

== ABOUT US ==

It‚Äôs in the heart of Paris, France that The Grizzly Labs develops Genius Scan. We take pride in crafting apps that help millions of users throughout the world and hold ourselves to the highest standards in terms of quality and privacy. Get in touch with us @thegrizzlylabs if you have any questions.

recentChanges:
This update of Genius Scan brings a feature requested by many users: Text recognition (aka OCR).
It makes it possible to search documents by their content and produce searchable and selectable PDF documents.
It's only available for Genius Scan+ and Genius Cloud users.

We've also improved help pages, fixed a distortion issue and a problme when restoring backup files.
comments: This app definitely gets the job done. May not be all flashy but it does exactly what I need it to do. I have yet to run into any issues. The most frustrating thing about it is probably having trouble capturing the image. Most of the time it's no problem, but every now and then it will take forever to get a quality scan. Overall, 4 stars. Worth it.

This is a MUST HAVE app for both personal and for business that everyone should have. I LOVE IT. As a Realtor I no longer need to run back to the office to scan docs in order to send them to my clients. I am able to scan immediately where ever we are signing and clients really like and appreciate this type of service. This app has lots of great features. Thank you so much to the person or people that created this app that has made such a difference for my business.

Whew! I "think" my search is over. Lot's of free useful setup features and lots of one time, under 5 buck, purchases. So far, it's underrated! Try it, then buy the extra features. You can live without them, but why, when the total package is so affordable.

Amazing, useful, it is a game changer! I used this app for YEARS and I absolutely love it. Especially when you don't have an actual scanner. This app really makes your work look like a PDF document. BEST APP EVER! I recommended this app so MANY people, including family and they love it too! Honestly, it's even easier to use than an actual scanner and fax machine!

Excellent App. Turns paperwork into a pdf, gave me a choice of emails, drives, dropbox, and more. Makes going to Staples for scanning pdf's a chore of the past. Just takes a moment to pick up and auto center documents. I love it! Way to go! The perfect modern use of technology.

title: Easy Fax - Send Fax from Phone
description:
Easy Fax turns your phone into a powerful fax machine for documents, photos and receipts. With Easy Fax, you can fax anywhere. Get notifications and emails about your faxes.

Features of Easy Fax:
- Fax images from gallery or using phone's camera to scan.
- Fax documents from Cloud Storages (Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, OneDrive,...).
- Fax documents imported from other apps.
- Receive notifications and emails about your faxes.
- Provide the fastest way to login to app using Google Account. After that, you can use your credits on all your devices.

Cost:
- Easy Fax using credits for faxing. The first time you login to Easy Fax, you will have 15 FREE credits.
- Faxes from US and Canada need 10 credits for a page. Other countries need 15 credits for a page.
- Each fax page costs between $0.25 and $0.50 depending on how many credits you buy at once.

If you have any problems with Easy Fax, please email us at easyfax@coolmobilesolution.com so that we can help you.

Privacy policy: http://www.easyfaxapp.com/easyfax_privacy_policy.html

comments: I uploaded the documentation, completed the coversheet and pressed the button to fax. Easy Fax confirmed that the document was sent successfully. Now if you want confirmation from the recipient, you will need to purchase a return fax number for $4.99. This appt is awesome. You get 50 FREE credits and it costed me 20 credits to fax.

I sent a fax it said it got successfully delivered. The client recieved the fax but there were no detectable attachments of the document that I sent which is weird. But I like how the app functions and it's very easy to use.
THANK GOD!! An app that does exactly what it says. I have no money and needed critical med docs to be faxed by midnight. Watched 9 videos, was able to meet this deadline. üòÅ
Simple to install and use. 50 free credits, and costs 15 credits per page. For a very occasional fax sender, it is perfect and free.

I have been using this app for over a year now and have always had successful transmissions even when it's 24 pages! The short ads are worth watching for free transmission. This app is well worth the time spent.

recentChanges: Visual, performance improvement and more. Have a look!
comments: Great app ruined by pricing policy. Firstly, as a small business this app is great. Its easy to set up a company template and generate an invoice on the go from a mobile phone. The only downside is the pricing policy is based on the value on the invoices rather than the number. So as a business that writes a few invoices a month but these exceed the $1000 monthly limit the cost per invoice is very high. For the No. I create it's not cost effective. Under $5/mo or $2/invoice & I'd subscribe.

I absolutely love this app. I have been using it for a year now and I must say it is wonderful! A must have! Everything about my business is professional down to the invoice and my clients take my business very seriously because of the invoices I make using this app. Keep up the awesome work!!

Wow it's amazing - well done guys! Simple to setup & upload your logo,fill in your business details and you've got a professional invoice. You can now send an invoice in seconds after completing the job. Keeps records of paid/unpaid invoices. Plenty of design layouts to choose from. With or without VAT. Set your own terms etc. Only one suggestion you are missing an invoice with:- REFERENCE DESCRIPTION PRICE. As a commercial printer it was a popular layout where quantity wasn't a factor.ll

Seemed to be easy to use and quick to make invoices, but you can't change the Terms and conditions at the bottom. Maybe have it let us edit what it says there to something other than "Terms and conditions" to what I need, just a note without text above it. Will check back on app later.

Dear Developer. i love your convenient but one thing i need d most is i need to put Custom Title for Each of my Quotes&Invoices. and i also wish to leave the date blank for each of d quotes and Invoices. is this app able to do so? most of d apps dont hv that option. it would b great if your apps can do so. tq

title: Scanner App - Scan documents to PDF with iScanner
description:
iScanner is a PDF scanner app that will turn your Android device into a portable and powerful document scanning tool. 

Easily scan, save, and share any document in PDF, JPG or TXT format with the help of the multifunctional scanner app.

Become more productive with a handy scanner in your pocket! Go paperless and store all your documents in a neat mobile office on your very phone.

This fast and powerful PDF scanner app is a must-have app for students and anyone involved in a small business: accountants, realtors, managers, or lawyers. iScanner makes it easy to run business on the go and boost your efficiency and productivity.

Digitize all your valuable documents with the device camera or add files from the Gallery. If you deal with business papers a lot the app‚Äôs e-sign feature will become a real time-saver for you. Scan a document, sign and email it to your partner or client ‚Äì yes, it‚Äôs that fast and easy! You can also save your signature and use it for all further documents.

üåê TEXT RECOGNITION
Turn an image to text with the highly accurate OCR scanner app. Easily extract text from a scanned page, edit it and save as a new document. This precise OCR text scanner recognizes all popular languages and can even detect multiple languages within one document.
 
üîí PIN-PROTECTION
Safely use this portable document scanner for your daily needs. If you want to protect your scans, you can set up a PIN for the entire app or lock particular folders or documents.

comments: I checked reviews and the first and second review mentioned the app not being free. And the the publisher answered that the app could be used for free. He was technically correct. For three days after you give them credit card info. And then you have to cancel before they charge you. So unless you wanna pay... Go away

People miss use the word free..... free means you dont have to pay, be honest with people up front, if its subscription based then say it, I dont do subscriptions so gonna have to delete..sorry.. Remember Free...is Free.... no money involved what so ever...

DO NOT waste your time/money with this app. Not only are you required to purchase a yearly subscription to use the app, but after a while this app will stop working, not allowing you access to it and you will not be able to recover any files you've scanned. On top of that, customer service is absolutely horrible. After going back and forth with many emails with a computer (not even a real person) nothing gets fixed. Unsubscribed. Uninstalled. There are higher rates apps..
I will give it one star for the idea. Talk about holding the camera still, it was on a tripod and still didn't work although attempted several times.
Works great but subscription is too high for the amount of time I'll need it. Looking for a less expensive app.

title: Taxbot - Mileage & Expenses
description:
Track Your Mileage, Receipts, & Expenses Automatically. Oh,And It's Actually Designed To Protect You In An IRS Audit!


AUTOMATIC MILEAGE TRACKING

Taxbot tracks all your driving in the background so you don't have to remember to do it. Later, you can easily identify and classify your business trips. Each trip card displays: 

-Detailed map highlighting the exact route taken
Full addresses (not just a city)
-Easily merge trips
-Trips ending within 30 minutes of an event on your calendar will suggest the purpose of the trip to help identify it.

Simply swipe personal trips left and business ones right.


SMARTMATCH RECEIPTS TO EXPENSES

Your Only Job -- Snap pictures of physical receipts (Takes about 1 second). Your email receipts can automatically be imported with your permission. 

Taxbot Takes Over -- The app reads the receipts using OCR (optical character recognition). When the bank or credit card charge shows up in your bank account a day or two later, Taxbot will: 

-Match photo and email receipts to the correct bank transactions 
-Fill in missing data*
-Categorize the expense
-And Send it back to you for your approval! 

Simply swipe personal expenses left and business ones right! 

*If an expense or trip needs additional information to be tax compliant the card will flip and ask you for the information. 


RECREATE YOUR PAST WITH SMARTMATCH

Signing up mid-year? 
-Upload past bank statements
-Snap pictures of the receipts stuffed in your shoebox
-Wait 15 minutes and your receipts will be matched and ready for review.
 

DESIGNED BY AN IRS ATTORNEY TO BE BULLETPROOF AGAINST AN AUDIT

The IRS wins in 83% of audits. The primary reason is not cheating... It has to do with poor record-keeping. The IRS can ask you to prove your deductions with things like: 

-Copies of receipts and invoices for almost every expense (very few exceptions)
-A written log for "meals" expenses that detail who you met with and the business discussion
-A mileage log for that includes the reason for each drive.

Unfortunately, most accounting programs are not designed to make sure you have the proper proof in case of an audit. 


EASY REPORTS YOUR ACCOUNTANT WILL LOVE

Amaze your accountant with our AuditSafe Reports which include: 
-A complete Profit & Loss Statement. 
-Pictures of all your receipts along with IRS required information printed below each photo.
-Detailed mileage log with all the proof you need

Now if you get audited you can hand the auditor your report with confidence!

Simple Set Up - Easy To Use


100X RETURN ON INVESTMENT

On average Taxbot customers track and save over $10,000 in taxes... Not bad considering Taxbot is only $8.33 per month (when billed annually).  And even that is tax deductible too!  

If you have any questions or problems please call us! We actually have a customer service department! 855 -4-Taxbot (855-482-9268)

Taxbot is a monthly or annual subscription. Your Taxbot subscription will automatically renew each month for $9.99 or annually for $99.99 and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account.

You can turn off auto-renew at any time in your iTunes account settings.  Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of your current billing period.  Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of your current period.  Please go to https://taxbot.com/landing/terms-and-conditions for information regarding our terms of service and our privacy policy.

*Note: Because trip tracking uses the GPS in your phone we recommend plugging your phone in while driving to help with battery usage. When you are driving we use highly accurate GPS points so we can give you an actual map of your route. While driving, Taxbot will use battery equivalent to other navigation or GPS enabled apps. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

TRY IT RISK FREE FOR 14 DAYS!

comments: Easy to use. Like having your accountant with you at all times to track your expenses!!!

App is cool, spamming is not. You will get tons of spam upselling you on other products, webinars and when you request to stop being spammed, they reply, you've been opted out and let us know if you get any more emails. I guess when you 'opt out' they don't guarantee that your not going to get more emails. I called to talk about it and my account had been closed. Apparently there was a billing issue 2 or 3 weeks ago that no one let me know about. I called and cleared it up and as soon as I gave them my credit card, girl says Have a nice day and hung up. Terrible people in the back office.
Worked awesome for 2019. 2020 constant problems with bank linking, not tracking mileage. Endless issues. Looking for another app will not buy again.
I use this app for business milage tracking and love the simplicity of its use. It provides centralized reports ready for my accountant.
Pics don't sync with bank records like they say it will, transaction history not importing. App and website difficult to use and customer support not helpful. Seems like a rookie made this app.

title: Splashtop Personal - Remote Desktop
description:
Splashtop is the easiest, fastest, secure remote desktop app for accessing your Windows or Mac computer using your Android phone or tablet, from anywhere and at anytime! 

Over 15 million users are enjoying Splashtop today, and you should too!   

Use Splashtop for free to access your computer on the local network with best-in-class video streaming performance. Get full access to ALL of your applications, documents, emails, full browser with Flash and Java support, and games. Also get full access to your entire media library and documents. And more! 

Beyond that, Remote Camera feature in Splashtop also enables you to check on people, places and things with the live video streaming from your computer‚Äôs webcam remotely.  

To access your computer from across the Internet, subscribe to Anywhere Access Pack via In-App Purchase.


====================
License:
You may access up to 5 computers via your Splashtop Account.
Splashtop Personal is for non-commercial use only, i.e. use it to access your personal computers for non-work related purposes.
For commercial use in a professional environment, please use Splashtop Business which is designed for the workplace offering enhanced manageability, security, and compliance (www.splashtop.com/business).
====================

WITH SPLASHTOP PERSONAL, YOU CAN:
* Use your Android device to access all of the programs and files on your computer with 100% compatibility, including all PC/Mac applications
* Use your full desktop browser with Flash and Java support, with all of your bookmarks and your favorite plug-ins
* Enjoy the full video and music libraries that are playable only on your computer, whatever formats they‚Äôre in
* Play all the 3D games and all the Flash games
* High resolution, real time video and audio streaming from computer‚Äôs webcam

====================
Optional In-App Subscriptions:

Get Anywhere Access Pack to access your computer from across the Internet, via our global network of secure, high-performance servers:
- Access reliably across Internet over 3G/4G , from behind firewalls, etc.
- Optimized streaming performance under varying network conditions over Wi-Fi and 3G
- Fully secured via SSL with 256-bit AES encryption
- Subscribe monthly for $4.99 or annually for $16.99

Get Productivity Pack, which includes Configurable Shortcuts & Gamepad and Whiteboard:
- Control your Windows and Mac apps and games easily with on-screen shortcuts mapped to your most commonly used functions. Use the built-in profiles for popular apps or create your own.
- Annotate over any live remote desktop screen. Great for presentations and classroom instruction.
- Subscribe monthly for $1.99 or annually for $16.99

See our Terms of Service and Privacy policy at http://www.splashtop.com/terms/splashtop.
====================

REQUIREMENTS:
* Windows 8, 7, Vista, and XP, Mac OS X 10.6+ or Linux (Ubuntu 12.04).
* A computer with dual-core CPU is strongly recommended for best performance.
* Internet connection is needed to use this app.
* Productivity Pack is available for Android tablet only

comments: Super app for VPN for my home desktop! Makes my time so much more effecient. Update: After using this remote desktop app I have to say that it just isn't stable and reliable at least 40-50% of the time. Getting kicked out and unable to reconnect is a real problem. Devices used: Dell Chromebook to HP 8460P Elitebook over a Gigabit router.

Performance is incredible even on terribly slow internet connections. Local network connections really useful, anywhere access pack is only like 10$ a year which is freaking awesome and is extremely convenient + useful. App also has a really nice easy to minimize UI, tons of keyboard shortcuts, and 3 different mouse control schemes. Splashtop is without a question the best service on the market for PC remote control and I'll gladly pay the CHEAP subscription for such a phenomenal service! :)

So far, so GOOD. I was in search of a Remote Desktop App to work woth my Android tablet, Laptop and desktop at home in different rooms. I installed the streamer on the Windows machines and it just worked! I am impressed with options available and support for direct gesture even on the phone. This makes it very easy to check on running apps. I am so impressed that I upgraded to the internet version and I am happy. Highly recommend over the other apps in this category.

Lost my media remote control and I was looking for a replacement and thought to myself my phone will do anything for my TV there's got to be something for my PC and there you where SplashTop my favorite application and it's so much better than a traditional remote that uses Infrared that's line-of-sight used in limited functionality do to key space

Update: TOO MUCH SOUND DELAY. I have a fast internet connection and still have too much sound delay. I contacted the developer through email THREE times and there was no response or improvements. I use triple monitor and its hard to change over one monitor to the other to control each display, it would be better if you make it easier to go through each monitor, or even better - an option to display all three monitor at the same time from my phone.

title: Simple Fax Free page - Send Fax from Phone
description:
TipsÔºöThe first page is free. You need to register and log in. Then go to the purchase credit page to receive a free 15 credit. There is no sign up and login account. The first page cannot be sent for free.


Simple Fax turns your phone into a fax machine for documents, photos, receipts and other texts. With Simple Fax, you can fax them anywhere.

Simple Fax sends fax files or documents,including PDF files, stored on your Android phone or tablet to any fax number in the USA/Canada and many international locations. Send a fax from your phone as simply as selecting a file and entering a fax number.

Simple Fax is extremely easy to use. The interface is simple and very convenient to manage your faxes.

Features:
- Send a single page or multiple page faxes.
- Fax documents from mail and other apps.
- Fax images from Gallery or using camera.
- Provide international fax numbers and list of countries.
- Archive documents by status, easy to manage.
- Folder Management Fax.
- Manage fax receipt.

In fact it is free,
You can also earn credit by setting check-ins and watching videos!

If you do not like check-ins and watch videos, you can also buy credit!



Cost:
15     Credits for $0.99
50     Credits for $2.49
250   Credits for $9.99
600   Credits for $19.99
2000 Credits for $49.99

Faxes to the USA and Canada are 10 credits per page. The others are 15 credits per page.


Fax formats of image files (photos of documents) takes quite a while to transfer and send as a fax.
Allow at least 1 minutes per page to transfer and two minutes to fax if you are sending a scan or image (photo) file. More if your data connection maybe ... slow.


Download and start to use Simple Fax to make your life easier. Please write to us before leaving negative reviews, as we can often help with your problem or help you better use the app.

If you have any problem or suggestions please send a mail to simple.fax@outlook.com, and you will get the response and solution in a short time.

comments: Great app! I had to send a fax of eleven pages (who on Earth is still using fax machines in this day and age?) Well, for $5 (and one free page,) I was able to send that fax. I love this app and I highly recommend it. Five stars, my only complaint is that it took five minutes. When finished, the app will say "Sent!" on a line in large green letters. A long press on that line will show a transmission verification report when "Fax Receipt" is chosen.

I tried for 13 hours to send one fax of five pages. I paid $3.18 to cover the extra 4 pages, plus the free page. It would not send my fax. I tried multiple options to get the fax to work and nothing did. Instead I use Fax.Plus. Fax.Plus sent my fax the first time within 5 minutes. After I wasted all evening and night fighting with this app. This app does not work and you cannot get your money back!

So far so good. Free credits worked. Not sure why others said they didn't. Registration was just email and password and the app took me straight to it once I tried to send my fax. I registered and it sent me right back and I selected get 15 free credits and other options came up that I could buy, but I just hit the back button in the app. It took about a minute to send one page but I have slow internet in a rural area. Long click on sent fax to see verification of received status.

Update: ended up having to uninstall the app, and install app again. Afterwards, my 15 page fax sent immediately. Apparently it had absolutely nothing to do with the number of pages sent. But thanks for the advice. Smh. My advice to YOU is that if 15 pages is too many, maybe you should advise the app users of that BEFORE they try to send the fax and not AFTER. I paid for 15 pages, that i have been trying to fax since 6 am. Not happy at all....

Not only do you get enough credits to send 1 free page, but you can spend as little as 1 dollar for more credits as opposed to another app where the minimum was 10 bucks worth of credits. For someone like me that only needs to send 1 page every once in a great while, that's like saying it costs 10 bucks per page.

title: CamToPlan - AR measurement / tape measure
description:
Measure anything with CamToPlan! Horizontally and vertically! Length, distance, area of any surface‚Ä¶ Measure everything with this virtual ruler and tape measure thanks to augmented reality and ARCore. 

Measuring a length is now easier than with a laser meter or any other measure tool. You draw your measurement lines in 3D thanks to the camera directly on the video of your phone or tablet. You export your plans in PNG or DXF. CamToPlan is the AR measuring app that brings your measures from cam‚Ä¶to‚Ä¶plan !

For personal or professional use, always measure like a pro. Thanks to Virtual Reality (VR), you can measure floors, dimensions of walls, windows, doors or a whole home in a few seconds. No more tape measure or ruler needed!

This app has infinite applications for everybody:
- Personal use: the length measure app for the handyman who loves DIY !
- Real estate professionals (real estate agent, interior design decorator or designer, architect, topographer, energy adviser...): this app will help you make a floorplan of a house, apartment, a specific room of a flat.
- Construction workers can use it to quickly measure jobs : concreter, tile layer, carpet fitter, painter, drywall guy, plasterer, builder, carpenter, electrician, plumber, slater... 
- For gardener, landscaper, swimming pool builders and maintenance, digger, earth-moving, navvy: this app also works outside
- Cost estimation professionals: this length measure app can make pricing estimates, it will be a great assistant for quantity surveyor, price studies technician, economist‚Ä¶
- Building industry: foreman, site manager or engineer can drop their tape measure and ruler to perform a quick measurement check

How does this measuring app work?
It relies on ARCore by Google. Machine learning algorithms combine the device sensors data (accelerometer, gyroscope‚Ä¶) with odometry which analyses in real time the video of the camera and relies on visual details of images, in order to scan the environment and find the position and rotation angle of the device.

Please note: 
- you can measure in metric (meters, centimeters) or imperial units (feet, inches)
- the app measures distances horizontally (= on the ground) and vertically!
- no need to remove the furniture from the room for measurements. The application determines the intersection between the floor and the target, even if it is hidden.
- The application may have difficulty with some types of tiles. The accuracy is not guaranteed.
- you can move while performing measurements to get closer to your target point, for maximum precision, even if it is not visible and calculated by extrapolation.

Terms of use: http://misc.tasmanic.com/camtoplanpolicy.html
Privacy policy: http://misc.tasmanic.com/androidctpprivacypolicy.html

comments: Amazing technology... Only problem is there's no "light" version of the app, just a free trial. After a few days it's over $20 a month. Well worth it though if its something you'd use on a regular basis
Very much ads. The program is unstable and inaccurate

Not stable, that flash with a compass at the base keeps blocking my view of the surface area I'm trying to measure using my "Pied" Samsung Galaxy A7 (SM-A750F). Everytime I measure the same surface, I end up with different measurements and tracing a target area is difficult.
Functionality is good, but has a TON of ads and free version won't let you upload any version of the file or even take a screenshot.
You can't get through one room with the free trial without paying for the year. BS

title: TurboScan: scan documents & receipts in PDF
description:
TurboScan is a one time cost for life! TurboScan turns your phone into a full-featured and powerful multipage scanner for documents, receipts, notes, whiteboards, photos, or other everyday text. With TurboScan, you can quickly scan your documents in high quality and store or send them as multipage PDF or JPEG files. 

Note! You can scan and send up to three multipage documents with this free version.

TurboScan uses advanced fast algorithms to accurately detect document edges, straighten the documents (correct perspective), eliminate shadows and set a perfect contrast - black on white.

TurboScan boasts a powerful yet easy to use interface. Get instant one-tap brightness, rotation and color controls all on one screen!

TurboScan also offers SureScan, our proprietary scanning mode for sharper scans (especially useful in low-light conditions.) SureScan requires taking three pictures of the same document with the phone camera. 

TurboScan's handy "Email to myself" feature lets you send documents to a predefined address, or even upload them to online storage sites like Dropbox, with a single tap. 

All processing happens on your phone, and the confidentiality of your data is never compromised (no Internet connection needed.)

TurboScan features:
‚Ä¢ Automatic document edge detection and perspective correction 
‚Ä¢ SureScan mode for very sharp scans 
‚Ä¢ Ultra-fast processing (under 3 seconds per page) 
‚Ä¢ Document naming, storage inside the app and search
‚Ä¢ Multipage editing: add, reorder, and delete pages
‚Ä¢ Copy pages between stored scans
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúEmail to myself‚Äù feature for quick emails 
‚Ä¢ Email document as PDF, JPEG or PNG, or save to camera roll
‚Ä¢ Arrange multiple receipts or business cards on a PDF page
‚Ä¢ Open PDFs or JPEGs in other apps like the free Dropbox app (or Evernote, GoogleDrive, OneDrive app, etc) to send to clouds, or fax apps 
‚Ä¢ Printing via Cloud Print or other print apps 
‚Ä¢ Instant one-tap brightness, rotation, and color controls 
‚Ä¢ Compact attachments with adjustable size 


Tips on scanning
‚Ä¢ Make sure your document is flat and well lit. 
‚Ä¢ For best edge detection, include some margin around your document while shooting.
‚Ä¢ Use flash in low light conditions, but avoid glare with glossy documents.
‚Ä¢ If your flash over-saturates images or makes them blurry, please change the flash option in app Settings

We're constantly improving TurboScan, and we value our customers' opinions and feedback. If you want to send us your feedback or have a problem with our software,  please contact us at  android@turboscanapp.com  before submitting a comment to the store.

comments: I've been using this app for years. In my opinion this is the best app for scanning documents and exporting them in various files formats. I have used this on both IOS and Android and my opinion stays the same. For me, scanning documents every day and exporting them as .PDF files is a laborious process. Using turboscan has mitigated that and made this allot more easier. The UI is very easy to navigate. I have not run into any bugs for the past 7 or 8 years of me using this.

This app is great. I love that I can utilize it for my work. I tell others how easy it is to use & I get clients to download it to send me their documents. It's easy to scan, crop & send the scanned documents in various formats to anyone in my contact list .. directly from this app. It updates automatically ... I absolutely love this app!!

I've been using this app for 9 months now, and I use it for checks, documents, scanning letters and notes from work, sheet music. It does a great job of creating high quality facsimiles. It's not going to give you a 100% HD replica of a printed document, but it is WONDERFUL for record keeping and document sharing. I highly recommend it.

It works great. Really like the way it processes the pictures. Two issues that make me look for alternatives, even after purchased that one: 1. Need to import multiply pictures to app from my gallery. Currently need to do that one by one. 2. After initially imported page to multipage document I cannot modify page any more, so crop and other options are available just once. I really need to process pages after have completed importing them.
Very frustrating - a bug prevents me from being able to select and scan area. So now can't use the app. Please fix! This is the only place I can communicate...

title: FaxFile - Send Fax from phone
description:
FaxFile sends fax files or documents,including PDF files, stored on your Android phone or tablet to any fax number in the USA/Canada and many international locations. Send a fax from your phone as simply as selecting a file and entering a fax number.

FaxFile supports sending via fax PDF and Microsoft office Word documents (.doc or .docx).  It can also send as a fax images in PNG and JPG formats.  Enabling you to fax images saved by your phone's or tablet's camera.

You will need to purchase fax credits through the Google play store (in-app purchase) to send a fax.  Fax credits are not refundable in whole or in part once you have started a fax.

Faxes transfer in the background from your phone or tablet to our fax servers which do the actual sending.  Fax status is returned to the application at each step.

There no monthly subscription required in order to send faxes.  NOTE: for international faxes, check the international rate table in the application before purchasing credits to verify that the country(ies) you care about are supported.

Supports sending a fax to contacts or typed in fax numbers for a one-off fax.

We will automatically retry faxes that don't go through initially - no additional charge and you don't need to do anything. If a fax fails to go through PLEASE call the number and verify that a fax machine is actually answering.  This is the number one problem with failed faxes.  Don't rely on "of course the fax machine is working".

Fax formats of image files (photos of documents) takes quite a while to transfer and send as a fax.
Allow at least 3 minutes per page to transfer and two minutes to fax if you are sending a scan or image (photo) file.  More if your data connection maybe ... slow.
 
See the introductory help in the FaxFile app and FAQ for more information.

Works with all Android devices including tablets.  Requires network access of some sort.  WiFi usually best.

If you need a cover page, please see our related app FaxCover.

FaxFile is HIPAA compliant.

comments: Super easy mobile faxing. This definitely comes in handy to those, like myself, who don't have a fax machine at home. I've been using FaxFile since 2014 and haven't been disappointed yet. I don't always need it but when I do, it's pretty convenient. Thanks for being there for my fax needs FaxFile!
I have had this app many years. I don't send many faxes, and this one is reasonable. It has kept track of the money I put on account for a long time now.
Overall all easy and inexpensive. I am not very techy but this is perfect for me.
Seems to work. Took pictures, took my money, and said the word "Delivered" a couple minutes later. I guess that's all i hoped for.
I use this app everytime I need to send a fax!! I totally love it!!!!!

comments: This is an excellent customizable form app for any business not just the construction industry. Customer support is fast, friendly and thorough. I will be using this app everyday. Syncing is easy and the price is very reasonable.

I paid for the upgrade to use the APP and it would not let me use the APP (it said contact support to fix issue and i tried everyway to contact JOBFLEX and they never responded! Not only did they take my money the first time and it DIDNT work! but have CHARGED ME 3 times for a service that does NOT work! They wont give me a refund support WON'T answer, i've tried many times! This is ROBBERY! This is so upsetting JOBFLEX took a payment today AGAIN (my phone got shutoff b/c JOBFLEX took payment!
So far pretty good makes it easy to make quotes that turn into contracts after the customer sign. Couldn't have made the app any easier to use!
This app provides a cost effective solution for a simple handyman or contractor business. They also have great customer support!

At first was great until I paid and couldn't use it no more. Sucks now I was taken 9.00$ with pending invoices and no refund. It clearly as an issue as i try updating , cleaning , rebooting all systems a few times . I tried .... So yeah sucks

title: Invoice ASAP,  for Invoicing
description:
Easy Mobile Invoicing, Signature Capture & Secure Cloud Storage! 
Field Service, Manage Customers & Great Reporting
Attach Photos & Voice Memos to Invoices
QuickBooks¬Æ & Xero Compatible - Sync Your Data, No Double Entry

Great for managing a team of any size.
Enterprise ready.  
A Must have for Field Service.
The Free version allows you to create and send up to five  Estimates & Invoices per month.  Fantastic features available with upgrades.

Featured in: The WSJ, TechCrunch, ZDNet, Reuters, PC Magazine, Yahoo Finance, Business Wire, The Phoenix Business Journal and many more.

Works with your merchant account, Paypal or WePay for web credit card payments!

FEATURES
¬∑ Signature capture
¬∑ Accounting integration
¬∑ Add your logo

¬∑ Attach photos to any invoice
¬∑ Manage multiple users & teams in the field
¬∑ Mobile printing
¬∑ Multiple currencies

EASY TO USE
¬∑ Simple yet powerful design built for business owners. Accountants love it too.
¬∑ Supported by incredible customer service. Smart, friendly help available by email (support@invoiceasap.com) whenever you have questions.

App as been great for the last 5 years untill recent update now i cant send estimate and invoice tried contacting you numerous times to be told someone will deal with it, still no joy and as a small business with Christmas round the corner this just isnt good enough and doesn't look like i will be getting payed for Christmas. You have got until tomorrow otherwise i need a reliable alternative.

Use it with android and it takes forever to refresh , not like iOS. Please fix this issue . Also, the invoice late date should be from the date it was signed not the date it was created. Otherwise , great app

comments: It's a great idea and could be really useful if it accurately captured the data on the business card. But every single cards needs to be edited for accuracy before you save it. I even bought the premium membership to be able to save it to contacts, and I swear that made it worse. And you have to pay extra for proofreading? That's just plain obnoxious. It seems like it might be faster to enter it all manually in to my contacts. Anyway, if they can fix the inaccuracy in the data, it would be useful to have. I wish I hadn't wasted my money on an upgrade to premium.

Garbage app if you ever update. It will delete ALL cards. Not worth the hassle and frustration of losing ALL business contacts. Unreliable. Would give NO stars if I could. üò° Remember...this app is out of China. They probably have all my business contacts... deleting.. ü§¨

It's not perfect but it's doing what I need - IT WAS. I haven't used it in at least 6 months. I don't recall having to give my GOOGLE EMAIL AND PASSWORD TO THESE PEOPLE AND BESIDES, OTHER APS HAVE ACCESS TO MY CONTACTS WITHOUT NEEDING MY GOOGLE ACCOUNT PASSWORD. I'M GOING TO FIND ANOTHER CARD READER. I don't trust these people.

I am very happy with the app and the results of the OCR process are quite satisfying. Sometimes not 100% recognition possible! Ameliorations are possible in the field of handwritten cards or with the different fonts. Very good app: MUST-TRY!

Used to be a great app as it would sync with google contacts. Now they want $46 a year to sync with contacts, so it's pretty much useless. Terrible decision on their part. Don't waste your time with this one anymore.

title: Nine - Email & Calendar
description:
The 100 Best Android Apps for 2019 - https://bit.ly/2PWe259
16 Android Apps Actually Worth Paying For - https://bit.ly/2G7vkJX

********************
Nine is not a free app.
After enough time using the free trial for 2 weeks and you are satisfied, please purchase Nine licenses.
The price for a license is US $14.99.
********************

As of today email communication became a critical thing as interpersonal communication skill within an organization or in your daily life. There might be nothing more important than efficient communication in the work of a company. Nine is a full-fledged email application for Android based on Direct Push technology to synchronize with Microsoft Exchange Server using Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync, and also designed for entrepreneurs or ordinary people who want to have efficient communication with their colleagues, friends, ‚Äéand family members at anytime, anywhere. You may already have good experience with other E-Mail apps for Android. Regardless of your existing experience, we will give you a superb experience more than anything else. Leveraging E-Mail, Contacts, Calendar, Tasks and Notes on your mobile devices through wireless networks enhances your user experience and dramatically reduces your time.
 
Key features
- Direct Push Synchronization with Exchange ActiveSync. Nine does not have any server to store user's Nine data. Nine app connects to user server directly. All Nine data is stored in user device only.
- Calendar and Contacts (Integrated into stock Calendar and Contacts application along with Nine account)
- Rich-Text Editor
- Client Cert
- S/MIME
- IRM
- Global Address List (GAL)
- Select folders to push (Email notification per each folder)
- Full HTML (inbound, outbound)
- Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)
- Hybrid Email Search (Integrate with fast local search and online search)
- Conversation Mode
- Unread Badge (Nova Launcher, Apex Launcher, DashClock and  Samsung, Sony, Huawei & LG devices)
- Widgets (Unread badge, Shortcuts, Email list, Tasks list and Calendar Agenda)
- Notes Sync (Exchange 2010 and higher)
- Tasks & Calendar Sync 
- Modern Authentication for Office 365 

Supported Servers
- Exchange Server 2003 SP2, 2007, 2010, 2013, 2016, 2019
- Office 365, Exchange Online
- Hotmail
- Outlook.com
- Gmail, G Suite (Google Apps)
- iCloud
- Other servers(IBM Notes Traveler, Groupwise, Kerio, Zimbra, Horde, IceWarp, MDaemon, Kopano etc) supported Exchange ActiveSync
- Other servers(Yahoo, GMX, Mail.ru, etc) supported IMAP

Permission Details
* WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE¬†
- To copy the attachment to an external storage and to export Nine settings.
* READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
- To import attachments from an external storage and to import Nine settings.
* CALL_PHONE
- To call a contact in Nine Contacts
* READ_PHONE_STATE
- To deliver the Device information to server (ActiveSync function)
* GET_ACCOUNTS
- To use the account for purchasing a license and to manage accounts information registered in system.
* WRITE_CONTACTS, READ_CONTACTS
- To use when syncing the user's contacts to server 
* WRITE_CALENDAR, READ_CALENDAR
- To use when syncing the user's calendar to server
* CAMERA:
- To scan QR code for Entrust Smart Credentials

** Available Android
- Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean) and above
 
** Note
- Nine is not cloud based. It stores your accounts‚Äô passwords only on the actual device. It connects only to the actual mail servers. It stores your messages only on the device.
- Nine uses the Device Administrator permission.
 
** Support
- If you have a question or a special request, just send an email to support@9folders.com and we will get back to you as soon as we can.

summary: Nine is a full-fledged and intuitive email app which supports Exchange and IMAP
developerAddress: 801 8F 296, Neungdong-ro, Gwangjin-gu, Seoul, Korea
recentChanges:
* Fixed the attachment opening issue in some devices - v4.7.1d
* Fixed the mail sending issue with IMAP accounts on Android 6 - v4.7.1c
* Updated S/MIME feature to sign or encrypt/decrypt with the certificates installed on Android System.
* Changed the behavior of Nine that was taken when the unlock password expired.
* Fixed a problem not displaying email list in Galaxy Fold.
* Fixed the picture rotating issue when taking a picture in the app.
comments: Do not recommend! The app errors out all the time. If you send an error report you get back a completely illegible message from someone somewhere that tells you to disable your battery saver settings. I have Nine exempt from every single one of the battery saver settings on my phone and it still gives me the internal error multiple times a day. The only way to refresh my email at that point is to completely restart my phone. Sometimes that works. Uninstalling. Do not recommend.

My Main Email App! I've been using Nine since I ran into issues with the built in email client and the Outlook app back in 2015/2016. I haven't had no issues with this app besides the occasional password updates that got to be entered manually, but thats it not major problem. Other than that I use it all the time on both of my phones. Thumbs up for this one.

Best Exchange client. Fast, huge number 9f options and configuration options. Exchange GAB (global address book) support is great in and of itself but but it's even more useful since other apps on your phone can now pull info from the GAB (if configured to do so). Exchange mobile device management from the Exchange host can be sandboxed to only include the email client. Remote wiping and similar requests from the server admin would only impact the client rather than the entire device.

KEEP YOUR $15. After "sending them logs" three times, I have yet to receive any assistance from their overseas help, only more emailed requests for logs. Obvious that multiple individuals there are not communicating with each other. Accounts unsync for no reason losing all settings, email will not automatically sync without being forced, interface is absurd to navigate. TERRIBLE IN EVERY WAY.

Error reporting isn't working. Some of my emails are showing in inbox after being archived. On every refresh of email. Plz solve this issue. Update: Report a problem generates a file but it doesn't do anything. It can't be saved or shared to any app. No matter what I select, nothing happens.

comments: Buggy and not very intuitive. No "real" group messaging. You have to pay to save your data. Caller id only works if you just so happen to be looking at your phone otherwise it says your number is calling. Crashes, freezes. Support is non existent. Could be a great app with some minor upgrades and big fixes. I get the impression, these things are not priorities. ivr auto attendant is awesome. Maybe the best feature and why I'm going to keep this until the renew. Gives time to find another app.

Recently I have had no issues the service and connection has been for the most part really good. This is a great app to help keep your dealings private and easy to use Phone US and Canada without incurring any roaming cost.

Awesome app. Super easy to use and range of phone numbers. Greatest app ever, thanks developers. For someone living Canada and US, such as myself, it's useful to have an Canada number and a home number in this way.

I like this app because I can use its dialer keypad during a call to check the voicemail of my other phone. As they mention, the sound quality is good. The connection is stable. SIP number full, please restart app. I'm unable to place a call now.
I loved it! Used to work fine, had no issues at all. I loved this app it's really is good. Great App, Very easy to use & also so much better than others I have tried 5*****

title: Genius Fax
description:
*** Faxing is not free, cost details are available below. ***

Genius Fax is the easiest way to send and receive faxes from your Android device that stays affordable. It's fast, simple to use and beautiful. No need to go to the dreaded fax store anymore. 

To send a fax: choose a file from any location (Dropbox, Google Drive, any other app)
To receive a fax: subscribe for a number and you‚Äôre all set. You receive documents as PDF and can preview them or export them to any other app.

**** 
Sending: 
- Tap the ‚Äú+‚Äù button to create a new fax
- Pick a document from any location on your phone
- Enter the recipient fax number 
- Optionally add a title, sender, recipient details and enable the cover page 
- Tap the send button! 
- Each page costs one fax credit but the cover page is always free. 

Receiving:
- Subscribe to a number for 1, 3 or 6 months; add additional monthes any time you want;
- Give away your number to whoever needs to fax to you
- Add credits to receive faxes. One page costs one credit.
- Faxes appear in your fax list as soon as they are received and paid for

Features: 
- Simple and beautiful UI. We don't understand why business apps should be ugly! 
- Pick a PDF or image file to send from another app or from the cloud 
- Send a fax to select international fax numbers (see list of countries below) 
- Send and forget: push notifications for success and failure 
- Receive faxes
- Free cover page 
- Conveniently buy credits and fax number subscriptions
- History of the faxes you sent available from any of your devices with Genius Fax (using your Genius Fax account)
- Easily delete from history

Cost: 
- Each page of your PDF file costs a fax credit to send or to receive
- When sending, the cover page appended by Genius Fax is always free 
- You can buy credits in Genius Fax. One fax credit costs as little as $0.39. 
- You can buy a number in Genius Fax for as little as $3.49/month
- Send your fax to any supported country. It's always one credit per page. 

International destinations supported: 
US, Canada, UK, Japan, France, Germany, Spain, Austria, Portugal, Italy, Belgium, Luxembourg, Switzerland, Netherlands, Cyprus, Norway, Sweden, Estonia, Latvia, Greece, Hungary, Romania, Iceland, Ireland, Malta, Morocco, Turkey, Saudi Arabia, South Africa, Israel, Kazakhstan, India, China, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, Thailand, Mexico, Argentina, Brazil, Puerto Rico, Costa Rica, Panama, New Zealand and Australia

Genius Fax is fully compatible with Genius Scan. You can scan documents with Genius Scan and fax them with Genius Fax. Genius Fax supports documents up to 50 MB. Please let us know your feedback at support@geniusfax.com so that we can improve the app with the next iteration!

developerAddress:
5 Villa Lantiez
75017 Paris
France
recentChanges:
In this version, we added a simple way to open our free app Genius Scan in order to scan a document that you need to fax.
After scanning the document, a new fax is created with this document and you simply need to input the fax number.
comments: Amazing! I just got hired and had to FAX some consent and authorization forms.... I didnt want to go to staples. I tried at my college but couldn't find a fax machine anywhere. I downloaded this with Genius Scan which I have used before... it what made me think they might have one... tha fully they did. Use this! Yes it isnt free but its cheap!!!

Annoying. I was enjoying this app until a bug caused 3 PAID credits to disappear. I was drafting a 3 pg fax & decided not to send it-- so I cleared out all of the fields & backed out of the app which caused the app to crash. When I relaunched, the draft was gone as were my 3 credits. üò§ The fax was NEVER sent. Note to users, be very careful with this buggy & unstable app. If it crashes while you're drafting a fax or you decide to delete a draft, YOU WILL LOSE THOSE CREDITS regardless. SCAMMY.
Incredibly easy to use, you can actually pay per page instead of having to purchase a bunch at once (so it's great for people who don't use fax often), and also the cover letter is free. Amazing app!

In the policy that I read it said that faxes were as low as $0.36 cents per page with the cover page always free.how ever after I downloaded the app it is charging me $0.99 cents. The app is advertising falsely...
Great tool when on the go. Works well with Genius Scan app.

title: Aqua Mail - Email App
description:
Aqua Mail is the go-to app for all your email needs! Whether it‚Äôs a work or personal email, a corporate exchange server, Aqua Mail lets you easily access all your emails from one complete app. 

No complex setup required, just enter your email and password and you‚Äôre all set. With its flexibility and vast customization options Aqua Mail‚Äôs goal is to reflect the needs of the modern-day user and provide a platform anyone can tailor to their needs and preferences.

Aqua Mail's seamless yet powerful interface hosts a wide range of advanced features for setting up any type of email account:

KEY FEATURES:
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Multiple email providers: Gmail, Yahoo, Hotmail, FastMail, Apple, GMX, AOL  and more.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Mail accounts hosted at: Google Apps, Yahoo BizMail, Office 365, Exchange Online  and others.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Use of a ‚Äúmore secure‚Äù login method (OAUTH2) for Yahoo and  Gmail.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Backup and restore feature via popular cloud services (Dropbox, OneDrive, Box and Google Drive) or a file.  
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Integration with popular third-party apps providing maximum control, synergy and customizability, including Light Flow, Enhanced SMS & Caller ID, Cloud Print, Apex Launcher Pro, Nova Launcher / Tesla Unread, Executive Assistant, DashClock Widget, Tasker and more.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Push mail for most mail services (except Yahoo) and self-hosted IMAP servers, also for Exchange and Office 365 (corporate mail).

ADVANCED FEATURES:
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Home screen widgets including message counter and message list.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Use our Smart Folder feature to easily navigate and manage your emails. 
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Calendar sync for Exchange and Office 365 (use any Calendar app or widgets).
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Contacts sync for Exchange and Office 365  (visible in Aqua Mail and in the Contacts app. Includes auto-complete and lookup in the corporate directory).
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ The rich text editor, styling choices and a large number of formatting options, including embedding images will help you create the perfect email.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ With the signature support you can attach a separate signature to each mail account and include images, links and text formatting. 
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Notifications and reply via voice input from an Android Wear smartwatch.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Pick from the four available Themes and further customization options to change how the app looks and operates. 
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Separate network connection setting for WiFi and mobile data ensures optimum performance and cost-effectiveness.

PREMIUM FEATURES:
Get the most out of Aqua Mail by purchasing the Pro version and unlock: 
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Push mail for Exchange servers (corporate email) and Office 365.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Add multiple accounts.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Use identities.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Remove the Aqua Mail promo signature in outgoing messages.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Remove ads. 

PERMISSIONS:
With Aqua Mail you'll always be in control of the information you provide. Permissions will be requested only in the following cases:
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Storage ‚Äì Sending and saving attachments, Backup and Restore.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Contacts ‚Äì Sender images and autocompletion when writing messages. 
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Calendar ‚Äì Previews of event invites and rejecting or accepting them.

OS REQUIREMENTS: 
Android 4.0.3 or higher

CONTACT US: 
If you have any questions, feedback or suggestions please contact us directly at support@aqua-mail.com.

comments: Have been using this since it first came out with the Pro Unlocker. Did an update yesterday, now it tells me that the the Play Store does not recognize the License. So now I cannot use the full features. I use it for business purposes. On the website it now indicates that you need to buy the app for $29.99. At this point I am very disappointed and will use the Blue Mail app instead. Not to happy with this. BTW...I sent an email and 24hrs later still no response. RESOLVED bu Mobisystemsa

I really like the look and feel of this client, but I can't get it to open my individual emails. Maybe that's because of my account being with Startmail. I'd like some help from the creator(s), if you can. What I'm trying to accomplish is saving the entire contents of a folder, which has emails from a few years ago until now. The guy might die soon, so it's imperitave that I save it all. If I can make this happen, I will change it to 5 stars.

This is the email app I've been looking for. All the other ones I've tried suck. Mainly I was looking for maximum customizability. You can't go wrong with that! No problems or even anything to nit-pick so far. It feels like a quality email app, and for that I will pay up the premium fee. Brilliant stuff, I'm very satisfied! Edit: I had a problem which I contacted support with. They never replied but I guess the issue was fixed, I don't have the problem anymore. More communication would be nice.

Fantastic app, love it. It works as intended. It seems like the problem I experienced might have fixed itself. I guess there was some hiccups. If I ever experience it again, I'll try to check if I can fix it by changing some of the settings :)

It's worked flawlessly, which I need. Stable. It just works. I see it's really customizable, which is a bonus. Most important thing is that it syncs email reliably. That wasn't my experience with Boxer. Happy to pay for the ad-free version. Please don't ever sacrifice stability for features!

title: Invoice & Time Tracking - Zoho
description:
Zoho Invoice is an invoicing software that helps you craft beautiful invoices, automatically send payment reminders and get paid faster online.

Send and manage invoices from anywhere using your laptop / phone / tablet.

Get everything you'll ever need to manage your paperwork.

Quick invoicing

Create and send professional invoices in minutes and impress your customers.‚Äã

Easy time tracking

Effortlessly track time for projects and invoice your customers accordingly.

Online payments

Get paid faster and on time with online payment gateways.‚Äã

Automated reminders

Send friendly payment reminders to your customers and get paid on time.

Effortless expense management

Record all business expenses and know how much you're spending.

Insightful reports

Run reports in real-time and gain critical insights on your business performance.

Get Instant Notifications

Receive notifications immediately when your customers view an invoice, make payments, accept or decline estimates.
 
International Invoicing

Send invoices to your customers in their currency. Zoho Invoice is also multilingual and speaks 10 languages.

If you have any questions, get great customer support through phone, email or chat for free. We are eagerly waiting to help!

Email            support+mobile@zohoinvoice.com

Phone          +1888 900 9646

Live Chat      https://salesiq.zoho.com/zohocares/support/zohoinvoice

Help page    https://www.zoho.com/invoice/help/

 
Zoho Invoice mobile app is a supplement of the Zoho Invoice web application ( https://www.zoho.com/invoice ). Zoho Invoice is integrated with Google apps giving you more flexibility and convenience to invoice existing customers. Join thousands of freelancers and small business owners who have made their invoicing absolutely hassle-free with Zoho Invoice.
 
 
For news and updates you can follow us on Blog, Twitter and Facebook

* http://blogs.zoho.com/invoice

* https://twitter.com/zoho

* https://www.facebook.com/zoho

comments: So far, this is the most feature rich app I can find. Bulk printing and pretty much everything else you could need.

Is that makes it so easy that every time I go to any store to do an invoice I can do it on my phone and email it immediately. once you take a little time to set up all your basic stuff and standard things you can just click click click and you're done I love this app.

Easy to use except 1 thing, i can only have 1 user even though I have paid for the upgrade. When I try to add a second user is says I need to upgrade so I try to. Then it says already upgraded. Seriously? What the heck?
Been using this for a little more than a year and have been very pleased. Customer service has also been pretty responsive and helpful. Thanks!
Best invoice & estimates app I have ever used. It is easy & simple to use & has so many features. Thank you guys for working hard to provide this app.

title: SINC Workforce - Employee Time Clock
description:
SINC Workforce brings employee data collected from the field, back to your home base where you can leverage it to generate detailed reports, run payroll more accurately, improve job profitability and help reduce risk across your business by reducing disputes and legal actions. We provide a digital audit trail of where your workforce was at any given time, what jobs they were working on, what cost codes they were working, who was responsible for marking project tasks complete and every note and image uploaded from the field or the office.

Chose from either the free plan which includes the time clock and employee tracker features but limits you to a maximum of three users or go for one of our paid plans that include our project management and staff scheduling. 

All plans include access to both the mobile apps and the web version of SINC for true cross-platform, cloud-based access and our offline-first approach means that if you find yourself without an internet connection, your device will store data locally until a connection is established.

Employee Time Clock (free and paid plans)

‚óÜ Supports Weekly, Fortnightly, Monthly & Semi-Monthly pay periods
‚óÜ Write paychecks knowing your timesheet data is accurate
‚óÜ Timesheets are backed up with GPS location data during the shift
‚óÜ Input pay rates for your workforce and see gross payroll reports at a glance
‚óÜ Visual graphs showing total hours worked that pay period
‚óÜ Pay period attendance summaries of employee hours at a glance
‚óÜ Export detailed reports to pdf and excel to easily calculate overtime
‚óÜ Employees can add notes to their time card that are included in the reports
‚óÜ Push notifications of any timesheet edit mean transparent paychecks
‚óÜ Push notification for staff notes added to shifts
‚óÜ Option to be notified when specific members of your workforce clock in
‚óÜ Easily sync you time clock data to Xero UK, Australia and New Zealand.

Employee Tracker (free and paid plans)

‚óÜ See what staff are currently on shift at your home base and in the field
‚óÜ Staff tracker records GPS points during the shift only
‚óÜ Filter employee gps points by clock-in and clock-out

Project Management & Job Costing (paid plans only)

‚óÜ Track employee hours at both the project and cost code level
‚óÜ Easily gather data from fieldworkers for accurate cost accounting
‚óÜ Preloaded CSI MasterFormat cost codes for easy construction accounting
‚óÜ Manage job-specific tasks and punch lists
‚óÜ Assign specific cost code groups to your projects
‚óÜ Use task groups to share common task lists across projects
‚óÜ Quickly generate driving directions to jobs directly from the app
‚óÜ Generate project reports and export them to excel
‚óÜ Upload project notes that can include images

Staff Scheduling (paid plans only)

‚óÜ SINC is the perfect staff planner for fieldworkers
‚óÜ No more SMS back and forth to confirm times
‚óÜ Changes to the schedule are sent to the affected staff in real-time
‚óÜ Employee shift reminders reduce no shows on the job site
‚óÜ Add instructions through shift notes
‚óÜ Remind staff to clock out through automatic push notifications

If you choose to purchase the Starter, Growth or Enterprise plans, after the 1-month free trial the subscriptions will automatically renew for $14.99 USD/mth(Starter), $24.99 USD/mth (Growth) and $99.99 USD/mth (Enterprise) respectively unless the plan is cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the trial period. Prices are in US dollars and may vary in countries other than the US. Your Google Play account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to the subscriptions area of Google Play after purchase.

Support: support@sinc.business
Guides: http://help.sinc.business/en/
Web-version of SINC: https://users.sinc.business

Privacy: https://sinc.business/legal/privacy/
Terms: https://sinc.business/legal/terms-of-service/

recentChanges:
Simplified invites through QR code:
1. Admins can share the QR Code by going to Menu > Staff > Add Staff
2. Employees can scan the QR Code and sign up for a SINC account
3. Admins can then approve pending staff invites by going to Menu > Staff > Pending

- Various bug fixes and improvements.

If you are enjoying SINC please consider leaving us a review, they really help us a lot!
Thanks - The SINC Team
comments: There are many options out there for a good time clock system, I've tried many and this is the best. Easy to use and extremely helpful when you contact the developers with questions. Highly recommend!

I have come to relay on this app as the way to keep track of my employees‚Äô hours. Not only is it beneficial to me, but my guys also love it. Both employers and employees can reliably and with accountability for any changes, keep track of the time worked. In addition, it is super easy to use both on your phone and on a desktop so even the tech-unsavvy people end up adopting it easily. In construction it is hard to enforce your guys to use any system so the fact that my guys not only use it, but also love it is all I can ask for. I Definitely recommend this app!

I love this app! It is easy to navigate on both mobile and desktop. I can track where my employees are when they clock in and out. Creating a pdf timesheet is just a push of the button. Makes payroll time much, much faster! The service and support team is quick to respond and address your concerns. I highly recommend!

Sinc gave me an easy and convenient way to accurately track employee hours who were working remotely. Even for someone who is not technology savvy, the software was easy to use and time entry errors were easy to correct. I would have liked a way for employee to digitally sign once paid. I never got the GPS tracking to work, so it would be important to verify employee is on project location. I was still satisfied with how well it help solve the issue of tracking remotely working employees.

Great app! Before start using Sinc in my automotive paint business, I used at least 4-5 apps on the market and surprised to see how incomplete they are. Sinc is not like that. It's super user friendly, super fast, simple and functional. After loging in, it only takes me a second to see how many hours my employees make that week and write their checks.

title: iFax: Send fax from phone, receive fax for free
description:
KEY FEATURES
‚òÖ HIPAA-compliance ensures the security of your data.
‚òÖ Sign documents, fill forms, scan documents & send fax from your phone. You will never have to look for a fax machine again with iFax fax app!
‚òÖ Cloud storage platforms supported! Google Drive, Dropbox, Box are fully integrated.
‚òÖ Free unlimited outgoing fax!
‚òÖ Free incoming fax number! Get your own local or toll-free inbound fax plus number in the US, Canada, UK & many other countries with a FREE 7-day trial. Trial is valid for US numbers only.  
‚òÖ No account, personal or business details required to send fax & receive e fax.

iFax fax app is a go-to solution for effortless, lightning-fast online free faxing app that‚Äôs reliable, secure & incredibly low cost. You can send a fax from phone as easily you would send an email. No signup is necessary. With enterprise-grade fax technology & a rich suite of online features like document scanner & digital signatures, you don‚Äôt need to find a  fax machine to send or receive fax. Simply download iFax & make faxing simple.

As one of the best fax app, iFax provides an unparalleled faxing experience. A genius fax solution for your faxing needs!
 
BENEFITS
‚òÖ Pay-per-fax or buy credits or get a monthly subscription plan for extra discounts on outgoing fax
‚òÖ Refer our fax app to friends & send free fax
‚òÖ Select a free fax number for 7 days (available in US only)

GENERAL FEATURES
‚óè Document scanner and Photo Integration - You can fax images, fax photos, PDF fax, documents and files easily with iFax app. Use inbuilt tools to brighten backgrounds & darken text/foregrounds. Email, document, PDF & other file formats are supported.

‚óè Inbound Faxing App - Get your own fax number to receive incoming fax in the United States (Local or Toll-Free), Canada, UK (Local or Toll-Free), Australia, Germany, Italy, Spain, Israel & Turkey. Start receiving fax directly to your mobile through email. Download iFax to fax from phone.

‚óè Send & Receive Fax - Easy faxing procedure. Send & receive fax on-the-go. Upload files easily from your device, email or cloud storage to fax images, fax photo, fax document, PDF fax, & you can fax from phone internationally at ease. Get a fax number to receive a fax.

‚óè Cross Platform usage: iFax not only supports Android devices but you can also receive & send fax from iPhone. Just log onto your iPhone, mac or windows device with the same account & enjoy the best faxing experience.

‚óè Cloud Integration: Google Drive, Dropbox & Box are fully integrated. Transfer documents to include in your fax & easily sign before you send a fax from iPhone or Android.

‚óè Notifications & Fax confirmations: Real-time mobile fax notifications & status updates so you can keep track of your fax on iPhone & Android.

‚óè Professional, customizable cover page template In App: Customizable templates to send fax from phone. No printing required. Simple faxing. Add a logo, note & your signature on the cover page!

‚óè HIPAA Compliant: All the guidelines from HIPAA are duly complied with.

FAX COSTS
Cost of outgoing fax is determined by the number  of outbound pages (in 5-page increments) & destination. Nevertheless, the charge of sending page fax through iFax is much cheaper as compared to fax machines. You can purchase fax credits or subscribe to outbound subscription to send fax at heavily discounted prices. Pay with Google Wallet or Paypal.

For more details on costs & credits on outbound fax, please see the Price section.

iFax is an easy-to-use fax app that be can be used from the convenience of your mobile phone. It‚Äôs your on-the-go tiny fax machine. Once you go digital with iFax fax app, you can fax image and documents easily. Get rid of the bulky office fax machine & send fax from phone now!

Get iFax now & start faxing today.
