comments: Do not use! Stay away from downloading anything at all. I tried using the first day, it didnt work, several times, even though I kept getting an email saying fax was successful. I tried canceling, it kept freezing. They charged after 6 days, and was deceiving because on the 7th day I was unable to cancel through Google. In addition, they charge $99 on top of it all, and this is mentioned nowhere. I have requested the money back, I have yet to receive it. I contacted the credit card company.

Had app for less then 29 minutes before they took 166.00 out of my bank. When tried to cancel was forced to put in email verify so when you do that it gives you second number so they charge you for a year when your on 7 day free trial. I called google play they told me the developer already had the money they took out of my bank in hand. It's not Google it's the developer. I want my full refund.

Beware Beware, do not install this app is a horrible, it did not work when you cancel your 7-Day subscription it says restore and from reviews I see that they still charge and the company claim that Google is charging.. I canceled and they I sent me a message saying under review I contacted Google to make sure that they are canceled so that's your best bet that when you cancel them contact Google to make sure that they are will not be charging you $100 + fee...just make sure for yourself

Need to cancel? Go into your Subscriptions (applies to all stores). Manage your subscriptions and canel your subscription through the store you got the app on. The ways to canel through the website and app are NOT working and customer aupport will give you the run around.
Wasted so much time with this app. .it did not work at all, not once. I could not figure out what the problem was and it gave no explanation, very badly designed interface.

title: PrinterShare Premium Key
description:
Once installed, this Premium Key unlocks the premium features of the free PrinterShare Mobile Print application.
However, please note that it cannot be used on its own! One needs to install the main free PrinterShare Mobile Print app in order to print.


PrinterShare Mobile Print app supports a wide variety of HP (Officejet, LaserJet, Photosmart, Deskjet and other models including HP Officejet 100/150/200/250 Mobile series and HP Officejet H470), Epson (Artisan, WorkForce, Stylus and other series), Canon (PIXMA MP/MX/MG and other series), Brother, Kodak, Samsung, Dell, Ricoh, Lexmark, Kyocera, OKI and other printers including legacy networkable. A full list of supported printers available at http://printershare.com/help-mobile-supported.sdf. You can also print to unsupported and legacy printers with our free computer software for Mac and Windows available at http://printershare.com.


Here is the list of printers supported by PrinterShare app:
http://www.printershare.com/help-mobile-supported.sdf
Make sure that your printer is supported. Also, please print a test page before purchasing this Premium Key.


With PrinterShare you can instantly print Office documents, bills and invoices (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, text files and more) directly from your tablet or phone (from internal memory, SD card or cloud source such as Google Drive / Google Docs) to a printer right next to you or anywhere in the world!

Premium Features:

* Unlimited Nearby direct printing via Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and USB without PC;
* Unlimited Remote printing. The receiving end (Windows or Mac) would not have to buy pages or subscribe;


Have a good print!

title: Invoice Maker ‚Äì estimate, invoices and receipt app
description:
SpeedInvoice is the #1 rated invoice maker!

SpeedInvoice is an invoice maker with web access so you can use it from a computer or from a phone or tablet. You can work with your colleagues when you create invoices, estimates or receipts. You can profile your business with your logo and a flexible design to create great looking business invoices. SpeedInvoice is invoicing on the go!

Best looking invoices!
With SpeedInvoice you choose from +500 background images when setting up your invoice app. You can sign your documents, as well as let your customers sign for acceptance or delivery. You can email, print or share any bill or estimate. Share with other apps such as Facebook, WhatsApp or SMS. You have an invoicing template with a professional design that can be sent as a PDF or JPG. SpeedInvoice makes your business invoices look great, and is a simple invoice and estimate app.

Securely Stored
With SpeedInvoice as your invoice generator your data is securely stored and automatically backed up. If your phone is lost, stolen or breaks, everything will be available when you download the invoice app again. Many invoice and billing apps only save your data on your phone, so if you lose your phone you also lose every bill. With SpeedInvoice you do not take that risk.

A quick overview
‚Ä¢ Invoice from your phone, tablet or computer, work on your own or together with colleagues in this bill maker
‚Ä¢ Create unique invoices for business or estimates with more than 500 background images for your invoice template
‚Ä¢ Upload your own background image for you bills and estimates
‚Ä¢ Add your logo or signature to your bill and estimate
‚Ä¢ Share an invoice & estimate via all apps capable of sharing (sms, mms, Skype, Whatsapp, etc)
‚Ä¢ Use the integrated reports to check on your sales, customers, payments, items or report on sales tax invoices. You can also create accounting and bookkeeping documents
‚Ä¢ Easy and quick ways of looking at your invoices & estimates by customer or in categories such as ‚ÄúUnpaid‚Äù or ‚ÄúOverdue‚Äù
‚Ä¢ If you are offline you can create invoices but you can only send them when you are online
‚Ä¢ Add photos when invoicing
‚Ä¢ Copy old invoices and estimates to work quicker
‚Ä¢ Add contractual terms, drawings or project plans in Word, Excel and PDFs to any invoice and estimate
‚Ä¢ Import and export data to Excel
‚Ä¢ Receive a copy of all invoices and estimates to your company email address
‚Ä¢ Select from 35 languages and any currency 
‚Ä¢ You can convert an estimate to an invoice
‚Ä¢ Flexible pricing
‚Ä¢ Record item cost and report on profitability
‚Ä¢ Sales Tax can be disabled or enabled when invoicing
‚Ä¢ Multiple Sales Tax rates for items with a summary on each tax invoice
‚Ä¢ Capture the signature of your customer on invoices and estimates with your phone or tablet
‚Ä¢ Full payment functionality including pre- and part payments and credits when invoicing
‚Ä¢ Set credit terms per customer
‚Ä¢ Send out receipts or include payments when invoicing
‚Ä¢ Print the invoice and estimate from your PC, Mac or your phone


Free trial
SpeedInvoice is the leader among invoice apps. You can try it for free to see if it fits your business. After the free trial an annual subscription cost US$4.60 per month. We believe it will help you win more business and spend less time with your paperwork.

SpeedInvoice has the following English languages: US, UK, Australia, India, New Zeeland, South Africa. Business invoices needs the correct terms for VAT, GST and Sales Tax.

‚Ä¢ Use the integrated reports to check on your sales, customers, payments, items or report on sales tax invoices. You can also create accounting and bookkeeping documents
‚Ä¢ Easy and quick ways of looking at your invoices & estimates by customer or in categories such as ‚ÄúUnpaid‚Äù or ‚ÄúOverdue‚Äù
‚Ä¢ If you are offline you can create invoices but you can only send them when you are online
‚Ä¢ Add photos when invoicing
‚Ä¢ Copy old invoices and estimates to work quicker
‚Ä¢ Add contractual terms, drawings or project plans in Word, Excel and PDFs to any invoice and estimate
‚Ä¢ Import and export data to Excel
‚Ä¢ Receive a copy of all invoices and estimates to your company email address
‚Ä¢ Select from 35 languages and any currency
‚Ä¢ You can convert an estimate to an invoice
‚Ä¢ Flexible pricing
‚Ä¢ Record item cost and report on profitability
‚Ä¢ Sales Tax can be disabled or enabled when invoicing
‚Ä¢ Multiple Sales Tax rates for items with a summary on each tax invoice
‚Ä¢ Capture the signature of your customer on invoices and estimates with your phone or tablet
‚Ä¢ Full payment functionality including pre- and part payments and credits when invoicing
‚Ä¢ Set credit terms per customer
‚Ä¢ Send out receipts or include payments when invoicing
‚Ä¢ Print the invoice and estimate from your PC, Mac or your phone


Free trial
SpeedInvoice is the leader among invoice apps. You can try it for free to see if it fits your business. After the free trial an annual subscription cost US$4.60 per month. We believe it will help you win more business and spend less time with your paperwork.

SpeedInvoice has the following English languages: US, UK, Australia, India, New Zeeland, South Africa. Business invoices needs the correct terms for VAT, GST and Sales Tax.

comments: So great, makes my end of wk a piece of cake, really love it. The only problem I've had is if I need to edit a entry, when I long press the entry to get to edit, it takes me to a screen with all entries....the entry I want to edit should be on top but it's not. You have to spend time going through entries to find the one you need to edit. Fix this problem and you'll have 5 stars from me!

I highly recommend this app. I was apprehensive at first, as most are anymore, however, that feeling was replaced with a smile. This app is PERFECT for the self employed service based business, & small bus. owner. Fast & easy to learn & navigate. Wish I had known about this app sooner. When I had a ? it was answered promptly. It may not be for everybody, but I am very happy. I'm more organized, I get invoices out MUCH quicker. Phone to computer access is WONDERFUL. Thanks guys, KUTGW!!!!!

Speedinvoice is the best. Speedinvoice thank you for making my life so easy. Now I have more time to to actually focus on work. It's so awesome that after a qoute is done just before you send it to the customer that you can actually see your profit. I'm definitely signing up to be a permanent a subscriber. Your customers service is fast & friendly. What more can a small business owner ask for.

more option for payment 3 months,6 months,12 months 9‚Ç¨ per month very expensive for self employment (maybe consider separate payment for self employment and companies ),for this price per month just add map for customers then ill give you 10 stars easy ;) Update after answer: thank you will think about it but still no change on payment plans after a year of using it Was using this app for a year have gone to some other..developer must thing more about customer maybe he will have more subs üëã

SpeedInvoice has made doing business with my customers so much easier. Simple forms and the ability to update accounts quickly relieves a lot of stress trying to run a business and keep track of invoices. Thank you!

title: Simple Scan - Free PDF Scanner App
description:
Want a moving scanner?

The Simple Scanner is a PDF document scanner application that turns your phone into a portable scanner. you can scan documents, photos, receipts, reports, or just about anything. The scan will be saved to the device in image or PDF format. Name and organize your scan to a folder, or share it in the following ways:


 -Automatically upload JPG and PDF files to the cloud disk
 -Backup and restore synchronization files between multiple devices
¬†- E-mail, print, Fax
¬†- Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, WhatsApp, or more
¬†- Wifi connects directly to your computer
 - Support importing PDF files into JPG.
 - Support for adding tags for quick file search.
 - Support OCR text recognition, export text.




Support system: Android 4.4 and above

The Document Scanner application has all the features you need:

- Mobile phone document, automatically remove the clutter background, generate high-definition JPEG pictures or PDF files.
- A variety of image processing mode, you can manually adjust the image parameters, with a mobile phone can be paper documents, quickly turned into a clear electronic draft.
- Scan color, grayscale, or black and white
- Can be used in office, school, home and any place you want
- Automatically detects page edges
- 5 levels of contrast for clear monochrome text
- Set the PDF page size (Letter, Legal, A4, etc.)
- Thumbnail or list view, sorted by date or title
- Simple scanner are optimized to run very fast.
- Quick search by document title
- Use a password to protect your documents
- General - A single application that works on your phone!

If you like simple scanner or have any other comments, please take a moment to write us a comment, or simply email us at simple.scanner@outlook.com, which will help us improve our products and give you a better experience. .

comments: Last time I used this app I remember it being great, this time (several months later) I am greeted basically no functionality in the app unless you upgrade to the pro version or pay an in app purchase. Basically this app is no longer free from what it seems. It's also littered with ads, including ones that randomly pop up and fill the whole screen. Unfortunate.

Well, I'm waiting for the pop-up adds and upsell, but so far, they haven't come. I use this kind of app for many things. I find it quite convenient and much nicer that many comparable apps. The app I used to use has become loaded with bloatware, pop-ups and it takes way too long to get anything done. This app far exceeds them. I highly recommend Simple Scan and will do so with word-of-mouth as well.

So far for my work requirements from the app. It does really well and recalls old documents as well in case. Keeps each time I access separate which I need. No need to clean sheet it. It does it on its own for me. I just keep taking pictures and it stores, sends as I need. Simple, effective, cool.

App is simple. Too many intrusive ads. Ads will pop out and make it difficult to look at or do anything. Instead of locking up more advanced features to paying customers, the developer appears to have decided to serve ads almost to the point that free version is unusable. It would be nice if the developer could keep the basic part of the app without ads popping out.

Does exactly what it says. Plus it's still free unlike majority of all the other similar apps that started of free but now want to charge for the same service. So would rather use this app which does exactly the same as them but for free. Hopefully this won't start charging once it gets a loyal customer base.

title: Fax app: scan & send fax from phone with Turbo Fax
description:
Your 1st fax page is free!  Turbo Fax turns your device into a powerful fax machine for any documents, IDs, etc. Easily scan your multipage documents or import existing PDFs and fax them instantly anywhere. Get fax delivery notifications.

Turbo Fax is powerful yet extremely easy to use. Only we offer 1st page for free so you could try it out. 

Features of Turbo Fax:
‚Ä¢ Scan documents or open PDFs from Mail, cloud apps or gallery to fax.
‚Ä¢ Instant fax delivery notification.
‚Ä¢ Professional fax cover page.
‚Ä¢ Fax archive with ability to resend.
‚Ä¢ Scan with auto edge detection, perspective correction and shadow removal.
‚Ä¢ Send faxes to over 40 countries at the same price.
‚Ä¢ Your purchased fax pages never expire on all your devices.

Turbo Fax scan feature accurately detects page edges, crops and straightens the document, while removing shadows and setting the perfect contrast ‚Äì black on white - to ensure your faxes look professional on the other end.

Cost:
We don't use confusing credits like others, but fax page packages instead:
‚Ä¢ 2-page package: $1.65 ($0.83/fax page).
‚Ä¢ 5-page package: $2.95 ($0.59/fax page).
‚Ä¢ 15-page package: $6.95 ($0.46/fax page).
‚Ä¢ 30-page package: $10.95 ($0.37/fax page).
‚Ä¢ Same price for domestic & international faxes.

If you have any problems or questions with Turbo Fax, please email us at android@turboscanapp.com so we can help you.

comments: Awful. If it is important, do not use this app. I had to send a very important fax, about a job, that had a deadline. Downloaded because I could not find a fax close enough. It didn't work. I sent an email for help and was replied to very quickly, within minutes. I did what I was told, it charged my account, fax still not sent. I emailed back. No reply, even though Matt told me to let him know. Lost out. Thanks a lot Turbo Fax. I will be uninstalling as soon as this posts.

It says you get one free page, that is a cover sheet that I don't even need, and I can't delete the cover page. I only need to send two pages and it's asking me to pay for both pages. Also, I have to re scan the document I can't use the scanned document already in my files. Even though it says import, I cannot get to it to send. I am deleting the app.

I rarely write reviews, an app has to be really great for me to rate it. This app is awesome. While you do have to pay to send the fax, you only have to pay for the pages you send when you send them. This app has made things very easy for me, I don't have to go anywhere and try to find a fax machine, I can simply take pictures on my phone. This is a great convenience as I have an infant.

Faxes send quickly and accurately. This app saves me the trouble of going to an office supply store to send an antiquated fax... Can't believe people still use this method instead of snapping a pic and messaging or emailing it. Nonetheless, this app works!

As Long As My Fax Was Received On The Recipient End , Thats All It Matters !!! But There Needs To Be An Option With A Confirmation Be Sent Back To The Sender Just To Make Sure The Fax Was Received And Stamped !! Otherwise Very Good ,Please Keep The Updates Coming !!!

title: OfficeSuite Pro + PDF
description:
This is the full-feature PRO version of the award-winning OfficeSuite application that lets you easily view, edit, and create Word, Excel, and PowerPoint documents, convert to PDF, and manage your files.

‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ The most downloaded office app on Google Play
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Delivers the most exclusive features over any other office app
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Installed on 200 million devices in 195 countries and growing
‚ÄÉ
Preloaded by top manufacturers including Sony, Amazon, Acer, Alcatel, Toshiba, Sharp, Kyocera and more.

GOOGLE PLAY EDITORS‚Äô CHOICE
INFOWORLD'S TOP MOBILE OFFICE
LIFEHACKER'S BEST ANDROID OFFICE APP
PCMAG EDITORS‚Äô CHOICE AWARD

KEY FEATURES:
‚Ä¢View, create and edit complex office documents using a familiar desktop-style interface
‚Ä¢Full compatibility with Microsoft formats including DOC, DOCX, DOCM, XLS, XLSX, XLSM, PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX, PPTM, PPSM
‚Ä¢Support for PDF files including PDF camera scanning, Export to PDF and Fillable forms
‚Ä¢Additional support for common formats like RTF, TXT, LOG, CSV, EML, ZIP; (Open Office - ODT, ODS and ODP - support available as in-app purchase)
‚Ä¢Integrated with File Commander for advanced synchronization and quick and easy access to both local and remote files
‚Ä¢MobiSystems Drive - you can now store up to 15.0 GB of documents in the cloud
‚Ä¢NEW! OfficeSuite Chats ‚Äì Chat and exchange documents with your friends and colleagues
‚Ä¢Integrated spell checker -  Available in more than 40 languages the spell checker guarantees that your work in Documents, Slides and Sheets is impeccably written 
‚Ä¢Sharing via cloud services like OfficeSuite Drive, Box, DropBox, Google Drive, OneDrive, as well as over email and Bluetooth
‚Ä¢PDF security and editing features including digital signatures support, permissions management, text to PDF, and annotations
‚Ä¢Text-to-Speech support for documents and PDFs
‚Ä¢View documents the way they're meant to be seen with the Japanese, Extended and Extended & Japanese Font Pack (available as an add-on)
‚Ä¢Create a profile and sync your settings across all your Android, iOS and Windows Desktop (OfficeSuite Personal license) devices
‚Ä¢Chromecast dual screen support
‚Ä¢Available in 56 languages

THE LATEST OFFICESUITE IS SPECIALLY DESIGNED AROUND ANDROID Q AND ALSO INCLUDES:
‚Ä¢NEW! With OfficeSuite Chats you can easily send documents, collaborate with colleagues or simply chat with your friends on the go
‚Ä¢NEW! Sign into OfficeSuite Now using a phone number

‚Ä¢Open multiple documents and work on two documents simultaneously using split-screen mode with drag-and-drop support (Android 7 and up)
‚Ä¢Open documents or create new ones faster than ever with the new Quick access notification drawer
‚Ä¢With the enhanced mouse support for Chromebooks users can now work faster and easier than ever
‚Ä¢Choose between beautiful new themes to create great presentations
‚Ä¢Protect individual sheets and cells in Spreadsheets for extra security
‚Ä¢Cast presentations across multiple devices on the same network with Share Cast
‚Ä¢Use Quick Sign to easily sign a PDF using your digital signature

HOW IS OFFICESUITE PRO BETTER THAN OFFICESUITE FREE?
‚Ä¢ Security features - work with password protected files
‚Ä¢ Format Painter in Word documents
‚Ä¢ Track changes with multiple author support
‚Ä¢ Insert pictures using your camera or from an external file
‚Ä¢ Additional options in Excel including Insert Filter, Conditional Formatting, Define Name, Import Image, Edit Chart, and Save as CSV
‚Ä¢ Interactive form support for PDFs: checkboxes, radio buttons, text fields, etc.
‚Ä¢ Legacy Microsoft document formats support (.DOC, .XLS, .PPT) along with .ODF formats

comments: This app has been very helpful in the past when I paid for the Pro version. But for the last year, I have to spend extra time closing out these ads for the other products/upgrades/etc that are offered. Finally get past this just to get reminded about Font packs that don't exist or whatever. Tap "don't ask again" for the hundredth time, and finally I can look at my documents. Time to start searching for another app.

it's the only app I use to edit all documents, but it often lags when typing & has a few oddities like won't delete when using SwiftKey keyboard. The best thing is that it converts any Microsoft doc to pdf & also allows pdf editing. it's also one of few apps that converts apple's .pages docs into Word .docx for when my clients only have Apple (annoying) products

Please enter 2020 by using smart quotes! I like this app but my docs are riddled with supposed misspelled. Spellcheck is useless because of this. Otherwise there would be seamless integration with documents form other apps. I'd give 5 stars because of features and NOT forcing me to use a proprietary cloud service. Instead, I'm always looking for an alternative. What's the hold up?

If I wanted ads, I would have picked the "free" version. Keeps pestering the user with promotions of even cooler product options. Not once, not twice but nearly every second run. Sure, you want to endorse the "premium" version, but there should be a setting to hide these ads for optional components or ban them to some submenu. The menu is also cluttered with promotional items at the top. In terms of the advertised functionality the app does what it claims it does.

Used to love it...I purchased this app because I was impressed with it. I have used Documents 2 Go forever and found that I liked this more. They did regular updates and it works. My irritation and reasoning behind a one star is that I get annoyed with a popup to purchase their Premium package that is an additional $20/yr. I get it, you need to make more money. Fine, BUT don't annoy customers who paid for the app with constant popups to pay more money! BAD BAD marketing decision.

title: Free Employee Scheduler & Time Tracker by Homebase
description:
HOMEBASE HELPS WITH:

üìÖ Building and sharing your schedule: Everyone can view their most up-to-date work schedule, submit their availability, see who‚Äôs free to cover shifts, and request trades.

‚è∞ Time tracking: Employees can clock in and out for shifts right from the mobile app or on computers or tablets in your office. Managers can easily track breaks, overtime, and timesheets for payroll.  

üëè Managing employee performance: Employees get helpful reminders of upcoming shifts, and managers get notified if employees are late, miss clock-outs, or reach overtime.

üó£ Improving team communication: Our built-in messaging keeps your team in sync without exchanging phone numbers. 

üìà Tracking business performance: Get a real-time view of your labor costs and sales‚Äîfrom anywhere. 

‚öñÔ∏è Labor law compliance: Get help to stay compliant with labor and scheduling laws and  protect your business from fines and lawsuits.


EMPLOYEES CAN:
‚Ä¢ Clock in and out on their smartphones
‚Ä¢ View their up-to-date work schedule
‚Ä¢ View the hours they‚Äôve worked and estimated earnings
‚Ä¢ Request and accept shift trades & covers
Submit their availability and time-off requests
‚Ä¢ Create group chats and chat with teammates in real time
‚Ä¢ Receive shift reminders so they‚Äôre on time for shifts
‚Ä¢ Manage their contact and profile information
‚Ä¢ Sign in with mobile phone number or email address

MANAGERS CAN:
‚Ä¢ Build team work schedules from the in-app schedule maker
‚Ä¢ View team availability and time-off requests while building the shift schedule 
‚Ä¢ View clock-in status of employees, and add or edit employee timecards
‚Ä¢ Check sales, scheduled labor costs, actual labor costs, and labor as a % of sales right in the team management app
‚Ä¢ See who's available to be called in to work and easily contact them
‚Ä¢ Message employees in real time in one-on-one or group chats
‚Ä¢ Get alerts when employees are late or reach overtime
‚Ä¢ Use Homebase on the web to set up advanced policies, controls, and permissions

Homebase integrates with popular payroll providers to make running payroll a breeze. Employee timesheets are automatically formatted for easy import.

Gusto
Intuit Quickbooks Online Payroll
Square Payroll
Heartland
ADP 
SurePayroll
And more

Homebase also integrates with leading point-of-sale systems, so your employees can clock in and out for shifts right from your POS.

Clover
Square
Toast
Revel
Lightspeed
Upserve 
And more

Homebase provides US-based phone, email, and chat support free to all businesses, and our mobile app is free for managers and employees. To learn more, visit joinhomebase.com.

recentChanges: NEW: Subscribe to the Plus plan right from the app
comments: The app has potential but needs a lot of work. The chat automatically refreshea and sends you to the bottom and is VERY VERY ANNOYING when you are trying to scroll up to read missed texts and ppl are typing at the same time. It honestly made me very angry at times. Another thing is that I see a lot of "unsupported message type" in the chats and I have no idea what that means. The all isn't bad but a lot of basic features needs a refresh ASAP.

The app keeps crashing ever since the new update. I cannot see anything my coworkers type, nor can I respond to them. I've tried everything and the app is still broken. It worked great before the new update, I just wish I could use it again.

App works smooth enough, I'm an employee. Some bugs on the full day schedule, minor stuff. Big problem I have is the app isnt sending notifications out for chat messages. Notification settings are correct on app info, any info on how to fix this problem?

Glitchy, notifications of the same messages over and over. Shift trades disappear before they get approved. Been using this app for the past year. Now I'm not getting any notification about employee messages
This app is amazing it's helped me in so many ways I absolutely love that I can keep up with my coworkers and bosses plus having your schedule at all times it is extremely handy.

comments: I really enjoyed working with this app at first, but i designed a poster and when i export the design to a png format file all images pixelated in final result, is this happened because i use free or is the way it is?!, i decided to uninstall the app, please answer me.
A good app. My suggestion is for them to encourage freelance designer to add new designs and pay them commissions for paid designs. For apps such as this one, contents is important.
Without any login we can't do anything. Atleast let the user try any one image so that they can judge and move forward if they want.
Really nice app. So many cool options to choose from even in the free version!!

I have used Adobe Lightroom/Adobe Photoshop in the past to create graphics and logos for my art business and my book covers. These designs would take FOREVER to create not even counting the time it takes to figure them out. This app does pretty much everything these pro tools do with easy to use features that help you access a library of royalty free design elements, fonts, and templates. If you can afford it, it's the best. Cross platform to tablet & PC too! Do the free trial, u wont regret it

title: XactRemodel GO - Quickly build winning bids
description:
XactRemodel GO is a mobile tool for rapid estimating that helps contractors win more bids and maximize profits.

Supported by a regularly updated, localized price database of over 10,000 line items, XactRemodel GO helps you build competitive, profitable estimates inside an easy to use app. If you need to modify your estimate, you can adjust unit cost and markup for every line item. 

Build estimates faster and track their status with XactRemodel GO‚Äôs professionally designed templates and estimate-management tools.

Use XactRemodel GO to:
  - Build estimates line item by line item
  - Generate shareable, company-branded proposals from your mobile device
  - Precisely estimate material and labor prices
  - Track estimate status
  - Contact homeowners from within the app

Start a 30-day free trial today

title: HoursTracker: Time tracking for hourly work
description:
OVER 120,000 PEOPLE track their time and pay using HoursTracker ¬Æ. Try it today, and find out why it's the best and most highly-rated time tracker in Google Play!

Easily track your time and earnings, whether you're an hourly employee, a contractor, or you just want to better manage your working hours.

QUICK AND EASY time entry and editing make time tracking painless

‚Ä¢ Record time using timers, complete with support for Breaks and Pauses

‚Ä¢ Track your pay, including Tips, Mileage, and flexible ¬± time and earnings adjustments

‚Ä¢ Pick any time to start, stop, break or pause the timer (7 minutes ago, 10 minutes from now, whatever you need)

‚Ä¢ Set job locations and get clock in and out reminders when you arrive or leave or fully automate your time tracking (geofencing)

‚Ä¢ Manually enter time entries with minimal effort thanks to smart, adaptive defaults

‚Ä¢ Enter comments of any length with your time entries and optionally include them in your exports

‚óÜ ADVANCED FEATURES and customization set HoursTracker above the rest

‚Ä¢ Automatic daily and weekly overtime earnings calculations

‚Ä¢ Built-in reports by Day, Week, and Month and support for most common pay period schedules

‚Ä¢ Robust tagging and filtering allow you to build your own custom views

‚Ä¢ Reminders when you've worked your target number of hours per day (even takes time rounding into account)

‚Ä¢ Automatic time rounding: up, down, or to nearest (including 6 min)

‚Ä¢ Ongoing notification lets you view time on the clock, even clock out take a break without launching the app

‚Ä¢ CSV and formatted text export

‚Ä¢ Cloud-based backup/restore with one re-usable backup slot included free (free account sign up is required)

‚Ä¢ Web-based reporting access, including charts, graphs, desktop exports, and rolling backups available with optional subscription

‚Ä¢ Customize your HoursTracker experience in the Preferences section under the More tab. Choose only one or many jobs clocked in at a time, opt-into prompts for comments, choose an elapsed time format (hours:minutes, or decimal hours), and more

"Free Edition" stores up to 3 jobs and 21 days of entries. For unlimited entries, upgrade to the "Personal" (up to 5 jobs) or "Pro" (unlimited jobs) edition. Or, erase older data and continue to use the "Free Edition" until you're ready to buy.

Visit our website at http://www.hourstrackerapp.com to learn more, and follow @HoursTracker on Twitter or facebook.com/HoursTracker to hear about upcoming features first.

If you have a question, problem, or need help, please send us a support request via e-mail.

recentChanges: Fix job ordering in exports to be alphabetical instead of in order the jobs were created.
comments: Amazing!!! Was looking for something like this to track my hours, works amazing, like that you can adjust/add times if you need to aswell..

I love this app. It's very user friendly and easy to navigate. I like that you can customize and track your pay periods. The GPS/location clock in/ out capability is a major bonus- especially for someone like me who forgets. I initially started using the free version and after 2 weeks (which I believe is how many entries you can input with that version), realized it was going to be something I'd need/ use and bought the full version. Highly reccomend!

Overall great tool for managing your hours worked between several different jobs. Provides several options for adjusting overtime pay rate, and inputting no-taxable items like Meal Perdium. My only complaint would be that I seem to be unable to calculate hours worked in a week collectively amongst several different jobs, for the purposes of calculating overtime pay this app will only give you the overtime PER job.

Love this App, I've been using it for over a year now, it helps me keeping track of my hours worked. There's only one thing I reckon it's missing, I would love to be able to set a Weekend rate for every job I have in my account... I still need to manually change the pay rate every time I finish work on Saturday/Sunday. Hopefully dev can do something about it at some point :)

I use this app to track the hours I spend working on different projects and it has made the process so much simpler. The ability to make adjustments, pause and add breaks and comments all help me keep my timesheet accurate for my own sake and the sake of my clients.

title: Simple Scan Pro - PDF scanner
description:
Want a moving scanner?

The Simple Scanner is a PDF document scanner application that turns your phone into a portable scanner. you can scan documents, photos, receipts, reports, or just about anything. The scan will be saved to the device in image or PDF format. Name and organize your scan to a folder, or share it in the following ways:

 - Automatically upload JPG and PDF files to the cloud disk .
 - Backup and restore synchronization files between multiple devices .
 - E-mail, print , Fax, OCR, Tag Other functions.
 - Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, WhatsApp, or more .
 - Wifi connects directly to your computer.
 - Support importing PDF files into JPG.
 - Support for adding tags for quick file search.
 - Support OCR text recognition, export text.


The latest version of the support file is saved on the SD card.


Support system: Android 4.4 and above

The Document Scanner application has all the features you need:

- Mobile phone document, automatically remove the clutter background, generate high-definition JPEG pictures or PDF files.
- A variety of image processing mode, you can manually adjust the image parameters, with a mobile phone can be paper documents, quickly turned into a clear electronic draft.
- Scan color, grayscale, or black and white
- Can be used in office, school, home and any place you want
- Automatically detects page edges
- 5 levels of contrast for clear monochrome text
- Set the PDF page size (Letter, Legal, A4, etc.)
- Thumbnail or list view, sorted by date or title
- Simple scanners are optimized to run very fast.
- Quick search by document title
- Use a password to protect your documents
- General - A single application that works on your phone!

If you like simple scanners or have any other comments, please take a moment to write us a comment, or simply email us at simple.scanner@outlook.com, which will help us improve our products and give you a better experience. .

comments: Ok, so I needed to store my documents on an SD card, therefore I had to purchase the premium version. $7.99AUD, not a lot but when you expect the premium version to be better than the normal free one and it's worse, per s√©, useless, I get a wee bit ticked off. The dozen or so documents I had scanned on the free version have disappeared without a trace. I'm hoping for a refund but the money has probably disappeared too. DON'T BUY IT.

The app worked great for a while and then became faulty after use of more than a month. The issues: the app would switch off at random points. The screen would go black. Now it is not uploading the JPEGs I am taking to my Onedrive. It just says Simple Scanner Pro is running. I would suggest using an app that is a bit more reliable as taking photos is essential for my work as an archivist and I spend just as much time trying to get the app to work as I do researching and documenting!

Nice easy app to use that does what it says it should. It has been very useful both personally and professionally. Just one thing to say about the current version, the way in which you're able to adjust the scan area after you take a photograph is better than previously as it is more accurate but the older and slightly less accurate way was a lot quicker. I think mostly that quicker is better than more accurate. Could we have the option to use either? Maybe we already do and I didn't notice.

Clean and easy to use, does all what one expects it to do. Automatic detection of the document border in the picture is slighty off, by only a few pixels, but that is only a minor annoyance. Will never look back to camscanner, ever.
App is easy enough to use. But I paid to upgrade to pro in order to fax. Now I have to pay more money for coins to fax. Doesn't make much sense to me....

title: Hours Tracker: Keep work log, work day timesheet
description:
Work Hours Tracker helps you track your work time and easily keep a work log. Simple, straightforward and organized.

The perfect work hours tracker and time clock for self-employed, freelancers, contractors, hourly workers and employees. Calculate your earnings, invoice or next pay stub.

Tracked work hours can be exported as an Excel time-sheet, submitted to payroll or used to draft your invoices.

Key Benefits:
‚Ä¢ Save time and maintain accuracy with automatic hour tracker. Done via location/GPS. Turn ON/OFF as you see fit, or adjust when it'll activate.
‚Ä¢ Stay organized by keeping track of work hours and seeing reports by pay period, week or month
‚Ä¢ Earn your full due, by easily keeping track of daily and overtime hours and pay
‚Ä¢ Reduce the clutter and hassle in your life with simple one-click time calculator
‚Ä¢ View how long you've been working at a glance with notification widget

How it works:
You can use the app in three ways:
‚Ä¢ Use automatic hours tracker and the app will keep track of how long you've been at each work location.
‚Ä¢ Punch in when you start workday and punch out when your work is finished. You can also track any breaks you take during this period.
‚Ä¢ Simply add a new time entry. Define the start and end and you're good to go.


Your work log hours are saved to your account and backed up to the cloud. This data is simply for your timesheet reference and not used by us for any other purpose.


Ideal work hour tracker for people that work with multiple clients or jobs, e.g: trades professionals, contractors, accountants, lawyers, self-employed, construction...

‚Ä¢ Flexible work hours tracker; time calculator for single or multiple jobs

When generating a time-sheet you can decide to export data for a specific project/job and a mixture of time periods: current workday, week, or pay period. Giving you the flexibility to export the work hours you want.

The generated file will include all information. It will also include times in decimal format.

‚Ä¢ Save time and reuse information

Information like clients, projects and hourly rates are saved and re-used automatically. Keeping your work log up to date has never been so easy.

‚Ä¢ Automatic work hours tracker via location
The GPS hours tracker is designed to be efficient with your battery usage and easily adjustable:
- define when GPS time tracker is running: which days of the week, from to what time of day
- manually turn automatic hours tracker ON or OFF with a touch of a button (automatic time clock)
- an icon in the notification bar will show up when the hour tracker is running so you know what's going on
For privacy purposes, your general location log is only kept on your own device. Only time blocks that you save are backed-up to the server.

‚Ä¢ View earnings:
- by month, week, workday, custom pay period (e.g: bi-weekly)
- as time-sheet for individual project
Daily and weekly overtime work hours and rates are tracked and applied automatically. Set up when overtime kicks in via the settings.

‚Ä¢ Sharable time-sheet

You can share your work log as an attachment. Email it, text or use a messaging app. You can also simply keep it as a spreadsheet file, used with Excel, Sheets or OpenOffice.

If you have Google Drive, Dropbox or similar apps installed on your phone, you can save your time-sheet straight to these services.

‚Ä¢ Safe backup with cloud sync

Your work log information is all automatically synced to the cloud, so you can work and get paid worry free!
Using your hour tracker for work but suddenly have to restart your phone? or run out of power? No problem! The timer will keep on running and you won't lose your work log no matter what!

‚Ä¢ Who is work hours tracker for?

Our hour tracker is for contractors, business owners, self-employed, hourly employees and freelancers, anyone who would need to track work hours using a work time clock app.

Hours Tracker is made by Time Squared co. Send us your feedback!

developerAddress: 2008 Rosser Ave, Unit 2106, Burnaby, BC, V5C 0H8, Canada
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Resolved minor issues
comments: Love this thing its so easy to use. My lawnmower does not have a hour meter on it so I use this to keep track of the time the motor is running. Also when the oil changes are done. So if I go to sell it I can show the time it has been ran also that maintenance has been done during to proper timetable. To try and get the most I can get.

Great app, keeps track of your pay amt. as well as your hours, say if u go in at 7am & get off at 4pm daily u can do all your hours for the week at the beginning if you want. If u end up getting off earlier you can definately change it later. They have a free version or a paid one, the paid one will keep popping up asking you to pay, hit the back button to continue using the free version. I love it its definatly helpful, they have the option to manually enter or hit button to log in &out.

I love the app. I like the suggestion about double taps or something to prevent accidental punches. I hate the auto tracking. Would love to see an improved importing into Excel so that I can make totals easier. For example, I don't know an easy way to total the hours worked without manually going in and changing the value to a number. And maybe add web access.

I absolutely love this app. It's super simple to use and extremely helpful for someone that works independently. I'm a nanny and it's really nice to just put my hours on here and have it calculate it all for me then let me send a report to the family I work for instead of sitting down and having to figure it all out and hoping there's no errors. I would highly recommend!! 10/10

I work outside all day and I have to keep track of my own hours and turn them in weekly for payroll and this app works great! Keeps my weeks in order, lets me leave notes on my accout and records the time that I spend at each account if i want it to, super easy to navigate. If you guys decide to update it don't take amything away, just make it better then it already is..

title: Crew - Free Messaging and Scheduling
description:
Crew simplifies team communication and scheduling. Managers and employees can create group messages, schedule shifts and assign tasks. Join for free.

Use Crew to quickly and easily send instant messages to anyone you work with, without sharing your phone number or knowing theirs. Send a group message or a have 1:1 chat. No matter the size of your team, Crew is the ultimate team communication tool.

You can manage your team scheduling straight from Crew. View and distribute the store schedule with a few simple taps on the phone. You can also swap shifts with coworkers, ask your manager a question, send group messages, share photos, files and documents with the entire team and a whole lot more from the palm of your hand. No more searching for people's phone numbers or worrying about them not checking their email.

Crew helps you manage tasks across your team. Not sure what tasks there are to do today? Just check Crew. Replace your team's tasks process with Crew and you can easily assign tasks to coworkers from your phone and get notified when the tasks you asked someone to do are complete. Crew even lets you verify whether the tasks you've assigned have been seen and started.

‚Ä¢ Communicate faster with reliable, organized messaging on your phone
‚Ä¢ Send chat messages to everyone, specific groups or have conversations 1:1
‚Ä¢ Connect your entire team without exchanging phone numbers
‚Ä¢ See exactly who‚Äôs read your messages
‚Ä¢ Send unlimited photos and videos
‚Ä¢ Simplifies scheduling for your entire team
‚Ä¢ Check your work schedule on your phone at anytime
‚Ä¢ Easily get shift covers or pick-up extra shifts
‚Ä¢ Track and manage when employees are available to work
‚Ä¢ Get shift reminders and track your wages
‚Ä¢ Share files and documents with coworkers
‚Ä¢ Assign tasks to coworkers and get notified when they‚Äôre completed
‚Ä¢ Turn up teamwork. Crew lets you give kudos, say thank you and recognize great work
‚Ä¢ A free app that works for everyone on your team

Crew is fully committed to your privacy. Your data is encrypted, and will not be shared or sold to any third-party, period.

532 Baker St.
San Francisco, CA 941167
recentChanges:
This release fixes numerous bugs reported by users like you.

If you see something that looks off, email us at bugs@crewapp.com. If we validate your bug, we'll send you a free t-shirt! Also, please consider leaving a review for us. It really helps.
comments: Really really wonderful app. None of the confusing clutter of most apps these days. Helpful tutorials available to explain everything if you need them. This app can do everything. Very professional. There is a desktop version, lots of flexibility, snyc and customization options, can't reccomend it enough.

spams notifications. The app is being used for emergency notications. There are perhaps 3 people out of the 100+ in the group that have something of value to say. But every 10 minutes the app says someone said something making the notifications useless. I can either be spammed or turn all notifications off. It desperately needs a default notification setting with the ability to override the setting on a per person basis. Please devs, fix this app. As is I hate it.

The app was working great until about a month ago then it started freezing up. I have to close the app several times before it will work again then it only works for a short amount of time. I have emailed the company and have not recieved a response. I wish I didn't need to use this app but it's required for my job. Very frustrated!!!
App is working extremely SLOW. Takes minutes to show schedules. When. It do finally show the schedule, it allows you to view it for seconds then it goes away.

I can no longer access the app after the last update. I already was unable to upload schedules correctly (I reached out about that but never heard back) and now I can't get in at all. It won't send the text with the pin to log in. I can get the call to work but it crashes the app and then I have to start all over. Very frustrating as this is the main way to communicate with my coworkers.

title: Doft Free Load Board  & Truck Loads
description:
Doft Free Load Board is the best way to find truck loads for truckers, owner-operators, carriers, and dispatchers. Choose from 150,000 loads posted daily on our free loadboard. 

Just enter your pickup location, destination, and equipment type to easily find freight from the best brokers and shippers.

Carriers can just tap a button on one of our prepaid loads from direct shippers and instantly book a load, and the price you see is the price you get - no more games and back-and-forth negotiations. 

From pick up to payday, the Doft app is your best tool to book loads faster.

‚Ä¢ Free unlimited search from 150,000+ loads 
‚Ä¢ Find loads by city, state, zip code or GPS based
‚Ä¢ Searchable free load board with Local and OTR hauls
‚Ä¢ Upfront Pricing for prepaid loads from direct shippers
‚Ä¢ Instant load booking with Book Now button on prepaid loads
‚Ä¢ Submit PODs In-app
‚Ä¢ Free 1-3 Day Pay (usually takes 24 hours)
‚Ä¢ Rate check - free freight rate calculator & average market rate forecast
‚Ä¢ Fuel Surcharge Calculator
‚Ä¢ Search for loads back to your home base 
‚Ä¢ Call brokers and shippers right from the app
‚Ä¢ Recent search history

Find loads and truck freight to haul that fits your trucking business needs for any type of trailer, including: Dry Van, Reefer, Flatbed, LTL loads / Partials, Expedited freight, Power only, Stepdeck and many more.

View average industry rates to help you calculate revenues and negotiate a better offer. Rate check is updated daily with thousands of load providers and offers timely rate information.

You can also use Doft load board app to search for freight and truckloads on the web! Try it out at https://loadboard.doft.com. Just log in with the same info you use for the app.

The Doft load board app is free to use and download unlike DAT, Truckstop, 123Loadboard or other load boards. Doft doesn't charge any commissions in comparison to other apps like Uber Freight or Convoy. 

Want to make the most of Doft? Upgrade to a Premium subscription for exclusive tools.

comments: Like the app with the exception that booked loads aren't removed in a timely manner sometimes.
Look like it has potential. Soon as I subscribed, I started to get error messages. About to cancel my subscription soon if it continues.

App was really good now that phone updated the app crashes or wont even load when it does work tell me my internet connection sucks always have good internet either fix problems with app or I'll go elsewhere for what I need
Very cool app but you don't have any loads for sprinter vans.
Every load I called on was already booked by a carrier and no longer available for dispatch. Don't waste your money upgrading to a paid account. Useless load board/App. Uninstalled.

comments: Just started using it, bit so far so good. Being able to zoom into your logos and objects would be a definite bonus. Also when saving creations as draft some objects seem to move which you then have to correct every time you go back. The options are very well thought out and the selection of pictures, objects is surprisingly great!

Originally I had given a low rating on the app however it wasn't the app's fault and got that problem sorted out. The support team is prompt in responding. This is a decent app to help get you started in designing a logo. I'm using this app to create samples before paying a designer to create an official logo for my business. Upgrading to the Pro is reasonably priced and you get a lot extras from it, so I recommend that.

I use this a lot for transparent backgrounds whenever doing an emblem for t-shirt or something but i also use this for labels and posts and I wish there was a way you could add a picture from camera roll to be your background. Even if it only accepted square trimmed pictures. 5 stars plus a recommendation

This is really great at creating the type of logo I am looking for. I am not the best designer or the best drawer and I find the app to be so helpful in creating the signs and logo I need for my business,also you can make your own logo you like.

I am not used to writing reviews but this time is definitely different. I LOVE THIS APP, before downloading it I tried a lot of apps and I couldn't find satisfactory results, once I found this app I was able to make a logo in minutes! Greatüíú

title: Package Disabler Pro (Samsung)
description:
*This application works only on Samsung devices ***
NO ROOTING REQUIRED. Single app solution, no plugin needed


Package Disabler lets you disable any unwanted packages that come pre-installed/ installed with your phone. Simply one click on the package that you want to disable, will disable the package. Disabled application / package will not be uninstalled or updated using google play or any other means. So this app can be used for blocking apps (e.g. Parental Controls) or business use cases, you could even disable google play store etc‚Ä¶ without rooting the phone. This app also provides password / uninstall protection to avoid misuse.

Package Disabler provides an export/ import functionality to backup all disabled packages on your external storage which you can restore at any time.

Remember, though: ALWAYS have a backup of your phone. Important features might break when disabling system apps.


Using the exported package list you can swiftly get rid of all bloatware after installing a new ROM or Factory reset. When wiping your phone's data, you can export your package list to import it on your new ROM.

Full version features

* Disabling and enabling any packages or apps unlimited

* One click bloatware removal

* Export your disabled list to the external storage to import them later

* Batch operation to enable all disabled packages

* Filter to show all disabled packages

* Uninstall / password protection

* Filter to show all installed apps

* Filter to show all system packages

* Quickly find apps using the search functionality
* Original package disabler. It may not work on rooted devices
Notes

* If you have issues uninstalling apps, try Settings ‚Äì> Security ‚Äì> Device administrators, uncheck "package disabler admin".

Permission:
-- This application requires Device Administrator permission [android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN]

developerAddress: Reading, Berkshire, RG6 3BT, United Kingdom
recentChanges: First version
comments: What a great app! Super simple to use - just tick the items you want to disable and they turn off. I had to turn Facebook Installer back on in order to install something, so I unticked it, installed my app, then ticked it again. Worked immediately with no restart required. Not sure whether it has improved performance, but from a privacy perspective I like to turn off all those Bixby/Google/Facebook processes and for GearVR it lets me use it as a cardboard headset.

Didn't work Samsung 9. List that identifies all the bloatware not available after multiple attempts to obtain and save as instructed. Reached out to customer service who responded i.mediately with, "we don't know which package disabler you purchased" & that it's only good for about 6 months due to developers changing code, etc. I responded immediately with receipt for package disabler pro purchased that day. No response after that. Do not give device administrator privileges or you can't uninst

The app works as expected on my Galaxy S9 with Android 10. A little disappointed that I needed to buy this app again after the developer changed the name and the old version no longer being updated and not working on anymore. Would be a five star if not for that. One last point, it doesn't seem to be able to disable packages inside of the secure folder, but that might be a limitation of Knox.

It lists bloatware and there are boxes to check, but if you go to the drop down menu, there's no setting to disable the app you check and there's no info on how to do it. If you tap uninstall, it uninstalls package disabler pro instead of the app you checked the box for. I would appreciate some advice. Thanks

It's a great app and does what it's supposed to without rooting. Been using it since Note 4. But I think this is my 3rd time buying it? I understand you keep getting taken off the store. But at least give us that paid in the past free access. The last version stopped working entirely, even tho I had it installed when it was taken off. Now I have 2 versions on the same phone lol. It's cheap, but still, it isn't fair to us loyal to you.

title: Shapr ‚Äì Meaningful Networking
description:
Shapr is a personalized, mindful way of networking. Based on your interests and experience, we provide a daily dose of inspiring, like-minded people to meet nearby in your area. Whether you‚Äôre seeking friends or employees, each swipe is a new opportunity and a new discovery.

Shapr has been featured in Forbes, Product Hunt, Techcrunch, Inc, Venture Beat & Fast Company.

Inspire. We believe in serendipity. Personally and professionally, we believe that connecting
inspiring people creates a meaningful, fulfilling and healthy co-existence.

Personalize. Create your profile and share your bio, work history, industry and education. State your interests and professional goals, or simply share information from your CV or LinkedIn.

Swipe. Swipe anonymously through pictures and bios for 1 minute a day and open your network to a world of opportunities. Choose ‚ÄúPass‚Äù or ‚ÄúMeet‚Äù to search for inspiring people. Shapr gets smarter with each swipe and curates 10 - 15 daily suggestions based on tagged interests, location and professional experience.

Network. We take the ‚Äòwork‚Äô out of networking and provide the opportunity to grow as a
professional and as an individual. Somewhat like ‚Äúbusiness dating,‚Äù our app lets you contact and meet other professionals, co-founders, entrepreneurs and mentors at your convenience.

Connect. Shapr lets you know when an interest is mutual, that way you can start chatting right away with your new connections - without the awkwardness of a request to connect. Feel free to break the ice with our built-in introductions or set up a call or video chat.

Engage. Have an open mind, curious attitude and eagerness to help others learn and succeed. Share aspirations, bond with people, and embark on new journeys.

Discover. Discover entrepreneurs, founders, professionals, mentors, artists, among other countless talented and inspiring individuals around you and throughout the world.

*Don‚Äôt forget that big ideas come from small encounters. Start shaping your life today!*

developerAddress: SHAPR INC. World Financial District, 60 Broad Street Suite 3502, NY, NY 10004
recentChanges: We have fixed some issues and improved the overall performance of the app :-)
comments: We used to be able to use the app for free to swipe but now have to pay which is fine I understand. When I tried to purchase the pro version for super swipe it kept asking for me to pay and when I tried to pay again it gave me an error that said I already subscribed. That seems very suspect!!! I immediately canceled and now looking for a refund!

Quote wont update. Been the same for a week now. I loved this feature but now it's not working right. Weeks after, now the quotes are updating daily but it cannot be shared anymore. I keep clicking the share button, nothing comes up. So frustrating. I loved this app for the quotes they share daily.

Used to like this app... now not sure whats going on? Been almost a month and I'm not getting any daily batches or search results! Keeps telling me there is a connection problem or I'm offline even after updating! I paid for pro mode before and was considering again but not till this problem is fixed...

I can understand that an app needs to gain momentum but I moved to a new city and hoped this would hook me up with folks in my industry locally. Instead, it recommends people from other cities, in pretty random jobs compared to my LinkedIn profile. Push notifications to suggest swipes from people that don't then appear in my list to reciprocate is just frustrating. The app doesn't do enough to justify its usefulness to me so why part with cash for a paid plan hoping it'll improve? Uninstalling.

When this app first came out it was actually decent. You were matched with people in your local area and it worked. I met a few people in real life and made new connections. Recently however they decided to paywall specifying your area and instead your are match with people from hundreds of miles away who don't share your interests. They decided to make people pay monthly for the key function of the app which is to meet others. It off-putting as many people will just find free alternatives to meet people instead. Effectively the app is useless now, good concept originally but the path the developers chose for monetization has been a counterproductive decision in the end.

title: Top Fax - scan & send fax from phone
description:
First page is free !!!  

Top Fax turns your phone into a fax machine for documents, photos, receipts and other texts. With Top Fax, you can fax them anywhere.

Top Fax sends fax files or documents , including PDF files, stored on your Android phone or tablet to any fax number in the USA/Canada and many international locations. Send a fax from your phone as simply as selecting a file and entering a fax number.

Top Fax is extremely easy to use. The interface is simple and very convenient to manage your faxes.

Features:
- Send a single page or multiple page faxes.
- Fax documents from mail and other apps.
- Fax images from Gallery or using camera.
- Provide international fax numbers and list of countries.
- Archive documents by status, easy to manage.
- Folder Management Fax.
- Manage fax receipt.

In fact it is free,
You can also earn credit by setting check-ins and watching videos!

If you do not like check-ins and watch videos, you can also buy credit!



Cost:  
First page free !!! 

50     Credits for $2.49
250   Credits for $9.99
600   Credits for $19.99
2000 Credits for $49.99

Faxes to the USA and Canada are 10 credits per page. The others are 15 credits per page.


Fax formats of image files (photos of documents) takes quite a while to transfer and send as a fax.
Allow at least 1 minutes per page to transfer and two minutes to fax if you are sending a scan or image (photo) file. More if your data connection maybe ... slow.


Download and start to use Top Fax to make your life easier. Please write to us before leaving negative reviews, as we can often help with your problem or help you better use the app.

If you have any problem or suggestions please send a mail to topfax@outlook.com, and you will get the response and solution in a short time.

comments: This app is easy to use. For the first free 10 credits, you have to log in and click on the credit icon for it to give you the option of adding the credits. This app has the option for you to send the cover letter as well. With my phone I had to click on an icon that looks like a paper with the settings symbol. This cover letter must be paid for with your credits as well. You can watch some videos to get extra free credits (not sure what is the limit) and you can check in for 1 credit daily.

App is straight and simple. It gives you 15 free credits; 10 are required per page. You can buy 50 for less than three dollars. So did I. The fax worked without flaws; just had to wait a couple of minutes for answer. Rate is reasonable for a few pages. If you have to send a lot, it might be better to search other means, unless it's an absolute emergency. Worked out well for me.

Fairly easy to use, once you learn to hit the camera icon to add pages instead of the next or arrow icon. Sent the fax within a few minutes. Much easier than going to a box store to send a fax. I plan to use again.

Great experience. First page is free and extra credits are a decent price. I usually go to the library but sometimes I cannot get there and have been looking for an alternative. I have tried other fax apps and so far this has been the best one to use. Others are too exspensive.

It would be nice to get a confirmation that the recipient actually received the fax. Top Fax shows that it went through, but there is not a confirmation from the recipient. The app itself is easy to navigate and use, and the prices seem fair. Thank you.

title: LinkedPhone - 2nd Line - Business Phone Number App
description:
At LinkedPhone, we serve entrepreneurs & small business owners with easy-to-set-up, professional-grade phone systems. Add a second phone number to your personal cell phone for work. Talk & text with customers without revealing your personal number.

Choose from thousands of local & toll-free business numbers - or port your current number to LinkedPhone. Our business numbers work seamlessly across your existing devices - cell phones, office phones, home phones, & computers.

Unlimited talk, text messaging, voicemail, contacts, & call notes. Share a common business phone number with your team - everyone gets their own extension. Create professional call menu options for a polished call experience.

All professional-grade features are included - text messaging, voicemail, visual voicemail (transcription), team extensions, call menu options, customized call routing, customer service notes, business contacts, directory, and greetings.

SOLOPRENEUR PLAN
„ÉªSingle user (mobile, office IP phone, or landline)
„ÉªPlus access to our web phone on any computer via internet browser

„Éª$24.99 per month for a toll-free business number

„ÉªPlus each user gets access to our web phone on any computer via internet browser

„ÉªPlus each user gets access to our web phone on any computer via internet browser
„Éª$49.99 per month for a local business number
„Éª$99.99 per month for a toll-free business number

FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS
„ÉªSelect a local or toll-free business phone number (or port your existing number)
„ÉªTalk & text from your business number while keeping your personal number private

What is a Virtual Phone System?
An easy, flexible, and affordable way for entrepreneurs and small businesses to connect with customers. Virtual phone systems are cloud-based and include modern features like text messaging and mobile apps. They're much cheaper than traditional business phone systems.

What is a Virtual Phone Number?
Virtual phone numbers, like email, are 'in the cloud'. They work seamlessly across all of your devices - office phones, cell phones, computers, and landlines. Teams can share a single virtual number too. They come in local & toll-free area codes and are portable.

comments: I like almost everything about the app but when I call cell phone numbers it does not show the company name. I can't figure out how to change the default caller ID settings.
App force closes constantly on samsung phones, useless, customer service is non existent.

Really great updates. The developers are adding the right features specifically for business owners. Business voicemail is really excellent. In addition to audio, it's written out too! I like that the app separates my business contacts, voicemail, text messages, and phone calls from my personal stuff. The ability to write notes on each of my customers is such a great feature. The call menu options make my small company sound like a big professional company. Overall very satisfied with this app.
For some reason I couldn't get past the first step. After entering my phone, an error message ("something went wrong") kept displaying. I am using a Canadian-based cell phone number.
This app works great and allows me to manage my calls.

title: ProBooks: Invoicing, Expenses, and Accounting
description:
Download ProBooks and manage your business with this easy to use app!

‚Ä¢ Choose an invoice design and color
‚Ä¢ Generate professional PDFs in an instant
‚Ä¢ Accept credit card payments for your invoices
‚Ä¢ Create recurring invoices and setup subscriptions to automatically charge your clients
‚Ä¢ Create estimates on the go which can be converted into an invoice when finalized
‚Ä¢ Specify payment terms on your invoices for prompt payment
‚Ä¢ Send invoices with the press of a button and receive a push notification when opened
‚Ä¢ Send statements to a specific client to show them their invoices and payments
‚Ä¢ Available on your computer at ProBooks.com
‚Ä¢ Sync your company data; invoices, estimates, clients, and products with your business partners or associates
‚Ä¢ Setup a list of products to quickly draft an invoice and track product inventory if needed
‚Ä¢ Apply taxes to invoice items as necessary; ProBooks provides monthly and yearly reports of taxes charged on invoices
‚Ä¢ Record invoice payments and track client receivables
‚Ä¢ Simple invoice maker interface with advanced features when needed
‚Ä¢ Detailed accounting information with breakdowns of revenue, expenses, and taxes
‚Ä¢ Export your invoices, clients, or products to a CSV file

Every invoice and estimate is synced automatically between all of your devices. Never worry about losing an invoice because you didn't backup.

New users get a free 30-day trial of ProBooks. A monthly or yearly subscription is available which will unlocks everything (desktop, mobile, and tablet).

Previously called Invoice Maker Pro.

recentChanges: New app re-design.
comments: Only app to keep track of your business that's worth anything! It breaks down everything for you, reminds you if you have upaid invoices, reminds the client that it is not paid, the invoices are clean and neat ( my customers rave about the look and readability of them), and the best part is that it auto-fills materials and even labor for you without you having to do anything but enter it the first time ( no more remembering what you charged "Bob" so you don't over charge his neighbor).
App works great, I think the reoccurring payment option could be set up a little different but overall it's great.
Super for my business so simple to use and a brilliant app to keep track of my invoices
Does everything I need it to do. Easy to navigate and personalize.
Love the update, so much better and faster.!

title: Invoice & Estimate Generator - Contractor Billing
description:
Invoice Bee:  Simple Estimate & Billing to Go - Best Invoicing & Billing Generator! Get started for Free!

Looking for an invoicing app with incredible features to help you organize your business billings? Invoice Bee will help you to keep track of all the expenses in a very easy and simple way.

1.Receiving Client‚Äôs signature: 

Clients can sign either directly on the device screen or via email. The signed documents are saved in cloud system for retrieval.

2.Advanced and organized summary page: 

View invoice / estimate / payment summary by month, by customer or by item. 

3.Sending receipt of payment to clients: 

It is very easy to send receipts to clients after recording payment.

title: Simple Invoice Manager - Invoice Estimate Receipt
description:
Invoice Manager  is a complete solution for managing Invoice and Billing operations. Invoice manager helps you right from raising an invoice to recording payment for the invoice and then finally providing a receipt all from one app.

Generating invoice is simple and fast and you can create and send invoices immediately, track overdue invoices and make sure to get paid for your invoice on time. First few invoices are free to make, after which you can purchase subscription for unlimited invoices.

Invoice Manager
- Send invoices by e-mail or whatsapp / skype  etc.
- Add Logo and Signature to your invoice
- Set Due Dates on Invoice

Payments and Receipts
- Send out signed Receipts for your invoice.
- Support for Lumpsum Payments, Partial Payments and Combined Payment for multiple Invoices

Taxes and Discounts
- Taxes and Discounts at Total Bill level or Item level
- Discount in % or fixed amount
- Multiple Tax Rates in the same invoice  

Charts and Graphs
- Analyse Invoice & Payment data
- Client Receivable History over past few weeks / months
- Which Products / Services & Clients generate maximum revenue 

Backup and Restore
- Link your Dropbox account to Invoice Manager & Backup your data on Dropbox
- Invoice PDF can be uploaded on Dropbox automatically and accessed via desktop
- Backup all the Invoice data on your Dropbox or SD Card
 
Export Invoice Data 
- Export details of invoice and payments as CSV and open it in Microsoft Excel 

Add Products / Clients Easily 
- Upload hundreds of products and clients easily using excel based template
- Import contacts from phonebook to quickly invoice those customers
- Create and manage product portfolio for generating invoices
- Store contact details of your clients for invoices

Outstanding
- See outstanding invoices and payments
- Graphs show you how outstanding payments has varied across time

Transaction History or Ledger  
- Send out entire transaction history (ledger) to a regular client 
- Can be useful for purposes of accounting and / or payment request. 
- Can be very useful for working with clients who make payments in small installments such as long term projects

title: Fill: e Sign, PDF Filler, Editor, Annotate & Scan
description:
Fill is the effortless solution for filling, signing and annotating PDF files on-the-go!

BENEFITS

Need to quickly edit or esign a PDF document? You don‚Äôt have to look for a printer or scanner. Fill app lets you fill, sign, scan & send any document fast & easy.

The Fill PDF filler & editor, writer automatically detects fillable fields, word, forms & checkboxes on your PDF document & makes editing on the go simple. Fill forms anywhere, anytime. 

KEY FEATURES

- Sign: Sign PDF documents, fill pdf forms & share files via email  You will never have to look for a scanner again. 

- Scan: Fill helps the user fill & scan PDF documents on-the-go using the inbuilt document scanner. Users can use the scanner app to quickly scan physical documents and access them anytime, anywhere.

- Cloud Storage Integration: Import images, photos, PDF files & documents from iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive, your computer or gallery easily to edit & esign on your phone.

- Edit: Import & prepare sign documents by creating & adding text, electronic signature, date, stamp, icon or simply annotate. Sign realistically with your finger without printing or scanning the document. 

- Customize: Personalize text, create electronic signature, scan documents, digital signature app, esign, date, icons, change color, font, size to fill the documents as per your needs.

- View: Read, view, annotate & preview digitally edited PDF files on the Fill PDF Reader, Editor, Signer, Scanner, Viewer, Creator & Writer app before sharing them via email or fax for free. Add electronic signature.

- Send: Save, send & share edited files immediately via email or fax easily from your iPhone or iPad with Fill.

- Save & Re-Use: Fill stores user content, digital signature, & personal details to easily use & reuse in the future for free. Use free Fill PDF Editor, reader, creator, signer, viewer, writer, maker, filler & converter, scanner app to view, annotate, esign & sign document.

- Go Green: Use Fill app to fill forms, use e signature eliminating the use of traditional printing & paper scanning.

- Security: Keep your information secure & confidential.

COST

Buy credits to pay as you go or get a monthly subscription plan to get extra discounts for exporting pdf files. Cost of exporting an edited pdf document file is determined by the no. of pages. Editing files with Fill PDF editor are cheaper than traditional printers & scanners.

Edit images, annotate, scan & sign documents at ease. 

Download Fill: PDF Editor, Creator, Viewer, Scanner, Filler, Writer, Electronic Signature app now.
