title: PrinterShare Mobile Print
description:
Print directly from Android phone or tablet to almost any printer! Print photos, emails, documents (including PDF, Microsoft¬Æ Word, Excel¬Æ, PowerPoint¬Æ and other files), bills, invoices, messages, web pages and more. PrinterShare makes printing easy and convenient whether your printer is right next to you or across the world!

IMPORTANT: Some of the features are NOT FREE! To unlock these features, you would need to purchase and install the PrinterShare Premium Key app, a stand-alone tiny application that simply needs to be installed on the device to unlock the Premium Features of the free app. 
We highly recommend printing the test page to ensure compatibility with your printer prior to purchasing the Premium Key.


NOTE: Unfortunately, we had to remove the SMS and Call log printing features from our app due to the update to the Permissions policy on Google Play. Dear customers, we are as much upset by this issue as you are. And we are doing our best to resolve the issue. 
For this reason please stay tuned to the app updates. Once we obtain the necessary Messages and Call log permissions from Google, we are planning to bring the features back to the app.


With PrinterShare you can easily print images and photos (JPG, PNG, GIF), emails (from Gmail) and attachments (PDF, DOC, XLS, PPT, TXT), contacts, agenda, web pages (HTML) and other digital content from device memory, cloud storage providers such as Google Drive, One Drive, Box, Dropbox and other applications using Share action. You even can print text messages for trial or legal matters!

Print UPS shipping labels directly from a browser on Android device to supported thermal printers by logging to UPS website.  


Also, you can configure many printing options such as paper size, page orientation, copies, page range, one- or two-sided printing (duplex mode), print quality (resolution), color or monochrome, media tray and more.


With the free version of the app, you can:

* Print with certain restrictions on nearby wireless (WiFi, Bluetooth) and direct USB OTG connected printers;
* Print on Windows shared (SMB/CIFS) or Mac shared printers;
* Print via Google Cloud Print (including Save as PDF);
* Print 20 pages in the remote mode over the Internet.

For unlimited printing, you would need to have the PrinterShare Premium Key app installed on your mobile device.


Premium Features include:

* Unlimited Nearby direct printing (PDFs, documents, photos and more) via Wi-Fi or Bluetooth without a computer;
* Unlimited Remote printing. The receiving end (Windows or Mac) would not have to buy pages or subscribe.


PrinterShare supports a wide variety of HP, Canon, Brother, Kodak, Samsung, Dell, Ricoh, Lexmark, Kyocera, OKI and other printers including legacy networkable. A full list of supported printers available at http://printershare.com/help-mobile-supported.sdf. You can also print to unsupported and legacy printers with our free computer software for Mac and Windows available at http://printershare.com.


Here is the list of printers supported by PrinterShare app:
http://www.printershare.com/help-mobile-supported.sdf
Make sure that your printer is supported.


Please note:

1) Requested permissions are needed to print content and are not used to collect your personal data. For a more detailed explanation please see our FAQ at http://www.printershare.com/help-mobile-faq.sdf
2) Google Cloud Print requires the latest version of Chrome browser on your computer or Google Cloud Print capable printer. For more setup instructions please read http://www.google.com/support/cloudprint/
3) If something isn't working as expected, please send us an email to support@printershare.com


Have a good print!

P.S. For direct nearby printing to selected printer models PrinterShare downloads and uses drivers provided by HPLIP (http://hplipopensource.com) and GutenPrint (http://gimp-print.sourceforge.net). These drivers are distributed under GNU General Public License, version 2.

You can do it by sharing your document, etc. to PrinterShare. Also I can "Print" to the "Microsoft Print to PDF" utility - though in the computer a pop-up window requires you to give it a name and save it. Your computer will need to be on to do the PDF, but not to print to your printer if it is connected directly to your local Ethernet network. Initial access is password protected.

This is a wonderful app that allows me to continue to use my printer that I've had for a while, it does the job and does it well. I just wish it had more options for printing specifically to be able to print on both sides. I print a lot of documents that are rather large and need to be front and back. It's rather tedious to number the pages by odds and evens each time. Perhaps it will in the future. I do also wish they had a free version, like print 5 free pages to try first before buying.

I've purchased premium version, but not useful. mostly some printer model not working. for eg: some laser jet, some ink jet also... don't go for it, bad app. Whenever it needed to use I am taping the 4g internet for plugin download, it's getting downloaded and installing for particular printer model, for whichever needed to install, not getting printed, I am connecting with different OTG. I've got fooled by author,

I have used this app for many years without any problems. Howeve, since changing my tablet recently I have had intermittent problems with blank pages being printed. I've managed to overcome the problem each time but I am uncertain what I have done to achieve this

Very nice app for mobile printing. But I face an issue of low quality printing. It print in low density and no option for changing dpi, that's why print quality is poor. I request to app developer to fix this issue. Overall this is great app available in market. üëç

title: Termius - SSH/SFTP and Telnet client
description:
Termius is the best way to manage, UNIX and Linux systems, whether that would be a local machine, a remote service, Docker Container, VM, Raspberry Pi, or AWS instance. In other words, Termius is Putty for Android but with awesome design.

Free Features:
 ¬∑ SSH client with support of ECDSA, ed25519, and chacha20-poly1305
 ¬∑ Desktop app for Windows, Mac, and Linux
 ¬∑ SSH, Mosh & Telnet protocol support
 ¬∑ Local terminal with bash
 ¬∑ Built-in RSA/DSA/ECDSA key generator and Putty keys importer
 ¬∑ XTerm-256 colors, VT100 and vanilla terminal types support
 ¬∑ Local, Remote, and Dynamic port forwarding
 ¬∑ Automatic OS recognition, e.g., Raspberry Pi, Ubuntu, Fedora
 ¬∑ Hardware keyboard support
 ¬∑ Password, key, and 2FA authentication
 ¬∑ 12 awesome color schemes
 ¬∑ Terminal Touch with the support of arrow keys, Ctrl and Alt.
 ¬∑ Organize hosts into groups to share settings among them
 ¬∑ No ads or banners

Premium Features, $99,99 annually. This subscription can be used on any platform where Termius is available.
 ¬∑ Cross-device sync *
 ¬∑ SSH key agent forwarding
 ¬∑ SFTP client
 ¬∑ Terminal tabs
 ¬∑ HTTP/SOCKS proxy
 ¬∑ CLI tool to export ~/.ssh/config 
 ¬∑ Fingerprint protection
 ¬∑ Home Screen Widget 
 ¬∑ AWS EC2 and Digital Ocean host import
 ¬∑ Host chaining (hop host)
 ¬∑ Save and run snippets on multiple hosts
 ¬∑ Env variables 

* Using zero-knowledge cloud storage with 2FA protection. All the data encrypted on the client-side using AES-256.

recentChanges: - Stability improvements;
comments: Really helps with being a digital nomad and accessing servers I have to work on for clients. Will say it's bare minimum, but using putty when I have access to a computer makes up for its short comings.

Now that the free tier is ad-free, it's much nicer experience. I don't need most of the pro features, making a subscription a bit overkill for my use case. Without it, it's still a very functional app with a pleasant and polished user interface with a number of fairly unique convenience features.

Way too expensive. I had no idea I was using a premium trial when I installed it. The only thing I wanted to use this for (snippets) costs $100/year? Start streaming movies and TV shows then maybe I would take that price seriously.

paste option eventually stops showing making it impossible to paste. touch gestures are garbage moving the cursor twice or three times per swipe most of the time. if you're coming from the iPhone version, don't expect the same quality.
Worked first time when trying ssh. Easy to use. I wish there was more control over placing whic bottom buttons were there. I need to have directional arrows and tab without having to switch toolbars.

From broad stroke blessings for your life to tightly focused blessings for your brain and heart, these will help your healing journey and give vitality to your daily walk. Transformational tools for the kingdom of the KING of all Kings! Made in the USA! Thankyou from Germany.

This teaching offers tools to change you and your world. I would highly recommed it to anyone who wants to grow in God and is prepared to put in the effort needed to grow your spiritual muscles.

title: CamCard for Salesforce
description:
CamCard for Salesforce is a great mobile supplement for all Salesforce CRM users. It liberates you from the most time-consuming work of data entry. Moreover, it perfectly integrates with your customized Salesforce fields to make daily lead/contact management so much easier and more efficient on mobile.

Improve productivity for (field) salespeople:
‚Ä¢	Scan business cards into your Salesforce account
‚Ä¢	Quick search for the contact on LinkedIn
‚Ä¢	17 languages supported with the best recognition accuracy available
‚Ä¢	Create & save tasks, activities, notes, and files to Salesforce
‚Ä¢	Record call/email happened on mobile, no need to add communication history
‚Ä¢	Create greeting email template and send with one-tap
‚Ä¢	Capture clear document scan for you to add to file, using smart-cropping and auto-enhancing technology
‚Ä¢	Additional accurate transcription service available for hard-to-read card
‚Ä¢	Scan cards offline and auto save to Salesforce when mobile gets connected to a network

This free trial includes 10 cards saved to Salesforce for free, allowing you to experience the full feature package of standard account, without an expiration date.

*Standard account subscription
Save unlimited cards to Salesforce
- 7.99 USD/month
- 79.99 USD/year 
Please note the subscription is automatically renewed at the end of the period unless you choose to cancel the subscription.

*Accurate transcription (consumable)
Achieve a 99.9% accuracy of business card information
- 4.99 USD/10 cards
- 39.99 USD/100 cards

We‚Äôd love to hear your feedback: support@camcard.com

title: Accounting App - Zoho Books
description:
Zoho Books is a simple, easy-to-use accounting app that tracks the money coming in and going out of your business. With Zoho Books, you can always stay up-to-date on your business finance and make decisions instantly. 

Key Features

‚òÖ Sales - Manage Money Coming In

You can create and send estimates and invoices on the move. You can choose invoices that match your business identity and accept payments from your customers online! 

‚òÖ Purchases - Manage Money Going Out

Record expenses and bills and categorize them right from your Android devices.  Get to know how much you owe and always pay your bills on time. When your vendor supplies goods/services to you on credit, you‚Äôre sent an invoice that details the amount of money you owe him. You can record this as a bill in Zoho Books and track it until it‚Äôs paid.

‚òÖ Banking

Once you add your bank or credit card account from the list of banks available in our web application, bank feeds will be automatically enabled by default. You can view these feeds in Zoho Books Android app. Also, you can record money in / out manual entries for your offline transactions for your bank or credit card accounts. These transactions can be Categorized or Matched with the Zoho Books Expense, Invoice / Vendor payments transactions etc.,

‚òÖ Tax Exclusive / Tax Inclusive rates

Mark your line item rates as either Tax Inclusive / Tax Exclusive while you create bills and invoices.

‚òÖ Purchase Order

Raise purchase order to your vendor on the go using Zoho Books accounting app!.

‚òÖ Invoice Templates

Choose your desired template from Template Gallery and send professional Invoices to your customers.

‚òÖ Your Accountant is never far away

With the Zoho Books Android app your accountant is never far away to advise you. You can collaborate with your employees and accountants. Invite your trusted advisor to review your numbers right from the comfort of his home or office. 

‚òÖ Get Business Insights In Your Pocket

Do you have enough cash for payroll and paying supplier bills? How much do your customers owe? What are your top expenses? Answers to these are just a tap away. 

‚òÖ Track time accurately

Get to track time you spend on your projects and bill them right from the app. 

‚òÖ Go Global

Zoho Books supports transactions in multiple currencies and is precision personified. 

‚òÖ Download and Print Reports

With our Zoho Books Android app, you can download and print Profit and Loss, Cash flow statement, Balance sheet, Sales, Customer Balances, Invoice Aging summary, Expenses and many more reports.

‚òÖ Client Portal

Client portal lets your clients stay up to date on all the transactions that are happening between them and your business. You can skip the lengthy email threads and collaborate better with your clients using the portal. 

‚òÖ Accept Online Payment

Use online payment gateways to receive quick payments. Zoho Books is integrated with these major online payment gateways to help you receive payments for your invoices online. This ensures faster and hassle-free receipt of payments

‚òÖ Add Attachments and Receipts

Upload a picture of the receipt or share it from your device and attach it to the corresponding expense instantly. Add file attachments to Expenses, Invoices, Estimates and emails that you send to your customers.

‚òÖ Quick widgets

Add widget on your home screen and create Invoices, Estimates, expenses or log time sheet entries instantly.

‚òÖ Taxes

You can apply multiple taxes to your transactions. 


Our mobile app is a supplement to our web-based Zoho Books application ( https://books.zoho.com ). This accounting app is free to download. You can sign up for a 14-day free trial. After the trial you can subscribe to the plan that best suits your business needs.
descriptionHTML:

You can create and send estimates and invoices on the move. You can choose invoices that match your business identity and accept payments from your customers online!

When your vendor supplies goods/services to you on credit, you‚Äôre sent an invoice that details the amount of money you owe him. comments: Love this app!! So easy to use. Perfect for my small business
This is an awesome app. It allows us to run our business easily and securely. It records expenses, creates invoices, POs etc. It covers everything. We at Cris-Cay Solutions are very happy with it.

title: The Driving For Dollars App
description:
The Revolutionary Real-estate Direct-Mail Scouting App!

If you know that Direct Mail Marketing is vital to your businesses success and you find yourself driving neighborhoods to find potential business, then the Driving For Dollars App is for you. The D4D App eliminates all the work needed to determine homeowners and where they can be mailed in order to better market to them through direct mail.
The term ‚ÄúDriving For Dollars‚Äù was coined in the real estate investing world, which means to drive neighborhoods in order to find lucrative deals for your business. We developed this App for Real Estate Investors trying to find deals, Realtors looking for listings, or Tradesman looking to market their businesses in specific neighborhoods. If your goal is to drive neighborhoods and direct mail market to homeowners, then this app will eliminate all the back-end work of finding who the homeowner is and where to send them mail. For many, this means eliminating hours of work or eliminating the expense of having an employee do this work for you.

The D4D App is integrated with a major data provider to give you the latest, public information you seek and then exports your lists into an excel spread sheet so you can easily mail merge your marketing letters. The user interface allows you to speak the address into the app, type in an individual address, or drop pins on specific properties in the overhead map view.

comments: Cant even create an account or sign in...

It has quirks, but they are constantly upgrading it for smoother use. I've been using the app for about 6 months now and am confident in stating they may not be fast at solving issues but they do provide fixes. Once you get hooked you can't go back to pen and paper. The hours it saves overcomes the quirks.

This is the sorriest app that I have ever used. It stopped working after only 5 searches. I reached out for help but got NONE. I basically donated over $35.00 to D4$ app because I can't use it (because it's not working properly and it's not being fixed). I'll change my review on the condition that I receive a full refund and/or the UPDATED, FIXED version of the app.

Doesn't work for my market (Georgia). No information would come up on any of over 40 addresses I've pinned. I have an updated Galaxy 9+ and have never had any issues with any other apps on my device. I contacted their support team and after two months of back and forth with them nothing fixed with no explanation as to why. Waste of time and money, completely useless!

I started with deal machine, but didnt like the fact that every skiptrace cost a dollar but driving for dollars you could skiptrace right there and then, unlimited just paying the monthly fee. but my God the bugs in this app are endless. it wouldn't register my subscription through Google, then logged me out, when I tried to log back in I had forgotten my password and the app had no recovery system at all...

title: Snapfax - Send Fax from Phone
description:
*** Promotion: Sending to US/Canada 20% off, only 0.8 credits per page. (Normally 1 credit per page.) ***

Snapfax, a popular and highly rated mobile fax app, turns your smartphone or tablet into a fax machine. 

Devoted to provide you the best fax user experience. Fax your document as simply as selecting a document or taking a photo and entering the fax number through its intuitive user interface. 

Easy-to-use mobile interface for sending faxes online directly from your device on the go without the need of having a fax machine or dedicated fax line.

Pay as you go - buy fax pages and send faxes on demand. No subscription required.

The must-have app for every business for sending faxes directly from your smartphone.

Features:
- Snap to fax: Scan and fax your hardcopy document with Snapfax's advanced scanner (built-in camera). 
- Advanced document scanner with powerful image processing (e.g. auto corner and border detection, perspective correction, black and white conversion and shadow elimination)
- Fax your document from Photo Library
- Fax your PDF document from Cloud services (iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, etc)
- Combine multiple documents into a single fax
- Sign and add text to the fax document
- Hide sensitive information in the fax document
- Select high-quality localized Cover Page at your choice
- Import recipients from CSV file for bulk fax broadcast
- Save as a draft for future use
- Track sent fax's status with ease
- Push notification when fax job has been completed
- Automatically retry faxes that don't go through initially - no additional charge or action required from you
- One tap to resend the fax to failed recipient(s).
- Create/Save frequently used recipients as Favorites for repeated use
- Detailed Fax Transmission Report for your record

Purchase fax pages from the most suitable pricing tier according to your personal or business needs
4 Fax Credits : US$1.99 ($0.50/credit)
20 Fax Credits : US$7.99 ($0.40/credit)
60 Fax Credits : US$19.99 ($0.33/credit)
200 Fax Credits : US$49.99 ($0.25/credit)

Fax Pages has no expiry date. If a fax is failed to send, the system will credit back any failed or unsent pages. We only charge for sent pages.

Faxing to below countries require 1 credit for each fax page:
Argentina, Belgium, Canada, Croatia, Estonia, France, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong,  Hungary, India, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Romania, Singapore, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, United Kingdom, United States

Other countries supported:
Andorra, Australia, Austria, Bahrain, Brazil, Chile, China, Czech Republic, Denmark, Egypt, Finland, Israel, Japan, Jordan, Libya, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Malta, Mexico, Morocco, Norway, Oman, Pakistan, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Qatar, Russia, Slovenia, South Africa, South Korea, Thailand, Turkey, United Arab Emirates
Please refer to the rate table in the app.

Privacy and Confidentiality:
We respect importance of privacy and confidentiality. Communication between device and server is strongly encrypted. All fax information will only be used for fax transmission purpose. We will not keep copy of sent faxes. Fax content will be destroyed upon completion of the fax transmission.

Contact Us:
We're always excited to hear from you!
If you have feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at support@snapfaxapp.com.

comments: I was skeptical to try this but desperate because of the Covid-19 virus,to fax paperwork to a county office. I got a confirmation that it would take the server 4 mins to send. At 4 mins later, I got a notification that my 2 page fax was sent successfully! I would give it 5 stars after I confirm the fax was legible on receiver's end. üòÅ Thankyou!!

This is my favorite fax app. It's inexpensive, and reliable. I've sent faxes to state and federal agencies, and businesses, and they've all successfully received the pages I've sent in a matter of minutes.

I needed to send a fax for my business and this worked perfectly. For some odd reason ,the place i needed to send the fax to would not accept a landline fax machine call. This was ideal for that situation.
great used it for first time was in a rut needed to send a fax and thankfully i found this app and was able to will be saving this app for future things i need to fax.
1st fax was successfully sent/received in less than 5 minutes. I was notified about both.

title: JotNot Fax - Fax from your phone
description:
JotNot Fax turns your Android phone into an easy, convenient, and cost-effective fax machine.  Save time and money with JotNot Fax by skipping the copy center and sending your fax right away.

JotNot comes with a built-in scanner, so you don't need to find a scanner or fax machine if you have a paper document. Just scan in the document with your phone's camera, enter the fax number, and hit send.  It has never been easier to send a fax from your phone.

JotNot also lets you fax PDF and Word (docx) documents from email attachments, documents in a cloud account, and documents stored on your device.  Import the document, enter the fax number, and tap send.

Create a free JotNot account to sync faxes and credits across multiple devices and other platforms, including Android, the Web, and more.

JotNot Fax will send you a push notification when your fax completes. It will also give you a proof of transmission receipt for each successful fax.

JotNot Fax's other benefits include:
‚óè  Fax PDF or Word (docx) documents from Gmail
‚óè  Fax from Dropbox, Google Drive, and OneDrive
‚óè  Fax images from Gallery or using the camera 
‚óè  Add a professional cover page (free of charge)
‚óè  Track faxes and get notifications when done
‚óè  Document your fax with a transmission receipt

Cost:
JotNot Fax is pay as you go. We charge credits based on the number of pages in each fax.  Every five pages costs a credit, so 1-5 pages costs 1 credit, 6-10 costs 2 credits, etc. Credits cost $3.99 for a 3-pack and the larger packs are heavily discounted. Getting the largest pack can come to about $0.16 per page.

JotNot is made in the USA and supported from the USA.  We aim to provide the best possible user experience and service. Please contact us at support@jotnot.com for personal help from the developers to resolve any issue.

Get JotNot Fax now to send your fax quickly and easily!

comments: I found all fax apps to cost something to actually fax, no suprise. But this app had pretty good reviews so I tried it. I really only needed to send one fax at the time so I purchased the 3 credits for $3.99. It takes only one credit to send a 1-5 page fax. So, when the occassion arrives where I need to send another fax or two I already have the credits. The app itself is pretty easy to use. You can use your camera to take a picture of your document and crop it and lighten or darken the print.
Convenient app but it faxes over blurry copies. Tried it twice, and the same result both times. If that weren't an issue, If give five stars.
Very handy and portable you can just fax straight from your phone, ive been using this for many years and it saves me a lot of time, stress and money
It takes a bit of time to send a fax if not using WiFi. However, the cost to fax several papers are fair...best deal for larger faxes.
Just installed and I was able to send a 5 page fax and a 3 page fax. Only problem was it would not read my phone files, only from the cloud.

title: dotloop
description:
Dotloop provides real estate brokers, teams, agents and customers with a fully integrated transaction management platform that eliminates paperwork, enables seamless collaboration, and increases productivity and compliance. With dotloop, all parties can create, share, eSign and store documents anywhere in real time to close deals faster and more efficiently.

TEXT TRANSACTIONS WITH MESSENGER

Improve your client response time and get real-time notifications with text Messenger, a free in-app service. Text Messenger lets you send, view, edit docs and get eSignatures with no client downloading required. Agents can receive time-stamped read receipts and easily export and track conversation history.

NOT YET A DOTLOOP SUBSCRIBER?

Dotloop for mobile is free to use for a limited number of loops. For full features, use the app to subscribe to dotloop Premium for $29/mo. Learn more at https://www.dotloop.com/products/plans-pricing/


DOTLOOP PREMIUM

If you sign up for a monthly Premium membership through the app, your subscription will be charged to your credit card through your Google Wallet account at confirmation of purchase. Membership will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of your current period. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your Google Play Store account settings.

Questions, suggestions, comments, or bugs? Email us at: androidfeedback@dotloop.com

comments: Dotloop is pricey but I can see why when I tested out a few other programs like docusign, hellosign, ect! From my experience Dotloop is the most comprehensive electronic signature program for Realtors. They include local Board of Realtors documents for seamless transactions. The app is almost perfect so I'm giving it 4 stars.

My experience has been awesome! The mobile option is great! I love that I can access everything on my phone. Which give me more flexibility to go on appointments and not sit and wait by the computer to access Dotloop! Dotloop mobile app is great!

Dotloop has been my choice of digital signing since forst introduced to me 5 years ago. I wish more businesses would use this platform. By far,much more simple than docusign or others. Unfortunately, my office currently uses the latter. Bummer

Dotloop makes it simple to organize, manage and share documents from multiple platforms. I can work from my phone or tablet from anywhere. No more lugging around the laptop! Love it. The support team have always been helpful and responsive, too.
At first i was hesitant. I am glad i jumped in yo learn how to use it. Its very simple and well organized. A seamless process.

title: FarmLogs
description:
FarmLogs is a farm management app used by thousands of growers to keep digital farm records, monitor field and crop conditions, and analyze their farm‚Äôs financial performance in order to lower costs and increase profitability. 

FarmLogs helps you:

- Map fields and automatically provide directions to their location
- Receive alerts when it rains on your fields, see field-level rainfall and heat unit accumulation and compare the amounts to prior seasons and the 10-year average
- Automatically track all your field work in one place to keep your records organized, secure, and accessible from any mobile device or desktop
- Log  gps-tagged scouting notes with photos
- View in-season satellite images in NDVI, true color and color infrared layers so you can identify yield threats and focus scouting efforts on areas showing signs of stress
- Make decisions on the go with a complete view of your current grain marketing position
- Identify local markets and find where you can get the best price for your crop
- See each soil type area and elevation features in your fields

Making better management decisions has never been easier. Download the app today to create a free account!

*Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.*

descriptionHTML:
FarmLogs is a farm management app used by thousands of growers to keep digital farm records, monitor field and crop conditions, and analyze their farm‚Äôs financial performance in order to lower costs and increase profitability.

FarmLogs helps you:

- Map fields and automatically provide directions to their location
- Receive alerts when it rains on your fields, see field-level rainfall and heat unit accumulation and compare the amounts to prior seasons and the 10-year average
- Automatically track all your field work in one place to keep your records organized, secure, and accessible from any mobile device or desktop
- Log gps-tagged scouting notes with photos
- View in-season satellite images in NDVI, true color and color infrared layers so you can identify yield threats and focus scouting efforts on areas showing signs of stress
- Make decisions on the go with a complete view of your current grain marketing position
- Identify local markets and find where you can get the best price for your crop
- See each soil type area and elevation features in your fields

Making better management decisions has never been easier. Download the app today to create a free account!

*Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.*

Questions or Concerns? Please feel free to visit our support page below or contact us at support@farmlogs.com

comments: WAS a great app. free to use version had a great organized layout for tracking expenses and profits. all of the activities and business plan data is input and modified by the user, so basically a glorified spreadsheet design with better user interface. and NOW, after inputting and tracking my data for 3 years......... I am forced to pay or move my data elsewhere. STAY AWAY!!! zero warning or perks for users utilizing their services. terrible business move. Farm at Hand is much better!!!

I used to enjoy this free app for simple tracking of rain fall. Now, without warning, they have changed subscription levels for the people that have helped them build and design this app, and are charging at least $120 per year for access to data which was free a month ago. User beware, their greediness has taken over, and it's sure to only get worse. I will be finding another platform to track data on my own property

Such a helpful and handy app. The company I work for uses it daily. We just upgraded to complete and having some app crashing issues but the support team is exceptional at helping with everything! Definitely recommend!
Used to be a great app, but they got greedy. Now 70‚ÑÖ of the app is locked behind a paywall.

I use this app to track rainfall on the food plots we plant on our hunting property. Rainfall accuracy was only so-so compared to our rain gauge but at least the app showed you rainfall history. Now they're charging $29 per month for that - NFW! The free Lite version of this app is worthless, there is nothing in it. Goodbye FarmLogs!!!!

title: Logo Maker - Icon Maker, Creative Graphic Designer
description:
Branding is one of the most important aspects of any business, large or small, retail or B2B. And the first step of branding is 'Get a great logo'. With Logo Maker you can achieve this important step very easily.

Create your very own professional & unique logo in just seconds.

Create logos and designs using thousands of graphic elements and editing options. There's no limit on creativity on "Logo Maker" / "Icon Maker", Logo Maker provide icons on every category that you'll need. You can make an original logo in no time with this all in one logo generator. You can change color of the icons, or use a texture image for coloring your logo and use custom filters on them. A simple icon is going to look very different with the right texture for your design. You can also create original color gradients and use them on your logos. Wait no more and start using our Logo Maker and see the difference. Logo Maker also provides logo creator tools to create really your very own original logos for all your needs.

Logo Maker is also useful to create promotional posters, advertisement, offer announcements, cover photos, brochure, news letter & other branding material for your shop, restaurant, office or social sites.

comments: Wasnt sure how to use it at first but after 2 mins it's actually really easy. So happy with my logo I've been struggling with it for a couple of weeks and this has just help me make my final cut

I get it, developers need money for their hard work. I don't disagree with that. But to charge a monthly fee for a basic-at-best logo app on your mobile device is just dumb. Especially when the options you get from it are mediocre at best. I could understand a one time purchase, but this app just isn't worth what they are asking.
Simple to use, intuitive interface and many options for personalization.

app was very straight forward and simple to use. I had an idea of what I wanted prior to downloading, and was able to quickly and accurately lay several images and letters/words over each other to get the desired effect. I created exactly the logo I wanted in about 20 minutes.
Excellent app. Nothing else needed. Works perfectly. Except there is no undo option

title: Sortly: Inventory Simplified
description:
The Simplest Inventory System, Ever  - Featured in Forbes, ABC news, Fox, New York Post & Inc. etc!  More than 15 million items sorted! 

Sortly is a super simple inventory management solution that enables businesses and teams to easily track what they have, where it is, and who has it. Anytime, anywhere, on any device.

Unlike other inventory management systems, you won‚Äôt need a 100-page guide or  lengthy training sessions to figure out Sortly. It‚Äôs built so you can have it up and running in minutes, all on your own. 

Sortly is trusted by tens of 1000‚Äôs of small businesses and teams at large enterprises including HP, Lyft, Honeywell, Sanford Health, Yale, Coors, etc


KEY FEATURES:

ACCESS INVENTORY ON WEB, TABLET OR SMARTPHONE
-From your desk or from your pocket, your inventory is always accessible. 
-Data is always synced automatically across all devices through the cloud.

A SIMPLE (VISUAL) SYSTEM
-Browse your inventory using photos rather than words in a spreadsheet. 
-Add up to up to 8 images per entry.
-Use folders to group items by location, by condition (in and out), by customer or employee
  
SCAN BARCODES & QR LABELS 
-Easily link Barcodes and QR codes to any of your items or folders in Sortly. 
-Search, move or update your items instantly using our in-app scanner.  

CREATE & PRINT CUSTOM QR LABELS (Available in Advanced Plan)
-Create custom QR labels using off-the-shelf self-adhesive labels that are automatically linked to items or folders. 

CHECK IN/ OUT ITEMS 
-Effortlessly check-in/out items to employees, customers, jobs or locations in seconds using the in-app scanner.

CUSTOMIZABLE FIELDS
-Track typical asset details like price, quantity, notes, location, or add add custom fields to meet your needs. 

GET STOCK ALERTS & DATE REMINDERS (Available in Advanced Plan)
-Set up automatic email and in-app notifications to help you keep track of stock levels, returns and more 

GIVE YOUR TEAM OR CUSTOMERS ACCESS (Available in Advanced Plan)
-Grant access to multiple users and manage their permission levels. 
-Easily keep track of user activity. 

CUSTOMIZE TO YOUR BRAND (Available in Advanced Plan)
-Add your logo and colors to the web app so your team or customers get a branded experience.

RECOVER LOST DATA
-Get back information that may be mistakenly deleted within 90 days

GENERATE CUSTOM REPORTS
-Export "activity based" or "current status based" CSV and PDF reports. 

IMPORT/EXPORT EASILY
-Import data via CSV using our import template
-Export your data via CSV, PDF or DROPBOX (csv + photos)

OFFLINE MODE (Mobile & Tablet Only)
-Use the mobile app in offline mode when there is no data connectivity. It will automatically sync when you get a data connection

INTEGRATE WITH EXISTING SYSTEMS (Available in Ultra Plan)
-Contact us to sync your existing system with Sortly via API
-Connect seamlessly to 3rd party accounting or ecommerce (coming soon)

UPGRADE TO SORTLY ADVANCED 

- Up to 2000 entries (100 entry limit in free plan)
- Create unlimited custom QR labels
- Get stock alerts and reminders
- Multi-user access (3 free user licenses)
- Manage user permission
- Add up to 10 custom fields
- Track user activity
- Generate custom PDF and CSV reports
- Add company logo and branding
- many more‚Ä¶

comments: Easy to use, app and desk. I do use the app, but the barcode scanner doesn't work. Using note 10, everything up to date, including app. Helpdesk asked if it was all up to date, replied with yes and specs. Never received another reply, even reached back out and nothing back. I like all that it offers, I will continue using. My rating is based on lack of help of their software, and the main reason for users of this app is the scanner and it's not working.

Works well but expensive. I needed something with a barcode scanner to catalogue my sewing patterns, sheet music and books at home so I don't re-buy things. It was really easy to use and Ifigured I'd upgrade when I hit the hundred item limit only to discover that the plans are super expensive. This is not an effective choice for home users, only businesses. I recomend the developers look at making a single user subscription for others like myself who just want to keep track of things at home.

Really happy with app but disappointed with pricing. The interface is great but $40 a month as your next price point from the free trial version is going to exclude a lot of customers who'd pay maybe $5 a month just to have more entries available. Was excited to use this but going to have to switch to a different app given the pricing.

Using to inventory waste treatment plant machines. I am able to take multiple photos, enter a serial number using the free custom field and then export all the data so that my pictures are neatly organized in an Excel sheet. This saved me a ton of time as pairing photos of machines that all look simular to their actual names, locations and serial numbers would have been a nightmare.
Good for keeping track of basic small inventory. Anything very large (over 100 items) or advanced features will require a subscription.

title: Fast Scanner Pro: PDF Doc Scan
description:
Fast Scanner turns your Android devices into a multiple pages scanner for documents, receipts, notes, invoices, business cards, whiteboards and other paper text. With Fast Scanner, you can quickly scan your document, then print or email them as multiple pages PDF or JPEG files. Moreover you can save the PDF files in your device or open them in other apps.

FAST SCANNER FEATURES:

+ Scan documents
Fast Scanner scans any type of documents, ranging from a receipt to multiple pages book.

+ Export to PDF file
All scanned documents are exported as industry-standard PDF file. You can add new pages or delete existed pages within the PDF file.

+ Email scanned documents
Just scan any documents and tap "Send" button. 

+ Extremely Fast
Fast Scanner is optimized to run very fast.

+ Multiple editing support scanned document
Fast Scanner support a lot of image editing options so you can make the scanned images as easy to read as possible.

+ Scans are saved to your device as images or PDFs.

+ Open PDFs or JPEGs in other apps like the free Dropbox app (or Evernote, SkyDrive, GoogleDrive app, etc) to send to clouds or fax apps.

+ Printing via Cloud Print or other print apps.

+ Universal - a single app that works on phone and tablet too. 

Fast Scanner: a little app that scans everything!

We are committed to provide frequently updated versions to all of our users. You only buy Fast Scanner once and get all FREE updated version later.

Color scan not getting clear It like black white seeing Need to improve on this ID card mode scan need

Outstanding app, works very well for recording documents and pictures. Optical character recognition (called Text Recognize) enables copying text in a picture into an app for editing. Would have been nice if they figured out a way to add notes to the scans. Using the signature is a workaround except it only has the squirrely "signature" font, which is not very legible.
Very helpful app

title: LaCollage
description:
LaCollage makes taking new inventory collages a breeze! Create collages for outfits or single items.
How does it work?
- Select a fun collage template
- You take pictures of your inventory
- Personalize the collage by placing some stickers
- We automatically generate beautiful collages with the item's type, size, and your watermark
- Sync your collage directly to Sonlet/ShopTheRoe, Booteek360, Dropbox, and/or the Camera Roll on your phone
- You can then easily use them in your customer parties! 

Never has taking new inventory photos been so easy and painless. Forget the days of having to type out the text for each and every collage. 

Additional Features:
- Upload collages directly to your Sonlet/ShopTheRoe account
- Upload collages directly to your Booteek360 account
- Outfits or single items
- Custom colors
- Place stickers on your collages
- Use photos already on your phone
- Customize fonts and colors
- Image editing
- Show/hide item price and customized pricing
- Photos are uploaded to your Dropbox account or saved to your phone or both
- You can customize the watermark text
- Photos on Dropbox get automatically organized in type and size folders
- Choose low or high quality image output

- You may sign up for LaCollage Pro monthly or yearly subscription which includes:

    - All templates and outfits with new monthly
    - All stickers with new monthly
- You may sign up for LaCollage Plus monthly or yearly subscription which includes:
    - Select templates and outfits with new monthly
    - Select stickers with new monthly

title: TurboScan: scan documents and receipts in PDF
description:
Over three million users chose TurboScan! Thank you for your support! ‚Ä¢ TurboScan turns your phone into a full-featured and powerful multipage scanner for documents, receipts, notes, whiteboards, photos, or other everyday text. With TurboScan, you can quickly scan your documents in high quality and store or send them as multipage PDF or JPEG files. 

TurboScan uses advanced fast algorithms to accurately detect document edges, straighten the documents (correct perspective), eliminate shadows and set a perfect contrast - black on white.

TurboScan boasts a powerful yet easy to use interface. Get instant one-tap brightness, rotation and color controls all on one screen!

TurboScan also offers SureScan, our proprietary scanning mode for sharper scans (especially useful in low-light conditions.) SureScan requires taking three pictures of the same document with the phone camera. 

TurboScan's handy "Email to myself" feature lets you send documents to a predefined address, or even upload them to online storage sites like Evernote, with a single tap. 

All processing happens on your phone, and the confidentiality of your data is never compromised (no Internet connection needed.)

TURBOSCAN FEATURES: 
‚Ä¢ Automatic document edge detection and perspective correction 
‚Ä¢ SureScan mode for very sharp scans 
‚Ä¢ Ultra-fast processing (under 3 seconds per page) 
‚Ä¢ Document naming, storage inside the app and search
‚Ä¢ Multipage editing: add, reorder, and delete pages
‚Ä¢ Copy pages between stored scans
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúEmail to myself‚Äù feature for quick emails 
‚Ä¢ Email document as PDF, JPEG or PNG, or save to camera roll
‚Ä¢ Arrange multiple receipts or business cards on a PDF page
‚Ä¢ Open PDFs or JPEGs in other apps like the free Dropbox app (or Evernote, GoogleDrive, OneDrive app, etc) to send to clouds, or fax apps 
‚Ä¢ Printing via Cloud Print or other print apps 
‚Ä¢ Instant one-tap brightness, rotation, and color controls 
‚Ä¢ Compact attachments with adjustable size 

TIPS ON SCANNING 
‚Ä¢ Make sure your document is flat and well lit. 
‚Ä¢ For best edge detection, include some margin around your document while shooting.
‚Ä¢ Use flash in low light conditions, but avoid glare from it with glossy documents.
‚Ä¢ If your flash over-saturates images or makes them blurry, please change the flash option in app Settings.

We're constantly improving TurboScan, and we value our customers' opinions and feedback. If you want to send us your feedback or have a problem with our software,  please contact us at  android@turboscanapp.com  before submitting a comment to the store.

‚Ä¢ Open PDFs or JPEGs in other apps like the free Dropbox app (or Evernote, GoogleDrive, OneDrive app, etc) to send to clouds, or fax apps
‚Ä¢ Printing via Cloud Print or other print apps
‚Ä¢ Instant one-tap brightness, rotation, and color controls
‚Ä¢ Compact attachments with adjustable size

TIPS ON SCANNING
‚Ä¢ Make sure your document is flat and well lit.
‚Ä¢ For best edge detection, include some margin around your document while shooting.
‚Ä¢ Use flash in low light conditions, but avoid glare from it with glossy documents.
‚Ä¢ If your flash over-saturates images or makes them blurry, please change the flash option in app Settings.

We're constantly improving TurboScan, and we value our customers' opinions and feedback. If you want to send us your feedback or have a problem with our software, please contact us at android@turboscanapp.com before submitting a comment to the store.
summary: TurboScan turns your phone into a full-featured and powerful document scanner.

title: Isagenix Business
description:
With the Isagenix Business app, you can easily share your way to success! Connect with new contacts and interact with your team using exclusive Isagenix marketing materials, videos, and more, right at your fingertips!
 
The Isagenix Business app makes it extremely easy to share with a contact information about the Isagenix products and opportunity!  Choose from a vast selection of Isagenix branded content: Product and opportunity videos, PDFs, images and more to share via email, text, and your favorite social media platforms.

Now you can also keep track of your sharing activity, as well as the activity of contacts you share your content with in the new Feed section!

Want to see social media posts from corporate Facebook, Twitter, and more without opening three or more apps? Now you can access content from all of these platforms in one place!
 
With an intuitive interface and compelling content, the Isagenix Business app makes growing your business simpler than ever!

title: Invoice Maker & Estimate App - Billdu
description:
Create great-looking, professional invoices,‚Äã quotes‚Äã, estimates, and purchase orders in just a few seconds with the Billdu ‚Äãinvoice generator.‚Äã The app combines features of a PDF receipt maker,‚Äã bill payment organizer ‚Äãand quote maker,‚Äãand is extremely easy to use! It saves you a lot of time with ready ‚Äãquote and invoice templates‚Äã. Accept card payments, let your clients pay you right on the spot. Share or print PDF receipts‚Äã, track and upload your expenses as you go. All your data is securely saved and synchronized across all your devices.

Why business owners love Billdu Invoice Maker:

‚Ä¢ SIMPLE INVOICE ON THE GO
Issue an invoice right after accomplished work. Create PDF files, send them to your clients, print or share an invoice right away. Billdu is your pocket ‚ÄãPDF invoice maker!‚Äã

‚Ä¢  RECEIPT TEMPLATE
Choose from 5 invoice templates, add company ‚Äãlogo‚Äã and signature, choose a color and your custom template is ready. Billdu simple invoice and receipt‚Äã templates are smooth, pleasant and informative.

‚Ä¢  QUOTE CREATOR
Not ready for an invoice? Send an estimate/quote/proposal ‚Äãwith an offer to your client and create an easy invoice from a quote after the job is done - in one click

‚Ä¢  EXPENSE TRACKER ‚ÄãAND B‚ÄãILLS MANAGER
Scanning bills and tracking expenses is now easy. Receipt‚Äã ‚Äãscanner and expense management are the right tools to keep track of your expenditures thereby making your company balance clear at a first glance.

‚Ä¢ GET PAID FASTER
Add a Pay Now button on your invoice and get paid up to 9 days earlier. 

‚Ä¢ IMPROVED CASH FLOW
See how your company‚Äôs doing - unpaid and overdue invoices are marked and clearly visible

‚Ä¢ MULTIPLE USERS AND DEVICES
Manage multiple companies, connect more devices and add more users to your account

‚Ä¢ SYNCHRONIZED DATA
Manage your company on all devices with Billdu invoice app to keep track of your business in real-time

---

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
* Invoice Attachment: Add images of your service or products directly to an invoice
* Get notified: Know exactly when and by whom an invoice was opened and viewed
* Use Billdu invoice app on more devices, utilize additional features:‚Äã proposal maker‚Äã and‚Äãinvoice editor
* Payment Reminders: Remind clients when a payment is coming up, due or late
* Inventory Tracker: Keep an eye on your inventory, manage stock and add items comfortably to invoices and orders
* Online P‚ÄãDF invoice maker‚Äã: Send and share links instead of PDF files
* Import clients from your phone's contacts
* Mobile and secure: invoices, quotes, estimates and other documents are saved on secured servers.
* Barcode scanner for uncomplicated item management and simple invoicing
* Client rating: Give and receive ratings through an invoice or quote, the app also ‚Äãestimates contractors and monitors their activity
*API connection and online store modules: Use Billdu as an invoice generator to connect to your online shop
*Offline Mode: Create an invoice or access your data even without an internet connection
*Create invoices from your quotes, estimates or orders easily with one click

PRICING AND SUBSCRIPTION
Use Billdu‚Äôs free invoice app for 2 weeks with all features unlocked and totally for free. Download our invoice app today and can choose one of our subscription plans later
STARTER $23.88/year or $2.99/month
STANDARD $95.88/year or $9.99/month
PREMIUM $179.88/year or $17.99/month

Payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions can be managed by the user. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during an active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Our terms and conditions: https://my.billdu.com/page/condition
We care about your privacy, read more at https://my.billdu.com/page/protection

For more information about our invoice app contact support@billdu.com

title: Invoice Maker - Tiny Invoice
description:
*** Choice of millions of businesses and organizations over 6 years and counting! ***

Still spending plenty of time writing hand-made invoices and waiting for opportunities to hand them out?
Tired of calculating yourself invoices, estimates, credit memos, expenses, purchase orders, etc. by different clients?
Imagining converting all paperworks into digital ones, stored stably in your phone and send it to your customers wherever you are?‚Ä®
These are exactly what Tiny Invoice could help you with.
Tiny Invoice is a perfect on-the-go invoicing solution for contractors, small businesses and freelancers, etc.¬†
With lots of customizable templates, you can create, send and track beautiful, elegant, professional invoices and estimates in only a few minutes.
All details could be added more or less as you want, like due dates, photos, discounts, shipping details, signatures, and more.
Compared with paperworks and other invoice maker apps, countless hours will be saved when organizing all finances.
Also, intuitive reports are always ready for you to check daily, monthly, quarterly and yearly by items, customers, categories, etc.

You will definitely find Tiny Invoice the most powerful tools to replace your daily handwriting paperworks and to free up your hands.

---
KEY FEATURES
* Create and manage invoices and estimates no matter when and where -- facing customers, closing stores, or starting a wonderful working day;
* Create invoices and estimates with only several taps from lots of elegant templates, like using a rapid generator;
* Customize invoices and estimates with your signature or company logo;
* Save frequently used items and clients for further use;
* Import clients from your contact list instead of too many types;
* Always handy to add all kinds of details like clients, items, taxes, discounts, attachments, etc.
* Support all types of tax, on item or total, inclusive or exclusive;
* Support discounts on item or total;
* Self-generated reports of all kinds for all periods: daily, monthly, quarterly and yearly, by items, customers and categories;
* Sync invoices and estimates across all your devices with one account;
* Share invoices and estimates with your friends and customers by all means, like picture, pdf, email, iMessage, etc.

---
WHY TINY INVOICE?
* Rapid
With lots of templates, creating invoices and estimates is far rapid than before.
* Customizable
On every invoice and estimate you created, all details are customizable. You can even add a signature and company logo onto it.
* Organized
All created invoices and estimates are well organized and ready for you to check and mark paid.
* Everywhere
Your invoices and estimates are always there on your all portable devices with one invoice account.
* Trustworthy
Tiny Invoice is used by millions of small businesses and organizations for over 6 years.


To break the limitations of 5 invoices/estimates/purchase orders/credit memos and 3 clients, we offer different subscription plans.
Also, for some additional details:
‚Ä¢ Payment will be charged to your Google account at confirmation of purchase.
‚Ä¢ Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is disabled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.
‚Ä¢ Automatic renewals will be charged at the same price you were originally charged for the subscription.
‚Ä¢ Subscriptions can be managed by going to Account Settings on the Play Store after purchase.
Terms of Service: https://www.fungo.one/tiny-invoice-terms-of-service

Tiny Invoice is constantly updated with new features. Please write to us before leaving negative reviews, as we can always help with your problem and the app.

If you have any problem or suggestion, please send mail to tinyinvoice.a@appxy.com, you will get the response and solution in a short time.

comments: Worked great for two years. Updated app, now its not allowing me to log in . Lost a year of invoices. Terrible service

title: Signature App: Jet Sign PDF Docs Now (e-Signature)
description:
Say goodbye to printing, scanning, and complex e-signature tools! JetSign lets you sign any document in seconds including: 

SUPER-SIMPLE SIGNING EXPERIENCE 
Tap or click anywhere to sign with your finger. Add your e-signature, dates, and text to your document and generate a signed PDF!

INVITE OTHERS TO SIGN WITH SIGNING LINKS
Send out documents for e-signature with a simple signing link that you can share in your own email or text message. You and your remote signer(s) can view and sign your document with a full audit trail. 

CONVERT ANY FILE INTO A SIGNED PDF 
Add one or several documents at a time including Word (doc/docx), Pages, PDF, HTML, RTF, WordPerfect, images, and 15 other file formats.

EASY IMPORTING
Add files from Dropbox, Google Drive, Mail, and other apps to start signing. 

STRONG SECURITY 
We protect your documents in the cloud with leading encryption methods (AES-256), SSL hosting, and full audit trails for electronic signatures. 

To share documents across devices and with other users, JetSign uses encrypted cloud storage in a secure US-based data center. View our Privacy Policy for full details at https://www.jetsign.com/privacy.

JetSign can be used for NDA's, sales proposals, contracts, job offers, lease agreements, and more. Discover how easy e-signatures can be - download JetSign and get started with our free trial! (no account or registration required) 
 
About Us 

JetSign is made in Vancouver, Canada and is a secure e-signature service by GrowthClick Inc. We're focused on creating a super-simple signing experience that you'll love using from your smartphone, tablet, and web browser.

JetSign is a paid subscription service that starts with a free trial to sign any 3 documents. After the trial, our Pro subscription starts at $4.99 USD per month and includes unlimited signings and remote signings with other users. (Note: Signing and accessing documents sent by other users is always free). 

Payment will be charged to your Google Play Store account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the Play Store after purchase.

Privacy Policy: https://www.jetsign.com/privacy
Terms of Use: https://www.jetsign.com/terms
descriptionHTML:
Say goodbye to printing, scanning, and complex e-signature tools! JetSign lets you sign any document in seconds including:

SUPER-SIMPLE SIGNING EXPERIENCE
Tap or click anywhere to sign with your finger. Add your e-signature, dates, and text to your document and generate a signed PDF!

INVITE OTHERS TO SIGN WITH SIGNING LINKS
Send out documents for e-signature with a simple signing link that you can share in your own email or text message. You and your remote signer(s) can view and sign your document with a full audit trail.

CONVERT ANY FILE INTO A SIGNED PDF
Add one or several documents at a time including Word (doc/docx), Pages, PDF, HTML, RTF, WordPerfect, images, and 15 other file formats.

EASY IMPORTING
Add files from Dropbox, Google Drive, Mail, and other apps to start signing.

STRONG SECURITY
We protect your documents in the cloud with leading encryption methods (AES-256), SSL hosting, and full audit trails for electronic signatures.

To share documents across devices and with other users, JetSign uses encrypted cloud storage in a secure US-based data center. View our Privacy Policy for full details at https://www.jetsign.com/privacy.

JetSign can be used for NDA's, sales proposals, contracts, job offers, lease agreements, and more. Discover how easy e-signatures can be - download JetSign and get started with our free trial! (no account or registration required)

comments: Great in parts, but frustrating. Essentially the variety of template styles and editing options are great. However, you cannot (or at least I haven't been able to) magnify the template. So when editing on a phone (I don't have access to a tablet) it is very difficult to get all the graphics the correct size. My fingers get in the way and so do the icons. I'd like to be able to pick a section of the Template in order to align and shrink icons to fit. It's a shame as the options are fab.

Tooooo many ads... & it made my phone moved so slow after I'd downloaded it. Also, what I hate about the app is that if I leave the app (even for a second) my work disappears before I could finish it. & the sizing of the texts doesn't even work. I tried to make my text bigger & it's still the same small size. It doesn't move from that size (size doesn't increase). Terrible app
Simple Interface, great quality, just what I was looking for.

I like the app a lot - I just wish it were possible to schedule a post to one's own Pinterest, Tumblr, Reddit - it gives the option to create post's for these accounts but no option to schedule. Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter only.
Loved the experience. And I hope I keep using it. As it turns out to be a part of the daily life üòò ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Simple Invoice Maker
description:
Billing, invoicing and quoting on-the-go for freelancers, consultants, and small business owners. Create, email, and print professional invoices and estimates/quotes in just a few seconds. Invoice Maker is free for your first 3 invoices or estimates. Upgrade in-app for an unlimited number of invoices and estimates.

INVOICES & ESTIMATES ON-THE-GO
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll never have to remind yourself to follow-up‚Äîbill or quote clients before you leave the sight.
‚Ä¢ Save all details of your product or service‚Äîdescription, price and more‚Äîfor faster invoicing later.

LOOK PROFESSIONAL
‚Ä¢ Brand invoices and estimates with your company logo.
‚Ä¢ Add signature, photos, notes, and more to your invoices and quotes.

SAVE TIME
‚Ä¢ Easily and quickly create professional invoices and estimates.
‚Ä¢ Convert estimates to invoices with one tap.

SHARE INVOICES & ESTIMATES WITH CLIENTS
‚Ä¢ Send PDFs via email or print them out.
‚Ä¢ Create shareable links to send as text messages or via chat apps.

OTHER FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Create an invoice or estimate for any products or services.
‚Ä¢ Describe invoice payment terms: 1 day, 5 days, etc.
‚Ä¢ Automatically calculate tax rate, inclusive or exclusive.
‚Ä¢ Keep track of payments and debts with reports.
‚Ä¢ List payment methods including credit card, PayPal, cash, check and more.
‚Ä¢ Add clients from your phone‚Äôs contact list.
‚Ä¢ Add customer information to your invoice or estimate with one tap.
‚Ä¢ Select any currency for your estimates and invoices.
‚Ä¢ Plus much more...

Ready to get started? The trial version of Invoice Maker can be used to create 3 free invoices or estimates on your mobile device. You can upgrade in-app to create an unlimited number of invoices and estimates with a subscription.

‚òÖ Monthly subscription: $4.99/month.
‚òÖ Annual subscription: $29.99/year.
‚òÖ Lifetime subscription: $49.99 one-time purchase.

All prices are in USD.

comments: I've been using this app for a while now and it worked fine until yesterday. I'm able to create the invoice but when I go to send, it just spins.  I uninstalled and reinstalled hoping that would work, it didnt and it erased all of my invoices. You would think since I have lifetime membership, this would not happen. I'm also unable to log in on the sign in page. I clicked on email link to send email but received email advising email not valid.
I got this app two days ago, liked it so I purchased the lifetime membership. Now it's not allowing me to create invoice. It keeps closing out. Very ANNOYING!!!!

Works ok . Doesn't send invoices all the time . When it works it's great. Their support email doesn't work. Iam a paid subscriber. Lost all my invoices and have to back track months worth of invoices. Wont log back in and I've spent 100bucks

What a waste of time. Downloaded it and set it up. When attempting to send or share invoices it just continues to spin. Others reported this as well, yet developer claimed it was fixed?? Dont waste your time.

Very disappointed... Claimed it was for free... I was still trying to figure out how the app works (about 3 or 4 days!) , and the next moment I cannot access anything if I do not pay a subscription fee. That to me is not free... I see that as dishonest and false advertising. Unless I did something wrong somewhere.....

title: Jump Desktop (RDP & VNC)
description:
50% off! #RemoteWork! Get it now!

Connect to any computer. Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere. 

Jump Desktop is a powerful remote desktop application that lets you control your computer from your phone or tablet. Compatible with both RDP and VNC, Jump Desktop is secure, reliable and very easy to set up. A streamlined user interface gives you the best possible remote desktop experience on any of your mobile or tablet devices. 

Easy setup and reliable:
Jump Desktop is very easy to configure; anyone can do it! Just visit: http://jumpdesktop.com/go on your PC or Mac and follow step-by-step instructions. You‚Äôll be up and running in no time.

Secure and built on open standards:
Jump Desktop is a true RDP and VNC client with built-in support for encryption. It lets you connect to your computer using an IP address or hostname, if you already have RDP or VNC configured on it.

Powerful features:
Unleash the full power of your phone or tablet while connected to your computer. Multitouch ready - pinch-to-zoom and two finger scrolling make controlling your computer easy and productive. Jump's multi-threaded rendering engine has been fine tuned for Android. Jump's VNC and RDP engine is one of the fastest you'll find on Android.

If you need help, visit http://support.jumpdesktop.com or email us at: support@jumpdesktop.com
 
Features:

‚úì Multi-protocol: supports RDP and VNC
‚úì Multi-touch ready: Pinch-zoom, two finger scrolling, mouse dragging all supported. Even three finger taps are supported to quickly show and hide the keyboard.
‚úì Easy and secure setup: Automatically configure your PC or Mac for remote access using Wi-Fi and 3G without worrying about your router settings. Use your Google account to setup and manage computers automatically (optional)
‚úì SSH Tunnel support (new!)
‚úì The best external keyboard and mouse support on Android: Supports all external keyboard keys and shortcuts. Right mouse clicks supported too with external mice - all natural, PC like!
‚úì Universal application: Works on tablets and phones - buy it only once and use it on all your Android devices
‚úì Full support for multitasking: Switch to other apps without disconnecting
‚úì Supports large custom screen resolution
‚úì Full mouse support: left and right clicks, dragging, scrolling, precision pointer movement

RDP features:

‚úì Touch redirection support for Windows 8 and Server 2012
‚úì Tested on: Windows 2000, XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Server 2003, Server 2008, Server 2008 R2, Server 2012, SBS Server
‚úì Secure: 40/56/128bit RDP, TLS/SSL, FIPS and NLA authentication support
‚úì Supports 8, 16 and 24-bit colors and all RDP performance options
‚úì Multiple monitor support on Windows 7 and above
‚úì Console sessions
‚úì Audio streaming
‚úì RD Gateway support

VNC features:

‚úì Tested with Mac OS X, TightVNC, RealVNC, UltraVNC, Linux (Ubuntu Remote Desktop)
‚úì Secure: Supports SSL encryption when used with Jump's automatic setup instructions: http://jumpdesktop.com/go
‚úì 8, 16-bit color
‚úì OS X Screen Sharing support
‚úì Multiple monitor support
‚úì Supported encodings: copyrect, zrle, tight, (zlib)hextile, zlib, rre, raw, desktop-resize

comments: WHile it willlet me move an open window to a second monitor - not seeing a way to use two screens extended on a RDP session, or start a second RDP session? So 3 stars on
Good on Apple, but on this tablet i was given i cant even get the thing to click. This version needs fixing.

For my purposes, the Android edition of this app (is) inferior to the iOS edition, for a very specific reason:  It DOES NOT wake up my PC.  I like the app so much, I was even willing to purchase it a second time- this time, in the Android side of the world.....for those times when I'm remote and my Ipad doesn't have a network connection.  But now I see, that I'm still going to be stranded unless I get my Ipad onto a network... to issue the wake-up call to my sleeping PC.  If/when the developer fixes this deficiency, I'll update this review, but for the moment, I cannot endorse the Android app as strongly as its iOS counterpart.  Update:  The developer has assured me; a major update to the Android app is underway, that will address this shortcoming.  (I neglected to mention- the developer [is] responsive.  I've made about 4 posts, and all were answered within 24-hours)

Installed it on my S9+ few months ago, don't recall using it on this phone. Noticed that I am running out of space on phone storage and decided to find what is using it. Imagine my surprise when I found Jump ate 20GB !!! Had to clean up application cache via OS to reclame back the space consumed by app that shouldn't be even running if not used. There is not a single host added to it either.

I really like this app a lot. I have it installed on all my macs/windows desktops because I prefer to have a single POE for all my computers. This way I don't have to carry multiple laptops everywhere. The only thing I have a problem with is running it on my Chromebook. I don't have the option to map my ctrl key to the cmd key when remoted in and the screen doesn't seem to scale correctly. I'm hoping for an update to resolve the chromebook issues since there isn't a specific chorme OS version.

title: ezClocker: Employee Time Tracking and Scheduling
description:
ezClocker is a simple to use employee time tracking and shift scheduling tool with GPS map to verify clock in and out locations. Ideal for any business with remote employees or those looking to replace the traditional time card system with something more modern and streamlined, ezClocker lets you provide your employees with a time clock on their mobile device! 

ezClocker makes your life easier by allowing you to modify and review timesheets, export data for payroll, create shift schedules for employees and much more!

Simple and convenient to use, now you can focus more of your time on your business and customers, and less time managing your employees!

------------------------------------------------
Why businesses LOVE ezClocker!
------------------------------------------------
‚Ä¢ Easy to use, employees clock in with a tap of a button using their mobile phone.

‚Ä¢ Built-in GPS map shows where employees clock in and out (does not track their movements)

‚Ä¢ Affordable! monthly subscription plans start at $10/month covering up to 15 employees with no hidden fees.

‚Ä¢ Create shift schedules using the app or website in real-time

‚Ä¢ All data is stored in the secure ezClocker Cloud ‚Äì 24/7 access via the website or app

‚Ä¢ Review & modify employee time sheets

‚Ä¢ Export data to a .csv / Excel file and email it to yourself or your accountant in seconds

‚Ä¢ Streamline and modernize the traditional time card system

------------------------------------------------
ezClocker Business is perfect for‚Ä¶
------------------------------------------------
‚Ä¢	Construction companies

‚Ä¢	Contractors

‚Ä¶ and so much more! 


In-App Purchases:

After your 30 days free trial, if you have more than 1 employee you will need to purchase a monthly subscription that will get automatically renewed every month. Monthly subscriptions start at $10 based on the number of employees you have:

-Up to 15 Employees for $10
-Up to 30 Employees for $25
-Up to 100 Employees for $50


Automatic Renewal Feature:

Your subscription will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off Subscribers can manage their subscription including turning off auto-renewal by visiting their Google Play Account and select the manage subscriptions option.

Please visit https://ezclocker.com/public/privacy.html to learn more about how we protect your privacy and https://ezclocker.com/public/ezclocker_terms_of_service.html for our terms of service.

‚Ä¢ Affordable! monthly subscription plans start at $10/month covering up to 15 employees with no hidden fees.

‚Ä¢ Create shift schedules using the app or website in real-time

‚Ä¢ All data is stored in the secure ezClocker Cloud ‚Äì 24/7 access via the website or app

‚Ä¢ Review & modify employee time sheets

‚Ä¢ Export data to a .csv / Excel file and email it to yourself or your accountant in seconds

‚Ä¢ Streamline and modernize the traditional time card system

------------------------------------------------
ezClocker Business is perfect for‚Ä¶
------------------------------------------------
‚Ä¢ Construction companies
‚Ä¢ Janitorial businesses
‚Ä¢ Contractors
‚Ä¢ Landscape businesses
‚Ä¢ Home Healthcare
‚Ä¢ Sales departments
‚Ä¢ Physician offices
‚Ä¶ and so much more!


In-App Purchases:

After your 30 days free trial, if you have more than 1 employee you will need to purchase a monthly subscription that will get automatically renewed every month. Monthly subscriptions start at $10 based on the number of employees you have:

-Up to 15 Employees for $10
-Up to 30 Employees for $25
-Up to 100 Employees for $50


Automatic Renewal Feature:

Your subscription will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off Subscribers can manage their subscription including turning off auto-renewal by visiting their Google Play Account and select the manage subscriptions option.

Please visit https://ezclocker.com/public/privacy.html to learn more about how we protect your privacy and https://ezclocker.com/public/ezclocker_terms_of_service.html for our terms of service.

DOWNLOAD EZCLOCKER TODAY ‚Äì THE SIMPLE, STREAMLINED TIME MANAGEMENT TOOL!

recentChanges: - Bug fixes.
comments: I really like this app - but I wish it did more than just track hours. Could graphs be added? Additional information about each employee? I would give it 5 stars - but the day is wrong in the app.
The request processing time isn't instant. So, maybe there is some optimization that could happen. However, the app is simple and streamlined which makes it really easy to use!
Very easy to use for the employee not sure what the employer's side looks like, only problem is can't go back and look at hours for entire week. Update: App works great. Thanks for the instructions.
We love this app at carden heating and cooling, highly recommended!
Solid app, does what I need it to do.

title: ezBid
description: Simple searching and sorting of bids for United Flight Attendants.
descriptionHTML: Simple searching and sorting of bids for United Flight Attendants.
summary: Bidding app for United United Flight Attendants.
developerAddress:
9917 East Ida Ave.
Greenwood Vilage, CO 80111
recentChanges: Tweak to position bidding.
comments: I find it very easy to use I only bid domestic lines so not sure how the international is

not user friendly at all. the Youtube tutorial video is useless at 27 seconds length, and there isn't another tutorial that I was able to find that would help me navigate the app better. it's easy if you only have a few parameters to place, such as days off and credit flying. however, I could not figure out how to place my international bids first, then to go back and add the domestics. and the bids would repeat themselves. this was very frustrating.

Best bidding app out there!Captain Gustafson has tirelessly maintained, and improved this app/program since it's inception interfacing with Unimatic! Now he's risen to the challenge of interfacing with CCS. This is clearly a labor of love for this man, and I so admire, and appreciate his efforts. Program works great on a Chromebook too!

This app has a lot of promise--- Scott, you have to remember you're talking to many people that enjoy '70-80's music' We're slow too! The videos were very helpful.. take it slow and I think you have a winner

I've been using ezbid for the past several months, and I love it so much. It makes sorting the lines a breeze. Even with all the changes thrown at us in CCS, ezbid has adapted and is still great. Thanks!
