developerAddress:
11F, Bld. A No. 1268 Wanrong Road
Shanghai 200436 China
recentChanges: 1. Fix some issues and optimize user experience
comments: Wow.... Almost any card needs alot of adjustment. There is no intelligence eat all. Like matching first name and first name in mail address or that usually streets send with the word street and not s1reet. (German edition) and there is no matching with any kind of dictionary. The scanning process is full of bugs. I am very disappointed. It would have been a great app 5 years ago. But it needs alot of improvement üò≥

I was a happy user for MANY YEARS. However, this app has taken such a TERRIBLE CHANGE. TOTALLY UNSATISFIED NOW with the state of the paid app, since they now want a monthly subscription for most of the features we had with the paid version. Now MOST OF THESE IMPORTANT FEATURES AND FUNCTIONS HAVE DISAPPEARED, and only available with the MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION VERSION. I feel totally BETRAYED BY CC for this move. Can't find enough words to describe how badly CC sucks now. Look at the plethora of 1 star reviews recently on APPGROOVES for this program now to see what I am talking about in more depth. In all my years since the beginning of Android apps, I think that what CC has done in their change is by FAR, THE BIGGEST CASE OF BETRAYAL TO THE CUSTOMER BASE in a move to $UCK MONEY FROM OUR POCKET$$$. If they had started with MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION like this in the beginning, and we knowingly bought into this, then I have no grounds for my BEEF. But to have a HUGE USER BASE, tied into the CC ecosystem, and then to switch to this business model, WITHOUT LEAVING US WITH OUR PREVIOUS FUNCTIONALITY IS THE WORST HIJACK HACK FROM A COMPANY THAT USED TO BE A GREAT APP. HEY DEVELOPER, how about giving your old customers the option for a refund of our paid app IF WE DON'T LIKE THE SWITCH TO SUBSCRIPTION SERVICE. Unlike Microsoft that switched office to a paid subscription, at least MS left their old programs that were PURCHASED, still TOTALLY FUNCTIONAL. NOT THE CASE WITH CC. Can UNSATISFIED USERS HERE recommend what you have replaced CC with??

Finally I have no lost business cards and all contacts at hand, shared with all my company executives. Definitely recommend. But don't forget that the provider of this app has history related to viruses. Well I have no extremely sensitive data, but some of you might.
I would say this has a 95% failure rate at actually putting in the right information. I always have to check it then fix it.
Awesome app, just not so lekker that i dont have my premium subscription anymore. Not sure what happened to it

title: digiPunchCard
description:
digiPunchCard - digital punch card is a cloud based loyalty CRM platform for retailers. 

For your clients, it replaces the the familiar "Buy 9 get one for free" paper punch/stamp card that always tend to get lost or be forgotten - the same but digital. 

For you, it is a powerful social loyalty CRM platform that drives new customers into your point of sale. It connects with your Facebook client profiles and your business fan page including friend referral campaigns. 

For more info, please visit our site: http://digipunchcard.com

Digital loyalty programs are emerging into the market as the most effective way to promote businesses and encourage returning customers. Previously, the digital loyalty system was reserved for large companies with a dominant online presence, leaving small businesses out of the game.

Many small businesses operate loyalty campaigns through flimsy punch cards, a system that, while effective to a certain point, is significantly limited. Unfortunately, many business owners are unaware of the huge benefits involved in digital punch cards and are perhaps frightened to make the move into the world of digital loyalty because they believe that it would be expensive and complicated. But that is all about to change‚Ä¶

Enter ‚ÄúdigiPunchCard‚Äù‚Ä¶.the most intelligent and evolved loyalty platform for small businesses. This cloud based, social loyalty CRM platform brings effortless, enjoyable results to retailers who are looking to grow their client base and keep existing customers coming back.

Read on if you wish to discover how you can turn a loyalty punch card into incredible sales performance.


* Easy to Use *

For the business owner, it is as simple as downloading, configuring and then you are ready to go.

Operating on an android, tablet or phone, the customer‚Äôs cell phone number is entered upon his/her purchase. Once entered, the ‚Äòpunch‚Äô is recorded. No need to fumble through the wallet to find the card or hold up other customers!

The back end is user friendly and packed with interesting features. You can view statistics and graphical reports, you can customize your punch card‚Äôs design and you can constantly monitor any customer‚Äôs punch cards.

And of course, for the customer, the advantages are endless. Not only do customers benefit from reward campaigns, they are also able to register through their Facebook account, making it hassle free and easy. Best of all, they won‚Äôt need to remember to physically carry their loyalty card because they are already in the system!


* A Terrific Marketing Solution *

The fact that customers can connect to ‚ÄúdigiPunchCard‚Äù through Facebook means that they can advocate your business through friend referral scenarios.

Sending campaigns and promoting certain products and events can also be done through the ‚ÄúdigiPunchCard‚Äù, making it a highly effective tool for branding and marketing. As a platform that allows you to engage your customers and reward them with ease, means that your business name will constantly be at the front of their minds, instead of hidden away in their wallets.

 
* Earn the customer appreciation you deserve *

A platform that rewards customers without requiring any effort on their part will not only result in a short term boost of sales. It will keep your customers coming back again and again. Everybody loves a deal, but if that deal is delivered in a fun, easy and personal way, it will encourage returning customers and prompt them to spread the word.

Most businesses offer loyalty programs. Your challenge as a small business owner is to have the digital loyalty system that results in significant results, while offering customers a rewarding and enjoyable experience. 

Learn more about the fantastic features of ‚ÄúdigiPunchCard‚Äù - http://digipunchcard.com/features .
